lang rna dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po mi 'jigs sna tshogs dang / ri'i rgyal po ral gri dang / ri'i rgyal po gdung ba dang / ri'i rgyal po mig
bsku dang / ri'i rgyal po muny+dza dang / ri'i rgyal po ri dwags can dang / ri'i rgyal po 'joms byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ti se dang / ri'i rgyal po mi mjed dang / ri'i rgyal
po nye dkar dang / ri'i rgyal po tsan+dan phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal po dus bri byed dang / ri'i rgyal po skem ri dang / ri'i
rgyal po ba lang srung dang / ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra can dang / ri'i rgyal po bstan pa 'dzin dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na ri'i rgyal po 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang yod
pa de la lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dwags rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang /
lus srul po rnams dang / skem byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams dang / gnon po rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub
pa rnams dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag rgyun du gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya
'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /sdig pa thams cad sol cig /dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig /mi dge ba sol cig /don rnams la snang
bar gyis shig /gnod pa rnams sol cig /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang / /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde
legs dag /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis rgyu skar gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu zhing snang bar byed pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig /
'di lta ste/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang / /mgo dang lag dang snabs so dang / /rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin skag ste bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar
bdun po 'di dag ni/ shar gyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /mchu ni mi mdza' 'joms pa dang / /de bzhin gre
dang dbo gnyis dang / /ma bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga de ni bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ /lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag
lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar
gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /lha mtshams gzi brjid chen mo dang / /de bzhin snron dang snubs dang ni/ /chu stod pa dang ni chu smad dang / /de ltar byi bzhin gro bzhin no/ /
de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ nub phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go /de dag gis kyang rig sngags
kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums
stod khrums smad dang / /nam gru dang ni tha skar dang / /bra nye de ni bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ byang gi phyogs na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag byang phyogs
srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya
mthong bar shog cig /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams kyi khrod na rgyu zhing 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / lo legs
pa dag lo nyes pa dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig /'di lta ste/ gza' nyi ma dang / gza' zla ba dang / gza' phur bu dang / gza' pa sangs dang / gza' spen pa dang /
gza' mig dmar dang / gza' lhag pa dang / gza' lha min dbang po sgra gcan dang / gza' du ba mjug ring ngo / /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ /de
ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no/ /skar ma gza' bdun de bzhin te/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /sum cu rtsa bdun tshang ba dag /'char
ba dang ni nub pa dang / /'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu/ /'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed/ /gzi che rdzu 'phrul chen po dag /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /rig
sngags rjes su yi rang byas/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya
mthong bar shog cig /kun dga' bo/ drang srong rnying pa brtul zhugs grub pa/ rig sngags grub pa/ grags pa 'bar ba dang / klung dang ri la gnas pa/ dmod pa'i
mtshon cha can/ dka' thub drag pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyi/ khyod kyis zungs shig /
'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba dang / drang srong
chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnas 'jog
ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba
dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro dga'
zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po skal ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong
chen po mdun du bdar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen bo gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu
zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsha bo zhes bya ba dang /
drang srong chen po dag mnyam zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po yang dag 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po
bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bla ma zhes
bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grub pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gru 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gangs can zhes
bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mig dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po cha byad 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gos ngan zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po
mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po pa ba sangs zhes bya ba dang / drang
srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po spen pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gza' lhag ces
bya ba dang / drang srong chen po dug sel zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rwa gcig pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rwa
zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gyur mid kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sgra'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong
chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed glang po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po go'u ta ma zhes bya ba dang

drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po byis pa rtse zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mis byin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ri bo zhes bya ba dang / drang
srong chen po srin bu 'dzin ces bya ba ste/ kun dga' bo/ drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni/ rig byed rnams byed pa/ gsang sngags rnams byed pa/ dmod pa 'dor ba/ brtul
zhugs grub pa/ gzi brjid che ba grub pa/ pha rol gnon pa grub pa dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya
'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /tad+ya thA/ hi ri hi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ phu ri phu ri/ su ri su ri/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ Daph+phu/ Daph+phu/
Da Daph+pu| gra sa ni/ ma tha ni/ da ma ni/ da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni/ pa tsa ni/ pA tsa ni/ ta pa ni/ ta pa ni/ ha na ni/ da ha ni/ dA ha ni/ da ha da ha/ da ha/ da la da la dA la ni/ pa Ta ni mo ha
ni| stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni swa yaM b+hu swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis skye rgu'i bdag po chen po gang dag lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams
dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams
dang / mi dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i khyad par grangs med pa dag gis 'jig
rten gsum du rnam par gzhag pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig/ 'di lta ste/ skye rgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / skye rgu'i bdag po bu can dang / skye rgu'i bdag po za tshul
gyi bu dang / skye rgu'i bdag po me dang / skye rgu'i bdag po gso ba dang / skye rgu'i bdag po mdun du bdar dang / skye rgu'i bdag po spu zing sel dang / skye rgu'i bdag po
go byed dang / skye rgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang / skye rgu'i bdag po zin po dang / skye rgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang / skye rgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang / skye rgu'i
bdag po mkhas pa dang / skye rgu'i bdag po gus yod de/ kun dga' bo/ skye rgu'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni/ gnas pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs
bsrung ba'i phyir gnas pa dag go /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya
mthong bar shog cig/ thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag gis kyang srung ba gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ hi ri hi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ phu ri phu ri/ su ri su ri/
hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ Daph+phu/ Daph+phu/ Da Daph+phu/ gra sa ni/ tha ma ni/ da ma ni/ da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni pa tsa ni/ pA tsa ni/ ta pa ni/ tA pa ni/ ha na ni/ dA hA ni/ dA hA ni/
da ha da ha da ha/ da la da la/ dA la ni/ pA ta ni/ mo ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis dug chen po rnams kyi ming zungs shig/ tad+ya thA/ aN+Da rA/
paN+Da rA| kA ra Da/ ke yU rA/ b+hUM taM ga mA/ b+hu ta pa ti/ be duM pa ti/ si ri pa ti/ te dze pa ti/ te dzo gra pa ti/ ya sho ba ti/ ya sho gra pa ti/ a rA DA/ ta rA DA/ ta ra ta rA DA/ dan+ta/
dza ha dzau hA/ dzo lA/ me lA/ hA lA/ phA lA/ gu la hA/ ru tsi rA/ da du rA/ a ri ki tsi kA/ kam+b+ha/ shata tan+tu rA/ bi pu li/ na ku li/ ki ri pi/ ta rang gI raSh+ta/ a mra ma ti dzam+bu
ma ti| ma d+hu ma ti/ ka ma le/ bi ma le/ kuN+Da le/ a hi tu hi/ du hi/ bag+ge/ bag+ge ngU te/ bang sa nA b+he/ ma hA ga re/ tu lam+be/ du lam+be/ su lam+be swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ 'di
dag ni| dug chen po dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs
su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil
ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /kun dga' bo/ khyod
kyis shing ljon pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig/ 'di lta ste/ shing ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa
chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po
ser po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rna ldan byed ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rgyas byed ces
bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po bil ba zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po tsu ta zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po de dag dang gzhan dag la lha gang dag
gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar
shog cig/ kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ 'di
lta ste| yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis
gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bstan cing rjes su
yi rang ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /mi mjed kyi
bdag po tshangs pas kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis
kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags
skyes pos kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus kyang
smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /dri za'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag
dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can gyis kyang smras shing rjes
su yi rang ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /
nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi
dwags kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi
gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon gyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /gdon thams cad kyis
'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mjal za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su
sha za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za za rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas
pa za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin
sreg za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su
ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su skyug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang /
zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /gshed byed dang / sgyur ba'i las dang / byang dang g.yeng byed dang / ro langs dang /
sems sgyur dang / rbod gtong dang / bza' nyes dang / skyu gnyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas dang / bri nyes dang / sgom nyes dang / smad pa
rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / zla ba phyed
pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / nyi ma phyed pa dang / nyin mo pa dang / yud tsam pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims drag po dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / rlung las
gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pas 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /rims thams cad kyis 'gal
bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga mchus pa dang / mig nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog
ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / mkhur ba na ba dang / chu son pa dang /
skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas na ba dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nyed lag na ba las
'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me dbal dang / lhog pa rnams kyis
'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /nad thams cad dang / dug thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad dang / 'thab
pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
rma bya chen mo 'di las 'gal bar byas na/ lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs
rgyas dang / nyan thos thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /sems ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i gang zag rnams bslus par 'gyur
ro| |rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang gshur zhes bya ba la thug gi bar gyi gsang sngags kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi dbang
po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar
rlog par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba byas sam/ skud pa btags na/ de gsang pa'i
rigs ba ni/ chad pas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni/ bzhu btsog pas so/ /bzhu btsog pa'i rigs pa ni/ spyo bas so/ /spyo ba'i rigs
pa ni| dam bca' bas so/ /dam bca' ba'i rigs pa ni/ spu zing zhes bya bas so/ /spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni/ de bzhin du thar par 'gyur ro/ /de la rgyal po'i
'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la dug gis
mi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis kyang ma yin no/ /bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par
'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / dgra chom par 'gyur ro/ /rmas pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar yun ring
du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ ha cang
char che ba 'am/ char dkon pa'i tshe bklag par bya'o/ /des ni/ klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ char chen po ni/ gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ji srid par char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang / dgra thams cad
zhi bar 'gyur na/ sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba'am/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi rig sngags kyi
rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zungs shig/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i
phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'di kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig/ tad+ya thA/ yA ba ti/ d+hA ba ti/
d+hA ra ki/ hu lu/ hu lu me swAhA/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug med pa/ /sangs rgyas bden
pas dug bcom mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa/ /chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo/ /
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa/ /dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom
mo| |sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang / /dgra bcom rnams kyi grags gang dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /ngas ni bde legs 'gyur ba byas/ /
kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo/ /dge slong sa ri bde legs su gyur cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dge
slong sa ri ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang ba byas te/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang /
mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos srung ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri nad de las
sos so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te/ ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gsung
ba de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slang du ma 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho
chen po bzhi ni/ skam yang srid/ sa ni/ nam mkha' la 'phags kyang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni/ sa la ltung yang srid/ klung ni/ rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bka' ni/ gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
mo rma bya chen mo 'di la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mos par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
dang / dge bsnyen ma de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod
sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
bstod do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen
gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mahA pra ti sa ra bid+yA rI dz+nyI/ bod
skad du| 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/ rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas
legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che dang pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/

'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i seng+ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul can sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na byang chub sems dpa'
bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen
po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig/
thang gcig /yud tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos ston pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya che la zab cing yangs pa dang /
spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi'i du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par
thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa dang / pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / bden pa dang /
yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros
dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen
po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol
ba| rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba thob pa/
kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang
ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od
srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la
sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs
ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan
dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / 'jog
po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams
dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang
gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po g.yog
du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog
ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / srin mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar
dang / gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang /
bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dwags rnams dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog
rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang /
dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phrang ba can dang / zla ba can
dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la la dang / log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb
kyi lha drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo
rje'i ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang /
skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa dang / gnon po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla
ba dang / nub ka'i lha dang / nang par gyi lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / sa'i lha dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin
tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni
shin tu yongs su bzung / byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa ni brnyes/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/
yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras/ dbu'i gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi las
thams cad la ni mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra
dang / tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng+ge'i sgra ni sgrog /ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa
dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / bya dka' ba'i spyod pa las ni phyir ma log /sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan te rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i
pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin
tu brtan par gnas pa/ rdo rje'i rin po che'i chu srin du ma'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bres pa'i phang bshams pa/ rin po che du ma pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa/
rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an+da rnyil dang / an+da rnyil chen po dang / dun las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te kun nas mdzes
pa| gdugs rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ skye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phra
du mas kun nas bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te gser gyi ri bo'i
rgyal po ltar dpal ni/ rab tu 'bar/ sa phyogs ni/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug
par ni| snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge
ba| tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum
gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri bkod pa du ma'i khang pa
brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen
ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu chos ston pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal
pa| sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun/ /rab 'joms so sor 'brang ba yi/ /gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya/ /'di ni thos pa tsam gyis
kyang / /sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin/ /nad do cog las grol bar byed/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bas/ /lus can ngan 'gror
'gro ba dang / /de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs/ /'di yis srung ba byas na ni/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug /de bzhin
lcang lo can dang ni/ /srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro/ /'byung po klu dang sha za rnams/ /mi bzad 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyed par/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams
cad dang / /dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so/ /ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang / /skem byed brjed byed smyo byed dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang / /gdon rnams
rab tu brlag par 'gyur/ /so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang / /mi yi skye rgu rnams 'tshe ba/ /de dag thams
cad rengs byed 'gyur/ /byad stems mi bzad gang yin dang / /pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed/ /sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i las las rnam
par grol/ /dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs/ /mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/ /lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te/ /dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur/ /
rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ /dgra kun rab tu 'joms par 'gyur/ /de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub/ /rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis
rtag tu mgul pa'am/ /lag par rig pa btags na ni/ /de yi dgos pa yod do cog /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / /
sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren dang / /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang / /lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu srung / /so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la/ /nyan thos sangs
rgyas thams cad dang / /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang / /de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang / /de
la nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /srung bar byed de the tshom med/ /brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang / /dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che/ /
smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang / /ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang / /drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen
po'i lha rnams dang / /de kun so sor 'brang ba yi/ /gzungs 'dzin de la srung bar byed/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che rnams dang / /rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang / /bdag gi
ma dang khro gnyer dang / /lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang dkar/ /de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang / /nag mo che dang pho nya dang / /de bzhin rdo rje pho nya dang /
zhags pa bzang dang rdo rje zhags/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rig pa lha mo rdo rje phreng / /bdud rtsi thab sbyor byed pa dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che/ /rna ba nag
mo stobs chen mo/ /dpal yon ldan pa skal chen dang / /rna cha gdub kor pad+ma 'dra/ /me tog so can nor bu gtsug /skra mdog mdzes dang khyab pa mo/ /lha mo gzi brjid
chen mo dang / /dpal yon ldan pa glog phreng can/ /srin po ral pa gcig pa dang / /sangs rgyas srung zhes bya ba dang / /skal ba chen po mi thod can/ /lang+ka'i bdag po
dpal yon can/ /gzhan yang lha mo mang po rnams/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin byed dag /rig pa gang gi lag na gnas/ /de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /
'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang / /dung can dang ni so brtsegs ma/ /dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang / /de yi rjes 'gro rtag tu srung / /so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di/ /
bud med gang zhig rtag 'chang na/ /de yi thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag par mngal na bu pho chags/ /mngal rnams na yang bde bar skye/ /sbrum ma dag kyang
bde bar 'gyur/ /nad dang sdig pa thams cad kyang / /'jig par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /bsod nams ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/ /nor dang 'bru yang rtag tu
'phel/ /tshig kyang gzung du 'os pa dang / /mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba nyid/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung / /gtsang ma gang zhig 'chang bsrel na/ /de ni sems
can thams cad dag /thar par bya phyir brtson par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nad do cog kyang rnam par spangs/ /slas dang skye bo mang bcas pa'i/ /
rgyal po'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs pa rtag tu 'bar/ /bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel/ /de yi bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ /dkyil 'khor
kun tu zhugs pa yin/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/ /de ni kun tu dam tshig shes/ /rmi lam ngan pa rmi mi 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog /
sdig pa rnams dang de bzhin du/ /dgra yang rab tu phung bar byed/ /gza' kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /ye shes dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/ /'dod pa thams
cad sbyin par byed/ /de phyir rtag tu bcang bar bya/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon/ /nga ni rab tu 'di brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM bi pu la gar+b+he/ bi pu la bi ma le/ bi
mal gar+b+he/ bi ma le/ dza ya gar+b+he/ badzra dz+wa la gar+b+he/ ga ti ga ha ni/ ga ga na bi sho d+ha ne/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ oM gu na ba ti/ ga ga na/ pi tsA ri Ni ga ga ri Ni gi ri gi
ri| gi ri Ni gi ri Ni/ ga ma ri ga ma ri/ ga ha ga ha/ gargA ri gargA ri/ ga ga ri ga ga ri/ gaM b+ha ri/ gaM b+ha ri/ ga b+hi ga b+hi/ ga hi ga hi/ ga ma ni ga ma ni/ ga ri ga ri/
gu b+ha gu b+ha/ gu ha gu ha/ gu ru gu Ni/ tsa le gu ha ni/ gu ha ni/ gu ru Ni/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsa le tsa le/ mu tsi le mu tsu le/ dza ye bi dza ye/ sar+b+ba b+ha ya bi ga te/ sar+b+ba saM
ra k+Sha Ni| si ri si ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ sa man+ta baR+Sha Ni/ bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma/
kun nas 'dren ma/ dgra thams cad 'joms par mdzad ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / nad
thams cad las srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi ga ta/ A ba ra Ne/ bi sho d+ha ni/ bi bi d+ha/ A pa ra Ni/ bi nA sha ni/ mu ri mu ri/
mu tsi mu tsi/ mu li mu li/ tsi li tsi li/ ki li ki li/ mi le mi le/ ka ma le/ bi ma le/ dza ye bi dza ye/ bi dza yA/ ba he dza ya ba ti/ ba she Sha ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das ma
rin po che'i cod pan dang / phreng ba mnga' ba/ cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i lha mo chen mo/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par
sbyong ba| bdag la thams cad du kun nas srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma/ mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/
dpung gnyen ma mchis pa bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar mdzad du gsol/ tsaN+De tsaN+De/ tsaN+Di ni tsaN+Di ni/
bo ga ba ti/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ni bA ra Ni/ bi dza ya/ bA hi ni/ hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ A yu bA li ni/ su ra ba ra pra ma tha ni/ sar+b+ba de ba ga Na pU dzi te/ tsi ri

tsi ri| d+hi ri d+hi ri/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ pra b+he pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ su pra b+ha bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba pA paM bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+ha ra ni/ d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ su mu su mu/
mu su mu su/ ru ru tsa le/ tsa la ya/ dpal gyi sku mnga' ba/ bdag la gnod par sems pa las bskyab tu gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ dza

ya ka ma le/ k+Shi ni k+Shi ni/ ba ra da/ aM ku she/ oM pad+ma bi shud+he/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ mang+ga la bi shud+he/ ba bi tra mu khi/ khaD+gi

ni khaD+gan/ kha ra kha ra/ dz+wa la ti shi kha re/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta bra b+he su pra b+ha bi shud+d+he/ sa man+ta pra sA ra ti a ba b+hA si ta shud+d+he/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba de ba ga Na/ gra ha na k+Sha
tra| sa ma A kaR+Sha ni/ sat+ya pra te/ oM hri tra ta ra ta ra/ ta rA ya ta rA ya/ glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs ma/ bdag mi'i gnod pa las bsgral du gsol/ la hu
la hu| hu lu hu lu/ hu du hu du/ tu ru tu ru/ ki ni ki ni/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ hu Ni hu Ni/ sar+b+ba gra ha b+hak+Shi ni/ piM ga le biM ga le/ mu tsu mu tsu/ su mu su mu/ su bi tsa le/ ta ra ta
ra| bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs ma/ thams cad du kun nas phyogs thams cad bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i
zhags pa'i bcing bas bdag 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du gsol/ badzra dz+wa la bi shud+d+he/ b+hu ri b+hu ri/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ b+ha ga ba ti/ gar+b+ha
bi shud+d+he| gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ni/ kuk+Shi sam+pu ra Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tsa la tsa la/ dz+wA li ni/ lha'i chus kun tu char dbab tu gsol/ a mr-i ta baR+Sha Ni de ba ta/ a ba tA ba ra Ni/ bde
bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi mchog gi sku dang ldan pa bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / /rmi
lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu thams cad 'joms pa/ gnod
pas 'jigs skrag pa bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las thams cad du rtag par
srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ ba la ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ thams cad du dus kun tu bdag rgyal bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag la
rig pa chen mo 'di grub par mdzad du gsol/ dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub tu gsol/ gsang sngags rnams grub tu gsol/ bgegs rnams gzhom du gsol/ dza ya dza
ya| sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ saM pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ rig pa thams cad las byung ba'i sku can/
rgyal ba lhag par rgyal ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par dag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/ bzhugs su gsol/ dam tshig bskyang
du gsol/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las bdag la gzigs su gsol/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni/ sa man+ta a kA ra maN+Da

la bi shud+d+he/ bi ga te/ bi ga ta ma le/ sar+b+ba ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ k+shi ni k+shi ni/ sar+b+ba pA paM bi shud+d+he/ ma la bi ga te/ dza ya ba ti/ te dzo te dzo ba ti/ badzra badzra ba ti swAhA/ 'jig
rten gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa la swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbang
bskur ba la swAhA/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa la swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis dam tshig grub pa la swAhA/ dbang po dang ldan pa dbang pos rnam par bltas pa la swAhA/ tshangs pa dang tshangs pa la gnas pa
la swAhA/ khyab 'jug gis phyag byas pa la swAhA/ dbang phyug chen pos phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la swAhA/ rdo rje 'dzin lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang brtson 'grus
kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swAhA/ yul 'khor srung la swAhA/ 'phags skyes po la swAhA/ mig mi bzang la swAhA/ rnam thos kyi bu la swAhA/ rgyal po chen po bzhis
phyag 'tshal ba la swAhA/ gshin rje la swAhA/ gshin rjes mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba la swAhA/ chu'i lha la swAhA/ rlung lha la swAhA/ rlung lha chen po la swAhA/ me lha la
swAhA| klus rnam par bltas pa la swAhA/ lha'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/ klu'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams la swAhA/ srin po'i tshogs rnams
la swAhA| dri za'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams la swAhA/ nam mkha' lding gi tshogs rnams la swAhA/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/
lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/ mi rnams la swAhA/ mi ma yin pa rnams la swAhA/ gdon rnams la swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad la swAhA/ yi dwags la swAhA/
sha za la swAhA/ brjed byed la swAhA/ gnon po la swAhA/ grul bum la swAhA/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru swAhA/ tu ru tu ru swAhA/ mu ru mu ru swAhA/ ha na ha na/ sar+b+ba sha trUM swAhA/ da ha da ha
sar+b+ba duSh+TA nAM swAhA/ gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyis lus dz+wA la ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ta tsi trA nA swAhA/ 'bar ba la swAhA/ rab tu 'bar ba la swAhA/ rdo rje 'bar
ba la swAhA/ ma lce 'bar ba la swAhA/ kun tu 'bar ba la swAhA/ nor bu bzang la swAhA/ gang ba bzang po la swAhA/ nag po chen po la swAhA/ ma mo'i tshogs la swAhA/ gnod sbyin
mo rnams la swAhA/ srin mo rnams la swAhA/ nam mkha'i ma mo rnams la swAhA/ rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams la swAhA/ mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la swAhA/ nyin mo rgyu ba rnams la
swAhA| dus gsum du rgyu ba rnams la swAhA/ dus su rgyu ba rnams la swAhA/ dus ma yin par rgyu ba rnams la swAhA/ zas su mngal za ba rnams la swAhA/ mngal 'dzin pa la
swAhA| hu lu hu lu swAhA/ oM swAhA/ swaHswAhA/ b+huHswAhA/ b+hu baHswAhA/ b+hur+b+hu baHswAhA/ tsi Ti tsi Ti swAhA/ bi Ti bi Ti swAhA/ d+ha ra Ni swAhA/ d+hA ra Ni swAhA/ ag+ni swAhA/ te dzo ba yu

swAhA| tsi li tsi li swAhA/ mi li mi li swAhA/ si li si li swAhA/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya swAhA/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya swAhA/ maN+Da la ban+d+he swAhA/ sI mA ban+d+he swAhA/ d+ha ra Ni ban+d+he swAhA/ sar+b+ba sha trU b+hany+dza ya

swAhA| dzaM b+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya swAhA/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya swAhA/ tshin+da tshin+da swAhA/ b+hin+da b+hin+da swAhA/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza swAhA/ ban+dA ban+dA swAhA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya swAhA/ ma Ni

bi shud+d+he swAhA/ sUR+ye swAhA/ sUR+ye bi shud+d+he swAhA/ sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ tsan+d+re tsan+d+re pa ri pU r+Na tsan+de gra he b+h+yaHswAhA/ nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswAhA/ shi be b+h+yaHswAhA/ shAn+ti b+h+yaHswAhA/

puSh+Ti b+h+yaHswAhA/ swa s+t+ye ya na b+h+yaHswAhA/ gar+b+ha d+ha re swAhA/ shi baM ka ri swAhA/ shi ka ri swAhA/ shAn+ti ka ri swAhA/ puSh+TiM ka ri swAhA/ be la bar+d+ha ni swAhA/ ba la bar+d+ha ni ka ri
swAhA| shrI ka ri swAhA/ shrI bar+d+ha ni swAhA/ shrI dz+wA la na swAhA/ mu tsi swAhA/ na mu tsi swAhA/ ma ru tsi swAhA/ be ga ba ti swAhA/ oM bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang brel ba/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag bde legs su gyur cig /oM mu ne mu ne/ bi mu ni bi mu

ni| d+ha ri tsa la tsa la ne/ b+ha ga ba ti/ b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya ha ri ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bud+d+hi li bud+d+hi li/ tsum+bu li tsum+bu li swAhA/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hri da ya dzu She
swAhA| oM mu ni mu ni mu ni ba re/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag
la dbang bskur du gsol/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te badzre swAhA/ bram ze chen po'i rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen po/ kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam
par dag pas rgyas pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad
las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze chen po/ rig pa 'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o/ /de'i lus la mes mi tshugs so/ /ci mngon
zhe na| gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma bdag nyid me'i nang du mchongs pa
dang / der pad+ma dag byung ste de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal na gnas bzhin du rig pa 'di yid la byas so/ /rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis me de skad
cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to/ /de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /bram ze chen po/ rgyu des na mes mi 'tshig go /dug gis kyang srog dang 'bral bar mi nus so/ /de ci lta zhe na/ bram ze chen po/ gang gi
tshe grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba na tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smra bar gyur to/ /de'i rig pa'i stobs des klu'i
rgyal po 'jog po bkug go /bkug nas kyang bag med pa'i dbang gis ma bcibs pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang / de tshor ba mi bzad pa myong nas ji ltar
yang bdag ni/ srog dang bral lo snyam du shes so/ /da nas smra ba can mang po bos kyang 'ga' tsam gyis kyang dug las gso bar ma nus so/ /de nas grong khyer chen po
bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na dge bsnyen ma dri ma med par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di kha ton du
shes so| |de de'i gnas su song ste phyin pa dang / rig pa chen po 'di brjod do/ /des de la lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis de dug med par byas shing de dran pa rnyed
par byas te sdug bsngal chen po de las yongs su thar par byas nas rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu de'i snying la
gnas par byas so/ /bram ze chen po/ gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su shes she na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangs su chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po
wA ra NA si na sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i tshe de'i shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te grong
khyer chen po wA ra NA si kun nas bskor nas gzhom par bshams so/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
kyis grong khyer 'phrog la thug na/ thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par bgyi bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang / rgyal pos khyed 'tsher 'grib
chung dur gyis shig /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba yod de/ ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o/ /thal ba bzhin
du bya'o| |zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po rnams kyi mgo btud de rgyal po chen po/ sngon bdag gis nam yang ma thos pa 'di ci zhig lags zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos
ngas de mngon sum du bya'o/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di
cho ga bzhin du bris te mgo'i gtsug gi skra'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig pus
dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te ji srid skyabs su dong ba de srid du 'dis tshar bcad nas stobs kyi 'khor los
bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu btang ngo / /bram ze chen po/ de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal po chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang phyag rgyas byin gyis
brlabs pa mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur to/ /snyam du gzung bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa
nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can tshe thung ba rnams dang / bsod nams chung ba rnams dang / longs spyod chung ba rnams la phan par 'gyur
bar blta'o/ /bram ze chen po/ gang la la zhig rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te lag pa'am/ mgul du btags na/ de de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i lus yin par rig
par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yin par rig par
bya'o| |de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o/ /de 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de mi shigs pa'i go cha can du rig par bya'o/ /de dgra thams
cad rab tu 'joms par rig par bya'o/ /de sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'joms par rig par bya'o/ /de sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yongs su shes pa yin te/ bram ze chen po/ phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong ma dad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslab pa 'dral ba/ ma
byin par len pa/ bza' ba 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi dang / tshogs rdzas su gyur pa de thams cad gang zag gir byin gyis brlabs te za ba zhig
dus gzhan zhig na nad tshabs chen pos btab pa dang / sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo / /nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin
to| |bram ze chen po/ de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so/ /thos nas kyang dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor
'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te dge slong de'i mgul du btags so/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams
cad ni| rab tu zhi/ nad thams cad las ni/ yongs su thar te sos par gyur nas de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste
'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /lus de bor ba dang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /de'i ro de yang dge slong dag gis sgang bu zhig la bzhag
go /rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnas so/ /dge slong de mnar med par der skyes ma thag tu sems can
dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis
tshim par gyur to/ /mtshams med pa'i me'i phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad ngo
mtshar skyes nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod do/ /sems can las las skyes pa yi/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad rab tu zhi/ /
shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha/ /sems dmyal nyam nga rnams na 'da'/ /sems can lus la rtag gnas pa'i/ /me ma mur de rab tu zhi/ /sog le rnams kyis gsheg
ma mchis/ /spu gri'i sos kyang gcod mi bgyid/ /lcags sdong shal ma ri yang chag /lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi/ /ral gri lo ma can nags na/ /las skyes lo
ma gnod mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod/ /mi rnams la ni chos kyis ston/ /rgyu 'di mi chung bdag cag la/ /khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /de nas
chos kyi bdag nyid can/ /chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des/ /snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnams kyi/ /'di 'dra'i tshig de thos gyur nas/ /myur du 'di ni ci yin smras/ /'di ni ci
'dra yang smros shig /de nas mi bzad gshin rje'i mi/ /gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /mnar med rab
tu nyam nga bar/ /sems can chen po 'di skyes lha/ /gang gi ming ni mnar med pa/ /des na de ni nyam ngar brjod/ /gang gis sems can bde bgyis pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
las la gzigs/ /'di ni kun tu bde gyur nas/ /slar yang lha yi gnas su mchi/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes kyang / /mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni/ /'di ni rdzu 'phrul
che ba ste| |'di ni tshe rabs lnga lus tshe/ /ji ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos/ /ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar/ /so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas/ /de yi lus ni de
bzhin mdzes/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ ji ltar na 'di so sor
'brang ba zhes bgyi/ chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis tshig rnams so sor dran/ /de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /so sor 'brang ba sgom pa yi/ /shes rab can
de bde 'gror 'gro /sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma khyod/ /rab tu rgyas dang ldan par dong / /der ni sgang bu mthon po la/ /lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos/ /de
mthong sems can thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems su 'gyur bar gyis/ /de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan par dong ngo / /de tshe
der ni de dag gis/ /rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na/ /sgang bu de yi khor yug na/ /'bar ba gcig gis gang bar mthong / /mi ro zhig gi mgul ba na/ /so sor 'brang
ba btags pa'ang mthong / /lha dang klu dang dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po mi 'am cis/ /kun nas 'khor bar bskor nas ni/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed/ /de la
gnod sbyin de dag gis/ /so sor 'brang ba'i sgang zhes btags/ /de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te slar log
nas lha| khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no/ /zhes rgyas par brjod do/ /de skad ces smras ma thag tu chig de smras pa'i tha ma la sems can chen po de sems can dmyal ba'i
lus de bor nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o/ /bram ze chen po/ des na sngon chad yongs
su shes so/ /de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya'o/ /yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags
nas bcad bar bya ste/ de rtag tu sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar
'gyur ro/ /glog gis 'gyel bar byed mi nus so/ /glog gis ji ltar mi nus she na/ bram ze chen po/ sngon yongs su shes te/ grong khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun
rdzi ba na tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba/ nor mang ba/ gser shin tu 'byor ba/ mdzod dang bang ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ ded
dpon zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas ded dpon chen po des gru bo che de rnyed nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya mid rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas rnam par
gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te 'brug sgra chen po sgrog go /glog dang skar mda' yang gtong ngo / /rdo rje'i lce 'bebs par yang
bshams so/ /de nas tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems non to/ /klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang / glog dang / skar mda' dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang /
nya mid de dag gis kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton to/ /de dag lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi
dpung gnyen du ma gyur to/ /de nas de dag tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad smras so/ /sems can
chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar par mdzad du gsol/ de nas ded dpon chen po sems brtan pa blo gros chen po des tshong pa
'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la tshig 'di skad smras so/ /ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong ba rnams/ /khyed cag brtan par dengs shig dang / /khyed rnams sdug bsngal
chen po yi/ /rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgral lo/ /de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas/ /tshong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smras/ /sems can chen po 'di ci lags/ /bgegs
bral myur du bka' stsol cig /blo gros chen po khyod kyi mthus/ /bdag cag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /slad na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ /de
nas mgron mang bdag po yis/ /de dag la ni tshig 'di brjod/ /de la so sor 'brang ba yi/ /rig pa chen mor grags pa yod/ /gnod byed thams cad sel bar byed/ /stobs
chen pha rol gnon byed pa/ /des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i/ /'jigs pa che las ngas bsgral lo/ /de nas ded dpon chen pos de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di bris nas rgyal
mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya mid de dag thams cad kyis gru bo che de
me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo / /de nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas mchod pa bya bar bshams so/ /nya mid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal
po so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhi bar gyur to/ /mgron po phal po che de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gling chen por phyin par
byas so| |de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po/
rgyu des na 'di rig pa chen mo zhes grags so/ /'di ni/ nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te bcad bar bya'o/ /rlung dang / grang ba dang /
dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / glog dang / lce 'bab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa las yongs su
thar par byed do/ /sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rung bar byed pa thams cad
mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ri dwags dang / bya dang / gcan gzan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang /
'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang / lo tog la sogs pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang / 'jam par 'gyur
ro| |legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char che ba dang / char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yongs su mi 'byung ngo / /char dus su 'bab cing / dus
ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /yul de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so/ /yul gang na rig pa'i
rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes par bya ste/ spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna
tshogs kyis mchod cing bsti stang byas la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang / rol mo sil snyan byas te/ bskor ba
byas nas lha rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i sems can chen po de dag gis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par
'gyur ro/ /cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du de lta de lta bur 'grub ste/ bu pho 'dod na'ang khye'ur 'grub/ /mngal na 'dzin pa dam par 'gyur/ /mngal na bde bar skye ba dang / /
mngal nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/ /mngal na dus bzhin skye ba dang / /dus bzhin rab tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ /cis mngon zhe na/ bram ze chen po/ snga ma bzhin du de
nyon cig /yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to/ /ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhes na/ rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa
brkyangs nas ma'i nu zho la bzung ste/ nu zho ngoms ngoms su 'thungs so/ /nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/ dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar gyur
to| |rgyu des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyur to/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal po'i gan du skye bo slong mo ba 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ rgyal
po de lag ba g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad
par du 'phags pa gser dang / nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do/ /rgyal po des kyang skye bo slong mo pa lhags pa rnams la rab tu byin no/ /bsam pa
tsam gyis slong mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byin to/ /bu pho 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod pa dang / bsti
stang cher byas kyang bu pho ma rnyed nas de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du bsti stang bya bar brtsams te/ mchod pa dang / bsti
stang chen po byas so/ /sbyin pa chen po byin to/ /bsnyen gnas la yang nye bar gnas so/ /bsod nams chen po byas so/ /sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi zad par
byin to| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze chen po/ sngon byung ba yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na gyad yul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer ku sha'i tshong dus chen po'i mchog na bcom
ldan 'das rin chen mang gi bstan pa la zhugs pa/ tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba chos sems pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de sems can thams cad
la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ma 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /de nas mi dbul po zhig gis chos de thos nas
tshong dpon chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu gla bgyi'o/ /chos kyang nyan no/ /gang gi tshe bdag gis cung zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag chos
la mchod pa bgyid do zhes smras nas de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyang nyan to/ /dus gzhan zhig na de la tshong dpon des di na ra gcig byin pa dang / des sems can
thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rin po che snyim pas so sor 'brang ma chen mo la
phul nas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba kun tu gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de skad kyang btab bo/ /rgyu
des na sbyin pa de yongs su mi zad par gyur to/ /de ltar bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma byas te lha rnams kyang mchod pa nas sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang / de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rmi ltas su bstan te 'di skad du kye rgyal po chen po/ so sor
'brang ma chen mo zhes bya ba kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo
rig pa'i rgyal mo cho ga las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du bris la/ btsun mo dam pa smyung ba byas la cho ga bzhin du lus la btags na khyod bu pho yod par 'gyur ro zhes
bsgo'o| |de nas rgyal po sad de mtshan mo zad nas rtsis dang / yi ge'i 'bru dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' rnam par 'byed pa'i bram ze rnams bsags nas cho ga
las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun mo dam pa lus shin tu legs par bkrus te smyung ba byas nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di yang
cho ga bzhin du bris te btsun mo dam pa'i mgul du btags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten rnams la mchod pa chen po byas so/ /rin po che khyad par can du ma
yang sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin no/ /de nas zla ba dgu lon pa dang / bu pho gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang pe/ rgyas pa
mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /bram ze chen po/ de ltar shes nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa/ 'dod pa thams cad
du 'gro ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa so sor 'brang ma chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so/ /'di ni/ rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug gi nor bu yin no/ /gang gi tshe lha'i dbang
po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang / g.yul chen po 'gyed par 'dod pa de'i tshe 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te lha ma yin thams cad pham par
byas| pha rol pham par byas nas dge ba dang bde bas bde bar lha'i grong khyer du 'jug ste/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin no/ /bram ze chen po/ de ltar
na sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di 'chang pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /'di
gang gis lus la btags sam/ mgul du btags pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad yang dag par srung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / mi dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du phyag
bya zhing mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos rjed cing mchod par 'gyur
ro| |bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pas kyang de la sems can chen po zhes gsungs so/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de la yams
kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can chen po de mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de la
lha thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun tu srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped par byed par 'gyur ro/ /des gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags chen po'i snying po 'di
dag bris te rtag par rgyun du lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya/ rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /kha ton du bya'o/ /bsam pa thag pa nas bsgom par bya'o/ /sdug
bsngal ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams
cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ gsang sngags gyi gzhi las thams cad byed pa dge ba rnams grub pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i te a mr-i ta ba re/ ba ra ba re/
pra b+ha re bi shud+d+he hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM a mr-i ta bi lo ki ni gar+b+ha sa ma rak+Sha Ni/ A kaR+Sha Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po'o/ /oM bi ma le bi bu le

dza ya ba re/ dza ya bA hi ni/ a mr-i te/ bi ra dze hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra saM d+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya ba la bi sho d+ha ni/ ru ru tsa le hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying
po'i rig pa'o/ /oM ma Ni d+ha ri/ badzri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams
cad thabs cig tu 'dus nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/ /gsang sngags 'di dag ni/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so
sor 'brang ma chen mo'i snying po dang go cha'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /'di thos par yang rab tu dka' na/ yi ger bri ba dang /
tshig tu 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan la yang ston pa lta ci smos te/ de ni/ sangs rgyas la bya ba byas par rig par bya'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags so/ /rjes su yi rang ngo / /lung bstan to/ /so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di mchog tu dkon pa'o/ /so
sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di'i ming thos par yang shin tu dka' ste/ gzungs chen mo 'di ni/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon
pa| gzi brjid che ba/ 'od che ba/ yon tan brjod par che ba/ mthu che ba/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
ba'i bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa/ pha rol gyi sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dug dang / byad dang / g.yeng byed kyi sbyor ba dang / gnod par bya ba dag drag shul du spyod pa
dang / gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la mchod pa dam pa
byed par mngon par dga' ba rnams la yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ theg pa chen po 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / tshig tu 'don pa dang / kha
ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang 'chang bar mngon par brtson pa rnams la yongs su skyong ba'o/ /bram ze chen po/ so sor 'brang ma chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di ni/
sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ gang du'ang thogs pa med do/ /ston pa dgra las rgyal ba ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du yang mchod
pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci mngon zhe na/ rig pa chen mo bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni/ sngon yongs su shes te/
gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang gser dang rin
po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang po mngon par sangs rgyas nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te/ sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bzhed pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de la bdud g.yog dang bcas pa bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas
bskor ba/ gzugs sna tshogs/ mi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ sgra mi snyan pa/ bdud kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis rlob pa
mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa mngon par sprul nas lhags te phyogs bzhi nas bskor te bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang gser dang rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung par bzhugs
nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di yid kyis lan bdun brjod do/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ma chen po 'di
brjod ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas skyes bu go cha gyon pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong du ma ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / tho ba dang / rtse gsum 'bar ba lag na thogs pa sha stag tshig 'di skad du/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la
gnod par byed pa bdud gnod sems can rnams zungs shig zungs shig /chings shig chings shig /gnod par sems pa thams cad rab tu choms shig /
gnod sems can dang / gza' dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi srog phye mar gyis shig ces 'dzer cing thon pa mthong ngo / /de nas bdud de dag
thams cad byams pa'i ral gris mngon par btul nas la las ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ba nas la la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar du'o/ /de la mthu che ba gzhan dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga nas thon pa'i skyes bu chen po de dag mthong
nas grong khyer de nyid du spa bkong bar gyur/ rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams/ spobs pa dang / stobs dang / rtsal med par gyur cing / mda' gzhu dag kyang chag nas byer ro/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud sdig can thams cad rab tu bcom nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor
lo rab tu bskor to/ /brgal to/ /pha rol tu rab tu gshegs so/ /bram ze chen po/ de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo stobs kyi drag shul che ba/ rdzu
'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pa tsam gyis sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams dang / gzhan gnod sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs
skrag pa thams cad las yongs su thar par byed do/ /bram ze chen po/ de lta bas na rtag par rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pas yid la bya'o/ /yi ger bris te rtag tu
lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o/ /ci mngon zhe na/ snga ma bzhin du nyon cig /rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi yul na grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal du mi zhig la
nyes pa byung nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gshed ma'i mi rnams la khyod kyis mi 'di sod cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal pos bsgo ba
bzhin du mi de khrid de ri sul zhig tu phyin nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste gsad par bshams pa dang / de'i tshe mi des rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor
'brang ba chen mo 'di yid la dran no/ /yi ger bris nas lag pa g.yas pa la btags shing 'dug go /sems can chen po de'i rig pa 'di'i mthus ral gri me lce
gcig tu gyur nas rdul gtor ba bzhin du dum bu dum bur gyur to/ /de nas gshed ma'i mi dag gis nges pa 'di rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad do/ /de nas rgyal po de rab
tu 'khrugs nas kye mi 'di dag sa phyogs shig na gnod sbyin gyi phug yod de/ de na gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po sha rje na za ba gnas kyi/ der khrid de 'or cig ces
bsgo'o| |de nas mi de gshed ma'i mi de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ma thag tu de nas gnod sbyin de dag thams cad yid
dga' ste mi sha bza'o snyam du brgyugs pa dang / de dag gis so sor 'brang ba 'di'i mthus mi de la me lce gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo / /
mthong nas kyang thams cad sdangs nas rang rang gi lus tshig par mthong ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas mi de khrid de sgo'i phyi rol tu bzhag
nas bskor ba bya bar brtsams pa nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas rgyal po cher 'khrugs te sdangs nas
gal te de ltar na khyed cag dengs la mi 'di chings te chur bor cig ces bsgo ba dang / gshed ma'i mi de dag gis khrid de chur bor ro/ /mi de chur bor ma thag tu mi
de ji ltar thang la 'dug pa bzhin du chu med par gyur to/ /chings pa de dag kyang dum bur chad do/ /rgyal pos de skad thos pa dang / de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas
mig tshugs su bltas te/ kye ma'o mi 'di ngo mtshar to/ /'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam du rnam par rtog par gyur to/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal po des mi de bkug ste/
kye mi khyod ci zhig shes zhes de skad smras so/ /mi des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'chang ba las/ gzhan ni/ ci yang ma 'tshal
te| lha/ de ni/ de'i mthu lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /rig pa chen mo dge bar gsungs/ /'chi bdag nan tur rmongs byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
byin gyis brlabs/ /sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol/ /nad dang sdug bsngal thar par byed/ /rig pa chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dus min 'chi las rab tu sgrol/ /
nad chen rnams ni zlog byed pa/ /mgon po thugs rje can gyis gsungs/ /de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so
sor 'brang ba chen mo la mchod nas mngon par bstod do/ /mi de yang blon thabs byin te rang gi gnyen gyi mdun du grong khyer gyi gtso bor dbang bskur to/ /bram ze
chen po| de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'dis thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po rnyed do/ /sems can gnod sems can thams cad kyis kyang
'gal bar mi bya'o/ /de ltar na/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di yongs su shes te gang du yang thogs pa med do/ /de lta bas na gdon mi za bar rtag tu lus la gdags
shing bcang bar bya'o/ /bram ze chen po/ /skar ma bzang po la cho ga legs par byas te rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di bri bar bya'o/ /de nas bram ze chen po de yid rab tu dga'
nas bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di'i cho ga ji ltar bgyis te bri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po/ /khyod nyon cig /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya/ /gang gis sems can bde byed cing / /nyam nga ba yi
las las 'grol/ /nad rnams las kyang thar bya dang / /bud med sbrum mar 'gyur ba dang / /sems can rnams kyi dbul ba yi/ /rma rnams gso bar bya phyir ro/ /bsnyen gnas dag la
gnas gyur nas/ /rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la/ /sangs rgyas mchod la brtson byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed/ /snying rjes kun tu brlan sems dang / /byams pa dang yang
ldan gyur nas/ /rtag tu sems can thams cad la/ /phan pa bskyed pa brtson par bya/ /tsan+dan dang ni gur gum dang / /gla rtsir bsres pa'i chus bkrus te/ /bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs
pa yi| |gos gtsang rnams kyis bgo bar bya/ /sa dang lci ba bsres pa yi/ /de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya/ /bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste/ /lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag /
de la rin thang chen po yi/ /me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol/ /tsan+dan spri ka de bzhin du/ /a ga ru dang du ru ka/ sha kha ra dang lnga sbyar ba'i/ /bdug pa cho ga bzhin du dbul//
cho ga ji bzhin dus bzhin bya/ /lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /me tog 'bras bu sa bon dang / /spos rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang / /
nas thug 'o thug la sogs pas/ /gtor ma'i bum pa dgang bar bya/ /mtshan ma shin tu bkra shis pa/ /phyogs bzhi rnams su gzhag par bya/ /lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus
su gzhag/ spos kyis bkang ba'i phur bu rnams/ /gra bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'gram logs su/ /seng ldeng phur bu bzhi
btsugs la/ /tshon skud kha dog sna lnga yis/ /'khor bar dam du dkri bar bya/ /gal te bdag 'grub 'dod na ni/ /bram ze de ltar byas nas bri/ /kha zas dkar po zos nas su/ /phan par
'dod pas bri bar bya/ /dar ram ras sam gro ga 'am/ /ci yang rung ba gzhan la bri/ /bud med dag la bu 'dod na/ /gi wang gis ni legs par bri/ /dbus su khye'u zhig bris nas
ni| |rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de bzhin rin chen gang ba'i snod/ /lag pa g.yon na thogs par bya/ /pad+ma rab tu rgyas gyur cing / /brgyan pa la ni de 'dug bya/ /nor
bu do shal gser dag dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /gdul bar shin tu dka' ba bri/ /gra bzhi dag tu ri bo bri/ /gal te bde bar 'tsho 'dod na/ /rab tu bsgrims
te de ltar bri/ /bye brag tu ni skyes pa rnams/ /gur gum gyis ni bri bar bya/ /de yi dgos pa 'dod pa rnams/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /pad+ma gnyis sam yang na
gsum| |bzhi 'am yang na lnga bris te/ /pad+ma la ni phyag rgya'i mtshan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su bri/ /de bzhin du ni pad+ma rnams/ /ze bas kun tu 'khor bar bri/ /pad+ma 'dab
ma rab rgyas la/ /sdong bu dar gyis bcings par bri/ /pad+ma la ni rtse gsum pa/ /zur brgyad la ni dar dbyangs bri/ /de bzhin pad+ma dgra star bcas/ /'dab ma brgyad dang ldan par bri/ /
