zhes mi 'dzin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs 'dzin par mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/ mtshan nyid du mi rtog /yongs
su mi rtog ste/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par ma yin/ 'gro bar ma yin/ 'gro ba med par ma yin/ 'chi 'phor ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ stong par ma yin/ mi stod
par ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ smon par ma yin/ smon pa med bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yin no/ /legs par gnas/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni/ ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa
zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing kun chub par byed la 'dzin te/ don dang tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi
'gyur ro/ /yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/ bden pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no/ /ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te/
bden pa'i chos dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no/ /gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o/ /rigs pa'i cho ga la
zhugs pa'o/ /legs par gnas/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so/ /mi 'chang ngo / /mi 'grol lo/ /legs par gnas/ gang gi tshe byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags/ mi 'chang / mi 'grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyis rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'thob bo/ /tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti/
ku tsa la/ e lA i mi ri to/ /ko thA la/ e re ri/ e mi ri Ni/ legs par gnas/ 'di dag ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no//
'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/ /legs par gnas/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni/
'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i don la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /legs par gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no/ /legs par gnas/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'jin pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes brnyes par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod par byas so/ /bsod
nams grangs med pa bskyed do snyam du shes par bya'o/ /su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab 'dod
pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang / thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ zla
ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sA lu'i chan dang 'o mar sbags te bza' 'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming gzhan
dag rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi mthus gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam/ nam
mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ yi dwags sam/ grul bum mam/ sha za'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga'
bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag tu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga'
bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su
bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa'am/ dgon par de la byin
gyis rlob par 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na lwa ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing de skad ces bka' stsal
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do/ /'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i zungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba
ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ya sho ba tI d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
grags ldan ma'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA

satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa re ma hA dz+wa re/ duHkhe muk+te su saM pa ne/ ma hA saM ban+ne/ saM bad ti/ ma hA saM bad ti/ ka se/ ma hA ka se/ kad tsha dz+wa ra mu ste si swAhA/ skud pa'am chu la lan gsum

bsngags na/ rims las thar par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ A R+ya ba
lo ki te shwa ra swAhA/ gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'am skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du bsngags te mdud pa gsum bar la bcings na/ bar du gcod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro//
na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ ni gi le swAhA/ 'bru mar la lan gsum bsngags te bskus na/ skran

'tsho'o| |na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ bi sa re bi sa re/ sa ra na sha ni swAhA/ shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas

na sos par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni se re ni se re/ ki la ni mi re/ ki la ri tsi rI/ pa tsi le swAhA/ lba ba
dang / lkog mI lha gor na ba dang / lce kyi ba na ba dang / gdon nad thams cad la 'jim pa la lan gsum du bsngags bskus na phan no/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya ba lo

ki te shwa rA ya/ brdza pa Ni d+h+ya ma/ oM oM krA rA pa b+hA pe/ b+ha ga pa ti bu D+D+he/ pra ti bu D+D+he/ pra ti bu D+D+he/ shu D+D+he/ shan+ti ki ri/ ha na ha na ma ma pA pa maM/ da ha da ha ma ma pA

pa daM/ pa tsa pa tsa ma ma pA pa kaM/ oM o De/ gra sa gra sa/ ri te De ri ta De/ shan+ti ka rI ya swA hA/ shu b+ha ka rI ya swA hA/ shu b+ha ka rI ya swA hA/ k+She ma ka rI ya swAhA/ rims nad kyis btab pa la bya pa byas
na| rims nad sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na/ nad pa sos par 'gyur ro/ /zas la sngags kyis btab ste zos na/ dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro//
'byung po dang gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te bcings na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs
rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dza ya ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge
slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas gnod gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa
dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rigs ngags kyir gyal
mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse bar dgongs te rig sngags kyi rgyal
mo rgyal ba can bka' stsal ba/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis rig sngags kyir gyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/ byin gyis
brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang yang da ltar 'chad pa 'di zungs shig/ tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ya ba ti ye/ bud+d+ha
a d+hiSh+Thi te d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ bud+d+ha a d+hi ka me dz+nyA na a ba b+ha se swAhA/ lag na rdo rje/ 'di dag ni/ de bzhi gshegs pas sbyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams
te| lag na rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i tshig 'di dag gang gi lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris pa de'i lus dpag tshad steng tshun chad du
phyir rgol ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so/ /rgyal po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi
'byung ngo / /phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der mthus gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rigs nags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can
'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / chu dang / rims dang / dug sbyar ma gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la dgra'i
'jigs pa dang / 'che ba dang / mtho 'tsham pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / 'thab mo'i nang du song yang
de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi phog /thams cad du yang nga rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur/ /gnod pa med cing ma snad la ma rmas par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang /

gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza yot+ta mi/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni bo d+ha

ni/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha ni/ o ro bya ni/ dza ya ku su me swa re sa ra ba ti/ dre D+he dri D+he dri D+he/ da dA dri d+ha pa sha ri bi d+he/ mo ha ni mo ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni/ staM b+hi ta/ sarba

a hi tiSh+Thi NaM/ na mo b+ha ga wa ti/ bud+d+h+ya s+ya/ ma hA kA ru NaM/ bi ha ri ni/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa da swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams

brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badzra pra ha ra/ pra ha ra bra ha ra/ b+har d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba

la| tsakra tsakra/ bI Da ya bI Da ya/ a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra me bi kra me/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga ta ri nI/ ni la ba ti/ badzra bra ha ra Ni/ badzra saM b+ha ba/ badzra ka ye/ b+hud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bud+d+ha

rasmi ma hA pra b+he/ u tsa gan+d+he/ ma hA te dza ba ti/ ma tsa le/ ba tsa le/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ ka ka kaM re/ kA si ni/ sa mA he ti/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hu g+hu De/ badzra mA lA d+ha ri/ sa ra sa
ra| ka la ba ri ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa ste/ su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal
ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'khus par 'gyur ro/ 'di lta ste/ lha'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dwags sam
sha za'am/ brjed byed dam/ gsod byed dam/ byad dam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa'am/ ma mo'i gdon tam/ gong ma'i gdon tam/ skem byed
dam| skem byed kyi gdon tam/ za ba'i gdon de dag thams cad rmugs par bgyi'o/ /rengs par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ ha na badzre/ ni ha na badzre/ khA da khA da badzre Na
s+phaT ya s+pha Ta ya s+pha Ta ya/ badzre Na/ e daM gr-ih+na/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang /
gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las srungs shig /dza ya ka ri/ dza yaM ku ru/ ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ta ra Ni/ ku Te ku Te
ku Te| badzra ku Te swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /lag na rdo rje/ legs so legs so/ /
lag na rdo rje/ sems can chen po khyod sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag tu song ste lus la btags sam/ glegs bam du bris sam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang
dam| 'chag sa na spyod par 'gyur ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas pas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul der srung bar 'gyur
ro| |yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs der mi ngas mi 'byung ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag
khrig phrag 'bum phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang lhan cig der srung ngo / /yongs su skyob bo/ /yongs su 'dzin to/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byed do/ /chad pa spong ngo / /mtshon cha spong

ngo / /dug gsod do/ /mi mdza' ba 'gog go /mtshams gcod do/ /sa bcing ngo / /tad+ya thA/ ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pra ta pa ni/ d+hu ru me d+hu ru ma/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ta/ mu khe mu khe/ su mu khe su mu khe/
spa la pra te/ sa mA hi te/ sa ma d+hi gar+d+he/ ma na si/ phu ru phu ru phu ru/ d+hu ru/ bud+d+ha mA na si ke swAhA/ lag na rdo rje/ 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /
gsang ba'i gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la
zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog
sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod
sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /mthus yul der 'jug pa dang / bgegs 'jug na yang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang / bgegs sna tshogs
stong byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur
bar bya'o/ /gang du g.yul ngor 'jug gam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/
der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi pus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyur ro/ /der ni/ rgyal bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal
bcan 'di su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal
te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi bzad ba chen po byung na/ der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / chog dang / gtor ma dang /
bum pa btud ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste rig sngags kyir gyal mo chen mo rgyal bcan 'di bklags na/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi
g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mings de rab tu zhi par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/ gzi brjid che ba'am/ rdzu
'phrul che ba'am/ mthu che ba gang yang ma mchis so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang dag tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i

gnas de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ a mr-i ta badzre/ dz+wa li ta badzre/ hu tA sha ni/ b+han dza b+han dza b+han dza b+han dza b+han dza/ dzaM b+ha/ staM b+ha ya/

sa ma sa gra ha Ni/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ g+h+ra sa g+h+ra sa g+h+ra sa/ phaT phaT phaT/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu me khu khu me/ g+hi ri g+hi/
ri g+hi ri/ badzra ma sA si/ badzra hu te/ hu ti ru/ phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba a hi te Shi naM/ nA b+hu ru Ni/ mu mu le/ badzra pra dI pa ni/ tsa ma le phu swAhA/ a yu

bA la ni tsu tsu re swAhA/ dza ya dza ye dza ye/ dza ya saM b+ha b+ha swAhA/ dza yot+ta me swAhA/ dza ya ba re de swAhA/ dza ya la d+ha ne swAhA/ dza ya mA na si swAhA/ dza ya badzra swAhA/ dza ya ta badzra ya
swAhA| ma hA badzra hu ta sha nA ya swAhA/ a mo g+ha badzra ha stA ya swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la srung ba stsal bar bgyi/
yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug dgum pa dang / mi mdza' ba dgag pa dang / dus ma yin par 'gum pa dgag
pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ /mtshams dgum

par bgyi'o/ /t+d+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mI lI mA na si/ dz+he dz+he dz+he/ mu ru mu ru/ tu Tu tu Tu/ mu mu le/ mArga ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ be ga be ga d+hA ri NI/ te dza ba ti/ bdag
dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs
kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+he ba ti/ bud+d+ha a

ba b+ha sa ni/ d+harma ba ti/ sa mA hI te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ bud+d+ha a ba b+ha sa ni/ bud+d+ha pa ri hi ri/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni swAhA/ su la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di
las 'da' bar bgyid pa de'i mgo si ta ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod
par bgyid dam/ yi ger 'bri 'am/ glegs bam la bris te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog
na| der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i slad bzhin du 'brangs te bsrung
bar bgyi'o/ /dpag tshad brgyad stong tshun chad mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/ /slar rgol ba dang / dgra dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab
mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu la
legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po/ legs so legs so/ /sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba
dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal pa can 'dis gang yongs
su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / byad dang / gsod byed dang / rims dang / gdon thams cad kyis
mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
chen mo rgyal ba can 'di zungs shig /chongs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig /lag na rdo rje/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i
dus na sems can drag shul can dang ldan pa/ shin tu mi bzad pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung
bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul 'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyir gyal mo rgyal ba can 'dis sems can mi mnyam pa dang / sems can mi
bzad pa de dag dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/ tshar gcod par 'gyur/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi
dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /
rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ de'i phyir khyod kyis de
bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang
zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags ba rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
rdzogs so// //rgya gar skar du/ AR+ya dza ya pa ti nA ma ma hA bid+yA rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe
'byung po rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas ma dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum rnams 'khrugs shing khros te dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams
gang dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa de dag la gnod par byed de/ de'i tshe ku co'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs
rje chen po'i shugs kyi sa yang dag par zin nas phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi nas glog las ser ba dang / char chen 'bab pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba
'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la brda mdzad do/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang gtum po khros te stan las langs nas shar phyogs su rdo rje 'bar ba stong mngon par
sprul te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bya'o/ /da ltar
dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung po gtum po mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog dag kyang ma rungs par byed pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gi don gyi phyir ngas rig

pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ gi ri gi ri badzra/ ha la ha la badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ sarba b+hu tA nA ma/

b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ b+ho b+he badzra d+ha ra badzre Na/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ dz+wa la ya/ nA ga b+ha ba nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/
shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje snying po 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /su zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa'i mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur ro//

snying 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /snying 'grum par 'gyur ro/ /badzrA ya swAhA/ ma hA badzrA ya swAhA/ badzra b+hai ra wA ya swAhA/ a pra ti ha ta ba la ba rA kra mo badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ de
nas rdo rje khro bo stan las langs te lho phyogs su rnam par bltas nas khros te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ deng nyid lho phyogs kyi klu thams cad thal bar brlag bo/ /lus srul po thams cad kyi bar gyi gnas rnams 'bar bar bya'o/ /klu thams cad kyi
gnas rnams dkrug par bya'o/ /yang smras pa/ gsang pa pa'i bdag po/ bdag gis rdo rje lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad dang / mi dang
mi ma yin gyi bar thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rengs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rmongs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ lce 'bab par byed pa'i rdo rje/ mgo 'gems par byed pa'i
rdo rje| snying 'gas par byed pa'i rdo rje 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na klu gnod par sems pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur

ro| |tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ A bar+d+hA ya/ saM go tsa la/ hUM hUM hUM/ d+ho na d+ho na d+ho na/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ sarba pA she na/ mo ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/
ha sa ha sa ha sa/ san trA sa ya/ sarba duSh+TA nAn badzra d+ha ra A dz+nya pa ya ti swAhA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ /da ltar
dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag gis kyang nub phyogs kyi klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad

kyi gnas rnams rnam par gtor ro/ /snying rnams dgrum mo/ /tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ li li mi li/ tra Ta tra Ta/ b+ha Ta b+ha Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya/ du ting yan sho Sha ya
gang zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ kye mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar ba 'dis de'i snying la me lce 'bar bar byed do/ /hUM hUM hUM/ badzra d+ha ri badzra Na/ b+haM dza

b+haM dza/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ badzra dU ti rA dzA pa ya ti swAhA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa stan las langs nas byang phyogs su rnam par bltas te gsang
ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras sa/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa bdag gis kyang byang phyogs kyi klu gnod par sems pa nas lus srul
po gnod par sems pa'i bar dag la zlog par bgyid do/ /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog kyang ma rungs par bgyid

pa de dag gi don gyi slad du gsang sngags kyi gzhi mi bzad pa dag kyang brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha
ma tha| ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha ha/ badzra dU ti mo ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ sar+b+ba nA gA nAM/ sarba a hi te Sha no/ badzra

Ni bud+d+ha mai tri/ d+harma sa t+ye naM/ in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ in+d+ra ba le na/ lo ka pA la/ pra d+hA be na/ dzam+b+ha ya mi/ sarba nA ga na stem+b+ha yA mi/ sarba i ha te Sha no/ ba ru Na pA she na/ b+han+d+ha yA mi/
sarba nA gA na in+d+ra tsi le na/ sarba i he he Shi Na che ga li ka ro mi/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ badzra shriM kha le swAhA/ ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te me tog bkram
la| a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te kha shar phyogs su bltas la bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o/ /de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu las gang
'dod pa de bya'o/ /skud pa nag pos ni/ rims nad sel to/ /shing kA ra bI ra'i lcug mas ni/ sprin zlog go/ /chu'i nang du 'dug na ni/ dran par bya'o/ /gcan gzan khro bo'i
nang na 'dug na ni/ gos kyi mtha' mar mdud pa bor ro/ /lto spos na ni/ tshwa chus zhi bar byed do/ /so na ba la skud pas zhi bar byed do/ /sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya me
tog re re nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor ro/ /nyi ma bdun na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA
yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/ a pra ti ha ta pa la pa rA kra ma ye/ na maHsarba badzra ku la bid+yA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun
du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo pos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste sems can thams cad la sman pa'i don dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du
de bzhin gshegs pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la
thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ ngas kyang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bya

ba'i phyir bshad kyi/ khyod kyis zungs shig /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza ya pA ha nI ye bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ d+harma a ba b+ha se ni/ bud+d+ha a d+hi ga me dz+nyA a ba b+ha se swAhA/
lag na rdo rje/ 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs
pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gang gi lus la yod pa dang / glegs bam la yod par gyur ba de'i lus la phyir rgol ba rnams kyis
dpag tshad brgya tshun chad gnod par byar mi chud do/ /mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad kyis mi tshugs so/ /mi'i bdag po de'i yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
mi 'ong ngo / /yul 'khor de'i phyir rgol ba'i dpung gis mi chud par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu gang la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can
'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la dug dang / mtshon dang / chu dang / dbyig dang / sbyar ba las byung ba'i dug gzhan gyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /dgra'i
'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de la rnam par 'che ba dang / mtho 'tsham pa mi 'byung ngo / /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /g.yul ngor zhugs
na yang lus la mtshon gyis mi phog go /thams cad du rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzi brjid dang / mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs

kyis thogs pa med cing ma snad ma rmas par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza yot+ta me/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/

ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha Ni/ a ba ro ha Ni/ a ba A ba ro s+ya ni/ dza ya ku su ma/ swa re swa re ba ti/ dr-i D+he dr-i D+he dr-i D+he/ dr-i D+ha pA sha ni dat+te/ ma ha ni mo ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni dzam+b+ha ni/

stam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha ni/ dzaM b+hi ni dzaM b+hi ni/ mo ha ni sarba hi tai Shi nAn/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bud+d+ha s+ya ma hA kA ru Na/ bi hA ri Ni/ sid+d+h+yan+tu ma man+t+ra pa da ni swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / bdag gis kyang rig sngags

kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badzri Ni/ pra ha ra pra

ha ra| d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ pI Da ya pI Da ya/ a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra me/ a tsa la/ ma tsa

le| kha ga tsA ri Ni/ nI la b+ha sa ni/ badzra pra ha ra Ni/ badzra saM b+ha be/ badzra ki li/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bud+d+ha rash+mi/ ma hA pra b+ha be/ ud tsa skan+d+he/ ma hA te dza ba ti/ a le pa tsa li/ d+hu na d+hu na/
kaM ka kaM ka raM/ ka si ni/ sa a hi te/ d+ha rma a ba b+hA sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hu g+hu te/ badzra mA lA d+ha ri/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ kA la tsA ra Ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das
gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gzungs pa lags te/ gang dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di
las 'gal bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'khu ba lags so/ /'di lta ste/ lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi
dwags sam/ sha za'am/ grul bum mam/ grib gnon dam/ brjed byed dam/ gshed byed dam/ byad dam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa'am/ ma mo'i gdon nam/
gong du yang gdon gzhan nam/ skem byed kyi gdon nam/ gshin rje'i gdon yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/

badzre badzre badzre/ ha na badzri Ni ha na badzri Ni/ khA da khA da khA da badzri Ni/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ badzro Na i daM ga ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pA ta ya
pA ta ya pA ta ya/ d+ha me d+ha me/ d+hu d+hu me/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / g.yul dgyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang /
'gyed pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig/ rgyal bar mdzod cig /ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ba ta ra Ni/ ku Te ku Te/ mu ku Te/ badzra ku Te swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje/ legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang /
bde bar bya ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di smras pa ni/ sems can chen po lag na rdo rje/ khyod yang legs so/ /lag na rdo
rje| rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag na yod pa dang / lus la yod pa dang / glegs bam la yod pa dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs
sam| rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa'am/ dgon pa'i gnas na yod pa der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog
dang 'khor du bcas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul de la srung bar byed bar 'gyur ro/ /yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo / /mi ngas mi 'ong ngo / /dgra mi 'byung
ngo / /sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas te grong ngam/ grong khyer dang / yul de la srung bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /yul der pha rol gyi
dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan
cig tu rgyu zhing der srung ba dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /
chad pa spong ba dang / mtshon cha spong ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / dug gzhig pa dang / mi mdza' ba zlog pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing

bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ ta pa ne/ ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ d+hu ru me/ d+hu ru me/ mahA d+hu ru me/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu khe mu khe su khe/ swa la pra te sa mA
d+hi sa ma di gar+b+he/ ma na si/ phu ru phu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bud+d+ha ma na si ke swAhA/ lag na rdo rje/ 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /gsang ba'i gnas
so| |de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis
rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la yod par byas te 'chang ngam/ spos dang / phreng ba dang /
byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnams kyis de la bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing mchod na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu mi'i rgyal po de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing / phyi rol rgol ba thams cad las srung bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i bdag po dbang po de la
dgra dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /yul der pha rol gyi dpung mi 'jug go /'jug na yang de dag la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs byed par
'gyur te bgegs sna tshogs brgya dag dang / bgegs sna tshogs stong dag byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de dag gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du gzhag par bya'o/ /gang du g.yul 'gyed dam/ chen po dang 'thab pa der yang rig sngags
kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/ der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de la gnod pa
'dis gnod pa byed do/ /de phan par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di su'i mgul du thogs pa de ni/ rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje
grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang du nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi
bzad pa chen po byung ba der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di la me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bres la gtor ma'i cho ga gzhong khung bzhi ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bkang
ste phyogs bzhir bzhag la/ de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags nas der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te
gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po
lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di'i god na rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/ gzi brjid che ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'am/
mthu che ba ni/ gang yang ma mchis te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog lags so/ /yul gang dag tu spyod par

'gyur ba'i gnas dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre/ a ti ta badzre/ dz+wa li ta badzre/ hu ta sha ni/ b+haM dza b+haM dza/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dzam+b+ha dzam+b+ha/

stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ sarba dush+ta gra hA NA ma/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu

re/ khu khu re/ khu khu re/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri/ g+ho ri/ g+ho ri/ badzra mA na si/ badzra hUM ti/ phu ru phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ sarba a hi te shi nAn/ su ru me/ mu mu

le/ badzra pra ti pa ti/ sarba ba le phu swAhA/ a lu pa la ni tsu tsu re swAhA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ye sam+b+ha pa swAhA/ dza yot+ta me swAhA/ dza ya ba re te swAhA/ dza yaM d+ha re swAhA/ dza ya ma ni swAhA/ dza
ya badzra ya swAhA/ a dzi te badzrA ya swAhA/ ma hA hu ta sha nA ya swAhA/ a mo g+ha badzra ha tA ya swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
srung ba stsal bar bgyi ste/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha
spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa
dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza yi dza

ye dza ye| ma hA dza ye/ mi li mi li/ ma na si/ dz+hu dz+hu dz+hu/ dz+hu ru ma/ mu ru mu ru/ tu Tu tu Tu tu Tu/ mu lu le swAhA/ mArga ba tI d+hu d+hu me be ge /be ge d+ha ri Ni/ te dza ma ti/ 'jigs pa
dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs kyi gsang
sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha bud+d+he bud+d+he/ pA ti/ bud+d+ha/
a ba b+hA sa ni/ d+harma ba tI/ sa ma hi te/ d+harmA d+ha gar+b+ha/ bud+d+ha bi ha re/ d+harmA a ba b+ha sa ne swAhA/ gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar
bgyid na/ de'i mgo si ta ka bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
kun chub par bgyid pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang du glegs
bam gnas par bgyid na/ der tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'chang de'i slad
bzhin 'brang zhing dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang / dgra rnams las thams cad du bsrung ba dang / mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag
khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po/ legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse
ba dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni/ sems can chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa khyod yang legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba
can 'dis su la srung ba byas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so//
dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad dang / gshed byed dang / rims nad nas gdon thams cad kyi bar gyis de la mi tshugs so/ /pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi
'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis rig
sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di zungs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /lag na rdo rje/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya
pa tha ma dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe gnod sbyin dang / srin po mdangs 'phrog pa drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa shin tu mi bzad pa dang / chos ma yin
pa'i rgyal po tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ /de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems kyi rgyud mi mnyam
pa| mi bzad pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag dang / sems can sdang ba thams cad kyi don dang / tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can
bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs te phyag rgyas
btab pa yin no/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po
lag na rdo rjes 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
lag na rdo rje/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya zhes bya bar zungs shig /rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba
can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po
lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid
rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi
mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phag pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ma yU ra bid+yA gar+b+he nA ma/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgras 'jigs pa'am/ 'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs pa'am/ bgegs kyis 'jigs pa'am/
dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs ba'am/ sbrul gyis 'jigs pa'am/ gcan gzan gyis 'jigs pa'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa'am/ mes 'jigs pa'am/
chus 'jigs pa'am/ rlung gis 'jigs pa'am/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/ bad
kan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'am/ gdon gyis zin tam/ rims kyis btab pa'am/ dug 'thungs sam/ nad thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na 'di yid la
bya'o| |na mo b+ha ga ba te/ iT+Ta ya/ in+d+ra go mi si kA ya/ A sha ne/ pA sha ne/ pA pa ni ku le/ ka pi la mit+te/ i li mi t+te swAhA/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par
gyur cig /nA rA ya Ni/ pA rA ya Ni/ ha ri ta/ tA li/ kun+tA li/ i li mi sti/ ki li ti li mi sti swAhA/ rig sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig /ha ha/ hi hi/ hu hu/ kha
rA/ ma rA/ khA hi/ kha hi/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swAhA/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
brjod de/ gtor ma ri chen po la gtang bar bya'o/ /des thams cad zhi zhing phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
AR+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA dru ra NI bid+yA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgron ma mchog gi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis
brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang mi 'bum phrag du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te yongs su bskor cing
mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol ma mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa des byang chub sems dpa'
'od chen po dang / 'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzed 'dir gtang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed
kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
khrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol ma mchog
ces bgyi ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol
ma mchog des bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas sgrol ma mchog de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang / bde ba dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la
reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/ /'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo / /'di na mi'am/ mi ma lags pa'am/ 'byung po'am/ sha za ram/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ grul
bum mam/ grul bum gyi sde dpon nam/ rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po'am/ chom rkun nam/ sbrul lam/ srin bu'am/ srin bu lu ta'am/ sbrang bu lcags kye'am/ nye ba'i nyon mongs
pa gang rung bdag 'tsho bar bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes gsung ngo / /sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi
brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /
bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol ma mchog des gzungs kyi gsang

sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang bskur te/ 'di lta ste/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le ga te/ hug+gu/ mug+gu/ saM ma te/ ma hA sa ma te/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa ba la me/ sa he sa he/ ma hA dz+wa le/ ug+ge mug+ge/ sha
me| saM ma te/ mahA saM ma te/ ma hA sha me swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi
'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/
sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang
shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ni/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma
gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang
sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni/ de dag
thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa stan las langs te gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang sems
can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan
par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod

par bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ at+te/ bat+te/ nat+te/ ku nat+te/ pu ka se/ ku pu ka se/ ka se/ a na ka se/ nA ma ka se/ a nu ta/ pra nu ta/ kha dze ma hA kha dze/ sad ba phe/ ta Ta phe| nyu Ta phe/ hi li mi li
ti le swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /longs
shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs
kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bcu gnyis su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa
thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs
rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs pa ste/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni/ de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no//
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang /
bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang
ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /de 'di lta
ste| ak+khe/ bak+khe/ nA dzi te/ nA gA sa re/ na hi le/ dza hi le/ dza ha li ba te/ tsa Na DA li ba te swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo/ /khyod gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston
cig /kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag
'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang
ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bcu gsum du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi
las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags
kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de
ni| de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngas kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa
dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang / stobs dang ldan
par bya ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad do/ /'di lta ste/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ naT+Te/
ku naT+Te| Ta ke/ e Ta ke/ ta ta Te/ tu Da be/ ra Ta ke/ lo le/ hu le/ hi le/ mi le/ ti le/ shI le shI le/ aD+he/ baD+he/ naD+he/ ku naD+he/ a Da ba tI/ pa na ba tI/ ka se ka se ka se/
pha se pha se pha se/ ma hA pha se pha se swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags
kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas
'byung brnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ston pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o//
kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
byed ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bcu bzhir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi sa ma gtogs par gzhan gyi
gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba
phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni/ de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag shing skam po gsher bag med pa la srung ba byas te yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba
dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas na/ shing de la lcu gu dang / lo ma dag kyang skye bar 'gyur te/ me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams kyang mngon par 'grub
par 'gyur na/ mir gyur pa lta ci smos/ na maHsarba bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ sid+d+h+yan+tu d+hA ra NI/ man+t+ra pa da ni swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags
pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir
gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya'o/ /de 'di dag ste/ at+te/ mat+te/ pa ke/ pA ra ke/ pe ke DA/ dra ma ti/ ta ra ma ti/ tu Da ma ti/ Tu Da ma Ti/ Tu Da Tu
re/ su re| hi li/ mu le/ ti le swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags
kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ sangs
rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o//
kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi
gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs
nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes
su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig la srung ba byas na/ de la yang 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / /mi
mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /sbrul dang / srin bu dang / srin bu lu ta dang / sbrang bu lcags phyi thams
cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /rims dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / dus tshigs 'gyur ba las byung ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /zhag gcig
pa'am/ zhag gnyis pa'am/ zhag gsum pa'am/ zhag bzhi pa'am/ zhag bdun pa'am/ zla ba phyed ba'am/ zla ba gcig pa'am/ lo gcig pa'am/ nad rgyun ring ngam/ skad
cig pa rnams kyis mi tshugs/ 'bras sam/ phol mig gam /rkang shu'am/ lhog pa'am/ me dbal lam/ shu ba'am/ khyi rdo'am/ g.yan pa'am/ mdze
thams cad dam/ lhog pa thams cad dam/ gshed byed thams cad dam/ sgyur ba'i las thams cad dam/ byad thams cad dang / ro langs thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs
so/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni/ de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug na
yang yid la bya'o/ /chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /srin po'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /gcan gzan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /'brog
dgon pa'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /klung dang bgrod dka' ba na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /me'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /chu'i nang na 'dug na yang yid
la bya'o/ /de yid la byas pa de rnams las 'jigs pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /dug zos pa thams cad kyang kha zas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi
gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /yi dwags thams cad dang / srul po thams cad dang / gshed byed thams cad dang / sgyur
ba'i las thams cad dang / byad thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/ kun dga' bo/ mdor na/ de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs
so/ /kun dga' bo/ gsad pa'i rigs pa ni/ chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/ /chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni/ brdegs pas/ brdegs pa'i rigs pa ni/ brgyad pas/ brgyad pas
rigs pa ni/ bsdigs pas/ bsdig pas rigs pa ni/ mig tshugs su bltas pas thar par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis gang
la srung ba byas pa'am/ yongs su bskyab pa byas pa'am/ yongs su bzung bas bcings pa'am/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas
med de| lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang
na yang ngas ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byi
gyis brlab pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ci nas
kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang / bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis de la legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas
gnang ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de ni/ 'di lta
ste/ de na D+De/ de naD+De/ ma hA naD+De/ dzam+b+ha ne/ stam+b+ha ne/ Ta Te/ Ta Ta ne/ ma hA Ta Ta ne/ kuT+Te/ kuT+Te ne/ ma hA kuT+Te ne/ d+harma le/ tsa ma le swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di dag ni/
gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur gda' ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / bzlas te bton nas
'chang ba de ni/ sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /de la ni/ dam pa'i chos
thams cad yongs su gzung ba la yang bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la grogs po dag /khyod bstan pa
yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo khyod kyis de dag rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /longs shig /chongs
shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis bzung lags
so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gzungs sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyis gsungs pa ste/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/ /'dzin tam yang na klog byed pa/ /tshe rabs
nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la/ /mi min gang yang rung ba dang / /gnod sbyin grul bum srin po
dag /nam yang bar chad mi byed do/ /gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la/ /'dod khams dbang phyug gang yin pa/ /sdig can bdud de nam du yang / /bar chad byed par mi
'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sngags 'di 'dzin byed de'i/ /pha ma dang ni phu nu dang / /sring mo mdza' bshes gnyen dag kyang / /log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir gzungs
sngags mdo sde 'di/ /'jigs pa med gang gis thos gyur nas/ /gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed pa des/ nam yang 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de
yis| |bskal pa bye bstod rnams su/ /sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa/ /zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang / /bskal pa bye
bar bsgrubs pa kun/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed pa des/ /zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis non/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba po/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag /lus
ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung / /mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /'khor bcas blon bcas de dag kyang / /gzungs sngags 'di ni
rjod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu srung bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
'phags pa byams pa dang / /'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags ma rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs
so|| //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ASh+Ta de bi d+hA rA NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum sdig pa thams cad byang par mdzad ma/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad ma/ bgegs thams cad
rab tu 'jigs par mdzad ma/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mdzad ma/ gzungs sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo mchog 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu

khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ he bu d+hi mA ta ni/ sarba pA pa na sha ni/ gardza gardza/ b+han dza b+han dza/ marda marda/ ga ma ri ga ma ri/ ha sa ha sa/ da ma da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ bi d+h+wa na sa ya bi d+h+wan
sa ya| sarba sha truM ta ra ma ti/ bi ma le/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pra ti dz+nyA na/ sarba bud+d+ha baR+yu ba si ti/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ga na ga na/ dza hi dza hi/ bi ma sa ni/ kra
ma Ni d+ha ba ni d+ha ba ni ra ma Ni mA tang+gi ge swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu

khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ a ma ri/ a ma ri/ ta Ta/ b+han dza b+han dza/ dz+ha dz+ha/ mi tsi mi tsi/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ dur dAn+ta da ma ka swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu

khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ he he/ ki na de/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha ne ke /b+ho d+hi na dad/ trA Ta trA Ta/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gardza gardza/ ba ra ma ti/ bi hU ri ke swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba

mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ b+ha ga wa ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi te a/ sarba pA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri dz+nyA na artsi s+pha ra Ni/ b+han dza b+han dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ A na ya A na ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra

ya mA ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha/ dza ni trA ye swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ gardza gardza/ ma tha ma tha/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ b+han dza b+han dza/ dun+tu b+hi/ sarba ni ra g+ho She/
ha na ha na/ bi d+h+wan sa ya bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi phu la ni rma la nirdza te/ A ha ra A ha ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sarba bud+d+ha paR+yu ba si ti ma/ ma bi lam+ba

swAhA| bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM b+ha ba ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta dza ni ke /pU ra ya

pra ti dz+nyA na/ ta Ta ta Ta/ marda marda/ A ha ra A ha ra/ hUM hUM dza ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba

thA| hUM hrIHsarba bud+d+ha mA ti ri/ b+han dza b+han dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma ni da ma ni/ gargA ri gargA ri hrI swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/

sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ trA ta trA ta/ mu hu mu hu/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/

sarba thA/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ mo Ta mo Ta/ da ha da ha/ sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na nardza te swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma gdul dka' ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ ha
ha mi hu mi hu/ da ma da ma/ khA hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi mi tsi/ dur tAn+ta na da ma ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maH

sarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ gardza gardza/ spo Ta ya spo Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
so| |'jam dpal/ ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gi lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang bral
bar 'gyur/ de gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis
mi tshugs par 'gyur/ chom rkun gyis chom par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur/ de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur/
rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ de'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig
bzhin mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/
gang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mi gtong bar 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de sang na song gi sgo rnams bcad par 'gyur
ro| |des ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings par 'gyur/ gang zhig gnang par langs nas su/ /lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi/ /srid pa nyam ngar gang byas pa/ /sdig pa kun
las grol bar 'gyur/ /srin po la sogs chom rkun dang / /mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing / /dus min 'chi las rab tu thar/ /rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi
tshe na yang / /ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas/ /bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste mngon par bstod do/ /'phags ma lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo

tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+ha ra NI kalpa sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang
bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sdug bsngal ba
nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba yod de/ de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi
mtshan| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni/ tshe ring
bsgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba

trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+Ta ya bud+d+hA ya ta na maH/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he/

uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga taHsu ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/ a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/ ma hA mu dra man+t+ra pa daiH/ A ha ra A ha ra/ ma ma A yuHsan+d+ha ra NI/ sho d+ha ya

sho d+ha ya| bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha sra rasmi sany+tso di te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA a wa lo ki ni/ Sha T+pA ra mi ta pa ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga

tA mA te da sha b+hu mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga tA hraM da ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu de mu dre/ mahA mu dre/ badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/ ba ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/ pra ti ni brta ya/ ma

ma A yur bi shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ ta thA ta/ b+hU

ta ka Ti| pa ri shud+d+he/ bi s+phu Ta/ bud+d+he shud+d+he/ he he/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ sma ra sma ra/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badzre

badzra| mahA badzra/ su badzre/ badzra gar+b+ha/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badzra dz+wa la gar+b+he/ badzra ud b+ha be/ badzra saM b+ha be/ badzre badzri Ni/ badzram+b+ha ba tu/ ma ma sha ri raM sar+b+ba satwa nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shud+d+ho r+b+hab

tu| ma sa dA sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud+d+hish+tsa/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa mA shwA sa yan+tu/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi me tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha

ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa man+tA mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ sa man+ta rasmi pa ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te/ mu dre mu dre/ ma hA mu dre ma hA
mu dra man+t+ra pa daiHswAhA/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni/ 'chi bdag chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste/ dag byed sdig
pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga'am gzhan zhig la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na/
mchog gi tshe dang / blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni/ lo bdun thub bo/ /lo bdun pa'i tshe ni/ lo bdun cu thub bo/ /de ltar mchog gi tshe
'thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcangs na/ nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /
gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzungs bris te tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te rang khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba
stong gi mchod pas mchod cing zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na/ nad las grol zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /nad med na/ 'dam
bu'i rang bzhin la yang bya'o/ /yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten la bris la rdo rje phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi
tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol la/ rang gi khyim du bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pa byas na/ rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /
gzhan yang cho ga ni/ sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/ a ga ru dang du ru
ka'i bdug pa byas la/ de bzhin du dri'i chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar pos brgyan te gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol
la| de la g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste g.yas pa'i lag pas phreng ba 'dzin pas/ nyi ma re re zhing nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la de'i chu khyor ba
gsum 'thungs na/ nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra yongs su nyams pa dang / 'dzin blo rno ba dang / ngag btsun par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /
de'i chus khang pa dang / phyugs kyi ra ba'am/ rta'i ra ba'am/ rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na/ rkun po dang / sprul dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung
zhing / nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro/ /mgo la gtor na/ nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon chen po'i
gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar na/ de dang der zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'chos na/ nad med pa dang / blo rno ba dang / tshe
ring bar 'gyur ro/ /chu khyor ba gsum dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs na/ nad thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho
bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor
ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bgyi/ sku gzugs la sogs pa sgrub pa ji ltar bgyi/
'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ba legs par smras pa ni/ /dpa' bo chen po legs so legs/ /sems can kun la phan
brtse'i phyir/ /'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM a mr-i te/ a mr-i tot+b+ha be/ a mr-i ta bi krAn+te/ a mr-i ta gA te/ a mr-i ta gA mi ni/
a mr-i ta A yurda te/ ga ga na kIrti ka re sar+b+ba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri ye swAhA zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa blang ba dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs
gdags pa'i bar ji srid rdzogs par bya'o/ /'di'i cho ga ni/ mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /gser dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / pad+ma rA ga la
sogs pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/ de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /
me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri lag na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lag na gdugs thogs pa dang / g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs
gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang / rdo rje 'chang gnyis rda yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa bya'o/ /de lta bu'i cho gas mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bri
bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la/ de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas la dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chu
gtor zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa chen po byas te dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la smyung bar gnas shing /
sems can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong brag gcig bzla bar bya'o/ /zla ba re re zhing byas na/ zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu
lo gcig tu byas na/ tshe lo 'bum thub par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu byas na/ tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang / gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang / lha ma yin dang bcas mi
mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug gtor mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni/ rab tu dge ba'i gnas su sa blangs la dri zhim pos bsres la mchod rten bya'o/ /stong phrag
gcig nas brtsams te ji srid lnga'am gcig gi bar du'o/ /nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/ ji skad
gsungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o/ /nyi ma re re zhing tshe dang blo ster bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi ched du
byas te sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can rnams la bcing ba dang / brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o/ /zla ba gzhan re re la mchod
pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa byas pa ni/ rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o/ /cho ga 'dis ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur ro/ /blo rno ba dang / nad med pa
dang / tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus
bor te mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang de ni/ dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror skye bar
