gdab bo/ /mi'i las kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /log 'dren gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /
gzhon nus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas
pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' lding yang dag pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang
rtsir byed pa dang / grub par byed pa dang / don kun sgrub pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /bring gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / smin drug
gi bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral
gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byas pa'i rig sngags
ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas
pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gang dang gang du byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gang gis byed du bcug pa des byas pa'i
rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /pho nya dang pho
nya mo dang / bran pho dang bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /drang srong gi mchog thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo
rje phur bus gdab bo/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags
ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /oM bcom ldan 'das ma bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad
'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang phyir rgol ba'am/ mi mdza' ba'am/ mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad las srung du gsol/ srung du
gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ me dang nyi ma

ltar 'od gsal zhing dkar ba rgyas pa mnga' ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM dzra la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /khA da khAd/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ bin+da bin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT

swAhA/ sarba duSh+TAn hUM drUM/ sarba du rlaM gi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba durlaM hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur+ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba di ga b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur+b+hu k+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur+ts+tshad+d+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a ba d+hu

ti b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba du skr-i te d+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duHbre k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbA pa smA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba s+t+wa ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba DA ki nI b+h+yaHphaTaHsar re ba tI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka

ta bA si ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ya ma yeb+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sha ku ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tr-i nan+di ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bi se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yo ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a lam+ba ke b+h+yaH

phaT| sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi sarbo pa sargo pa ya se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba u trA se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba byU d+hi b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba gra he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pra t+yir+tha ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbon+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbats+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra ma d+hu ka ra sid+d+hi ka

ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA tsAR+ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA rA dze b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sA d+ha ke b+h+yo bid+ya tsaR+ya b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tur+b+h+yo b+ha gi ni b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra kau mA rI ye bid+yA rA dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba

big+h+naM bi nA ya kA nAM phaT/ ba ra dA ye phaT/ pa ra bi drA ba Na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA nu Sh+yA b+h+yaHphaT/ mA ru te b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+ha N+De b+h+yaHphaT/ badzri shrIng+ga lA ya man+ta pra t+yaMng+gi rA b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha sa b+h+yaHphaT/ mahA pra t+ying+ga re b+h+yaH

phaT| tsin+da tsin+da phaT/ bin+da bin+da phaT/ hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+h+wa ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ ba ra pra dA ya phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba Na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba

de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+ha rbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ki nA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+haN+De

b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbon+ma de b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra sAM ka lA ya ma hA pra t+yaM gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ kA lA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya
phaT| mA tri ga NA ya phaT/ biSh+Nu bI ye phaT/ ma hA mA tri ga Na ma skr-i ti ye phaT/ ma he shwa rA ye phaT/ brah+ma NI ye phaT/ ag+nI ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA la daN+Di ye phaT/

in+d+ri ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ tsa muN+DI ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ ma hA bA rA hI ye phaT/ rA tri ye phaT/ kA la rA tri ye phaT/ ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ ma hA ka pA lI ye phaT/ kau
mA ri ye phaT/ ya mI ye phaT/ bA yu be phaT/ ku be rA ye phaT/ nai ri tI ye phaT/ ba ru NI ye phaT/ mA ru tI ye phaT/ ma hA mA ru tI ye phaT/ so mI ye phaT/ i shA nI ye phaT/ pok+ka sI ye

phaT| ar+tha rba NI ye phaT/ sa pa rI ye phaT/ kr-iSh+Na sa pa rI ye phaT/ ya ma dU ti ye phaT/ ni sa ti bA tsa re b+h+yaHphaT/ tri san yA ba re b+h+yaHphaT/ d+ha ra NI yi phaT/ a ti muk+ti kasmI ra mahA sh+ma shA nI ba sI

nI ye phaT/ i ti b+h+yaH/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarba do She b+h+yaHphaT/ oM hUM Sh+ToM b+han+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba duSh+TA na rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sa twAM sh+tsa swAhA/ gang su dag bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams
cad la sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa 'khrug pa'i
sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mi mdza' ba mi mdza' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de rnams las bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la srung ba mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya
'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /gang su dag gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / mngal za ba rnams dang / khrag 'thung ba rnams dang /
zhag za ba rnams dang / sha za ba rnams dang / tshil za ba rnams dang / rkang za ba rnams dang / btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / gtor ma za ba rnams dang / phreng ba za
ba rnams dang / dri za ba rnams dang / me tog za ba rnams dang / bdug pa za ba rnams dang / 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / lo tog za ba rnams dang / bsreg bya za ba rnams dang / nor 'phrog pa
rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / rnag za ba rnams dang / bshang ba za ba rnams dang / gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / rnabs
za ba rnams dang / ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / skyug pa za ba rnams dang / nor bu za ba rnams dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig
pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang /
gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / nam mkha'i lding gi gdon rnams dang / mi'am ci'i
gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dwags kyi gdon rnams dang /
sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon
rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang /
nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma gdon pa'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / bum pa lta
bu'i gdon rnams dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon rnams dang / lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / ka TaM ka Ta'i tshogs can gyi gdon rnams dang / gdon thams cad bsal du gsol/
rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / zla ba phyed pa rnams dang / zla ba gcig
pa rnams dang / nyin mo pa rnams dang / nyi ma phyed pa rnams dang / yud tsam pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / yi
dwags kyi rims rnams dang / sha za'i rims rnams dang / mi'i rims rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i rims rnams dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang /
mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bdag dang / sems can thams cad la bsal
du gsol/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor
na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / brang na ba dang / snying na ba dang / gnad na ba dang / rtsibs logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang /
mdoms na ba dang / gzhang na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas na ba dang / brla na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying
lag na ba bsal du gsol/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / mig ser dang /
g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / mchin nad dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / g.yan pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang / me dbal dang /
lhog pa dang / skem pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrag pa dang / lus pa dang / brgyal pa dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / byad dang / me dang / dmu chu dang / mi ngas

dang / 'thab mo dang / 'khon dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu tre ma bu ga dang / trai la ta ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / dom dang
dred dang / gnag dang / chu srin dang / spyang ki dang / chom po dang / de dag la sogs pa srog 'phrog par byed pa gzhan thams cad kyang bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug
tor phyir zlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi mthus dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad dam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i nang tshun chad du rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /
rig sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /sa bcing bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu bcing bar bgyi'o/ /
nam mkha' bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi sde rab tu rengs par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha kha me kha kha me/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bI re bI re/ bai ra bai ra/ sau me

sau me| shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ badzra d+ha ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT/ oM hUM Sh+ToM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra pA Ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra bA she na sarba duSh+Ta big+h+nA bi nA ya kA na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM drUM ban+d+ha phaT/ rak+Sha
rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa swAhA/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
chen mo 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te lus sam/ mgul du thogs pa byas nas bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya ste/ de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs
mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ rims kyis mi tshugs/ nad kyis mi tshugs/ chad pas mi tshugs/ me dang chus mi tshugs/ bsgyur ba'i las thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi
tshugs| dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log
'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rig sngags kyi lhas kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag nas de la rtag par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /rdo rje pho nya mo
mngag gzhug brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang rtag par yongs su skyong bar byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin nyid dang / srin po nyid
dang | 'byung po nyid dang / yi dwags nyid dang / sha za nyid dang / srul po nyid dang / lus srul po nyid dang / mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med
dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can
zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang
thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas byas pa can ma yin pa yang bsnyen gnas byas pa can du 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mtshams med pa
lnga byas pa de yang sdig pa ma lus pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na/ bu 'dod pa des kyang bu rnyed de/ che dang /
bsod nams dang / stobs kyang rab tu ldan no/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa
thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig mi ngas dang / ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha
rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi pham pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can
zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas nas grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam|
grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ldongs sam/ grong rdal lam/ dur khrod dam/ ri'am/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo
rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs pa tsam gyis g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang /
pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye
dga' bo dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /dus dus su grog 'byin to/ /dus dus su 'brug sgrog go /nad dang gnod pa

thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /oM hUM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba duSh+Tan rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa twA sh+tsa swAhA/ oM hUM Sh+To ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba duSh+Ta na rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sa twaM sh+tsa badzra pA Ni

hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te mUrta ni te dzo rA shi/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM hUM phaT phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha

ma ma sa pa ri wa ra s+ya sarba satwA sh+tsa swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si ha ta ba trai hUM phaT swAhA/ hUM hUM rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri wA ra s+ya sarba sa twAM sh+tsa hUM phaT swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/

a tsa le a tsa le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI re bI re/ bai ra bai ra/ sau me sau me/ sarba bud+d+ha ad+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre sarba duSh+Ta tsi ta tA na hUM phaT swAhA/ sangs rgyas kya rnal
'byor gyis shig pa thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / mi
dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdzogs so// //rgya gar

skad du/ AR+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre a pa ra dzi ta ma hA pra t+yaM gi ra ba ra ma sid+d+hi nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs
dkar pe can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das su ma cu
rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chos bzang lha'i mdun sa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha'i dbang po
brgya byin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas gtsug tor rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byung ngo / /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag
'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag
par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong mod pa 'dor ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal
lo| |rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par
mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon
cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan
rgyas pa ut+pa la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po
can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis 'byung po'i gdong thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ dus ma yin par
'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/ gsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las grol bar byed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad 'jig
par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ ma
rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ dug dang / mtshon thams cad dang / me dang chu las zlog pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/
gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar chen 'bar phreng gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal
pa'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje'i mchu can rnam sgeg mo/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma/ /zhi ba gser gyi phreng
ba can| |dkar chen 'bar ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje'i rig gser phreng / /le
brgan rtsi dang rin chen nam/ /rnam snang mdzad rigs gtsug tor grags/ /phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can
thams cad srung du gsol/ om sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM drUM hrIMHSh+ToM/ dzaM b+ha na ka rI hUM drUMHSh+ToM/ /staM b+ha na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ mo ha na ka rIhUM drUM hrIH

Sh+ToM/ /saM b+ha k+Sha na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ /b+han+d+ha na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ /ba ra bi Sha b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ /sarba duSh+Ta duSh+Ta nA staM b+ha na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ /sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na

ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ /sarba pa ri bid+ya ts+tsha da na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ /tsa tu rA shi tI nAM gra ha sa ha srA NA bi d+h+wa sa na ka rI hUM drUMHSh+ToM/ / biM sha tI nak+Sha trA NAM pra sA da na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ /aSh+TA

nA ma hA gra hA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ /rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba satwA sh+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor
phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' bo chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen pos sa
gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig /rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar

mo dang / /pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /sangs rgyas dpa' dang de bzhin spyan/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od dang ni/ /de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /rig pa dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshogs de

dag thams cad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kun nas srung bar mdzad du gsol/ oM r-i Shi ga Na pra shAsta sarba ta thA ga toSh+NAM Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM drUM/ dzam+b+ha na ka rI hUM drUM/ staM b+ha na ka rI

hUM drUM/ mahA bid+yA saM b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hUM drUM/ pa ra bid+yA saM b+hak+Sha Na ka ri hUM drUM/ sarba duSh+Ta nAM staM b+ha na ka rI hUM drUM/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra haM NAM bi b+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM drUM/ tsa tu rA shi tI nAM graM ha sa ha srA NAM baM

d+haM sa na ka rI hUM drUM/ aSh+Ta biM sha ti nAM nak+Sha tra NAM pra sA da na ka rI hUM drUM/ aSh+Ta mahA kra hA NAM bi d+haM sa na ka ra hUM drUM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje'i gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi
byed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang /
me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i
'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i
chad pa'i las kyi 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs
pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dwags kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i
gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi
gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / gshin rje'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun tu
phreng ba'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /zas su mdangs za ba dang / zas su mngal za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su
zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyug pa za ba dang / zas su phyi sa
za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa za ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su mi

gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin
sreg za ba ste/ gdon de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro mas byas
pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo//
sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen
pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad
do| |phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo gzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad
do| |phur bus gdab bo/ /b+hiM gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas
pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig
sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'i byas pa'i rig
sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / bran pho dang / bran mos byas
pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /drang srong gi tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags
gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi 'phrod pa za ba'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor
nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ oM a si ta

A na lArka pra b+ha s+phu Ta bi ka si tA ta pa tre/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ ha na ha na/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ bin+da bin+da/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ swAhA/ snying po'o/ /he he phaT/ ho

ho phaT/ a mo g+hA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ ba ra dA ya phaT/ ba ra pra dA ya phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba Na ka rA ya phaT/ pa ra bi drA ba NA ka rA ya phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+haN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba

skan+de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo n+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tshe ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pasmA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbostA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba DA ki nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba re ba tI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yA ma ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sha ku ni

b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tri nan+ti ka b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kaM pU ki ma ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a laM ba ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka ta da ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kaN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+ha rbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba maho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba durlaM gi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duHprek+She te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaHphaT/

sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Na b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ki b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ka b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka ra/ sid+d+hi ka ra sarba ar+tha sAd+ha ke b+h+yaHphaT/

tsa tur b+h+yo b+ha gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra ku mA rI ye badzra ku lan+d+ha ri b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma hA pra t+yaM gi ri b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra shi ka lA ya pra t+yaM gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA mA tri ga Nan ma skr-i tA ye phaT/
brah+ma NI ye phaT/ biSh+Nu bI ye phaT/ ma he shwa rwa ye phaT/ ru drI ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ tsa muN+Di ye phaT/ ku mA rI ye phaT/ ba rA hi ye phaT/ in+d+rI ye phaT/
ag+nI ye phaT/ ya mA yai phaT/ nai rI tI ye phaT/ ba ru NA ye phaT/ mA ru tI ye phaT/ sa mA ye phaT/ i shA nI ye phaT/ kA la daN+Di ye phaT/ kA la rA tri ye phaT/ ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/ ya
ma rA tri ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ a ti muk+ti sh+ma shA na ba si nI ye phaT/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swAhA/ sems can gang su dag bdag la gdug pa dang gdug pa'i sems dang
ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul dang drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa dang 'khrug pa'i sems dang
ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba dang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas bdag dang sems can thams cad srung du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur
cig /ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig /gnod sbyin dang gdon gang su dag zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang /
zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba
rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su skyug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su
snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
dang / gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i
gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dwags kyi
gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / kuM b+haN+Da'i gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus sprul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi
gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang /
gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu phreng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams las bdag srung
bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig /rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin
gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa
rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/
gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang /

snying na ba dang / gnad na ba dang / rtsi ba logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brla na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba
dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang /
ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / rims nad dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / mdze dang / phol mig
dang / bas bldags dang / me dbal dang / lhog pa dang / lud pa lu ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / mi dran pa dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / bdud dang / 'ching ba dang /

dgra dang / dgon pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu tre ma bu ka dang / trai la tA ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mong dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / gzig
rgod dang / chu srin la sogs pa'i srog chags rnams bsal du gsol/ de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan thams cad kyi

rig sngags bcing bar bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a le a na le/ khas me kha sa me/ bai ra bai ra/ sau me sau me/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ pi Sha de bi Sha de/ bI re bI re/ de bi badzra d+hA ri ban+d+ha ni badzra pA Ni

phaT/ oM hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra pa Ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra pa sha na ma ma sarba duSh+Ta bi g+h+naM bi nA ya kAM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /sus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te lus sam mgul du thogs
sam| klog par byed na/ de la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ me dang chus mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma
yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams dang / grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyis kyang de la rtag tu mthun par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /de rnams kyi yid du
'ong ba dang / dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi yang rtag par phyi bzhin
yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang yi dwags dang / sha za dang / sprul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems
dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad cing / de dag gi thugs su byon pa dang / dgyes par yang 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdug dkar po can zhes bya ba phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub
par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /smyung ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang byang bar
'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bu 'dod pa gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba
gdugs dkar po can phyir zlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang ngam klog na/ bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang / bsod nams dang / stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do/ /'di
nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / nang 'go ba dang / 'khrug
pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags
kyi rgyal mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher byas te mchod pa chen po byas la grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs
sam| dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs na/ btsugs ma thag
tu g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams

cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+Ni Sha a na le a wa lo ki te tsur+Na te dzo rA shi/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /

da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ bin+da bin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga to Sh+Ni Sha hUM phaT swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai ra bai ra/

sau me sau me/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+heSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM phaT hUM ma ma hUM ni hUM swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i
rgyal po nag po chen po rnams dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /dus dus su sprin sdud pa dang / dus dus su 'brug gi sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro/ /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la sangs
rgyas kyi rnal 'byor du byas nas lan gsum bzla bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can
gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen mo phyir zlog pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta pa ri ha ta b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba gzu dga' rdor gyis kha che'i bdud rtsi
'byung gnas kyi gtsug lag khang gi dpe rnying la gtugs nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre a pa ra dzi ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal
lo| |lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs
pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan sred med kyi
bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis
phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu'i
gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la'i bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs
dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba phyir zlog pa chen po 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod pa/ dus ma yin par
'chi ba las zlog pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol ba/ sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed pa/
rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan
pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi
brjid che/ /dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes
mtshan| |gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mkhar bsnams 'joms pa mo/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ /gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs
chen mo| |rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng / /le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags/ /rnam par
bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la srung du

gsol| srung ba mdzad du gsol/ oM r-i Shi ga na pra shap+ta ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA pa tre hUM drUM dzam+b+ha na ka rI hUM drUM/ stam+b+ha na ka rI hUM drUM/ mahA bid+yA saM b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hUM drUM pa ra

bid+yA sam+b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hUM drUM/ sarba duSh+TA nAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hUM drUM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM drUM/ tsa tu rA sha ti nAM gra ha sa ha srA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM drUM/ aSh+Ta bi shaM tI nAM nak+Sha trA

nAM pra sA da na ka rI hUM drUM/ aSh+TA NAM ma hA gra hA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM drUM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje
gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs
pa chen pos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pas kun nas bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ oM rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang /
me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i
'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad
pa'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i
gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang /
lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dwags kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang /
srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon
dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / gdon de dag thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas su mngal za ba dang / zas
su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su
skyug pa za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba
dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su rnag za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su bdug
pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba de dag thams cad las bdag bde legs
su gyur cig /de dag thams cad dang gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab
bo| |mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /phyugs bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred
med kyi byas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nag
po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rigs sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal bar
byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab
bo| |b+h+ring gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas
pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas
pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ oM a si tA na lArka pra b+ha s+phu Ta bi kA si tA ta pa re/ dz+wi

la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+he phaT/ a pra ti ha ta phaT/ ba ra pra dA phaT/ praM

t+ya gi ri phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba ka phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+ha rba b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pa shI tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kuM b+hAN+De b+h+yaH

phaT| sarba pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba un+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa smA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba o stA ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba durla ng+g+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duSh+p+re k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kr-it+ya garma nA ka khorde b+h+ya| phaT/ ki ra Na be tA De b+h+yaHphaT/ tsits+tsha pre Sha ka dush+tsa rdi te b+h+yaHphaT/ dur+b+hu k+te b+h+yaH

phaT| sarba trIr+thi'i ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka ra/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yo bad+yI tsA re b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tur b+h+yo b+ha gI nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra kau mA

rI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ bad+yI rA dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ mahA pra t+yaM gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra shraM kha lA ya pra t+yaM gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya ma t-I ga NA na ma skr-i tA ya b+h+yaHphaT/ biSh+Na bI ya phaT/ brAh+ma NI

ye phaT| ag+nI ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA lA daM dA yi ye phata/ in+d+rI ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ kau ma rI ye phaT/ pA rA hI ye phata/ tsa muN+DI ye phaT/ rA trI ye phaT/ kA la rA trI ye phaT/ ya
ma daN+DI ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ a d+hi muk+ti sma sA na bA si nI ye phaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa
rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas
su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su skyug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su ma gtsang ba za ba
rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil
ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su
phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu
za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /
drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dwags kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung
po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams
dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon pa'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin
rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu 'gro ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / rims nyin
gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa
rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang /
'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad

dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang /
lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na pa dang / brlan pa dang / rje dang na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar
po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang
'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dbal dang / g.ya' ba dang / lhog pa dang / skem pa dang / skrag pa dang / dbyig
dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad stems dang / me dang / chu dang / mi ngas dang / dgra dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu t+r+ye ma bu ka dang / trai la tA ka dang /
sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mong dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / chu srin dang / bong bu lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags
bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ be Sha de be Sha de/ bai ra bai ra/ badzra d+ha ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni/
badzra pA Ni phaT/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ hUM drUM ban+d+ha phaT ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir
zlog pa chen po 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te lus sam/ mgul du thogs na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ mes
mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon
thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la srung
ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod
sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog
pa chen po 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /
bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur ro/ /smyung ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon
gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi
thub pa chen pe 'di 'chang na/ bu 'dod pa des de rnyed de/ tshe dang / bsod nams dang / stobs rnams kyang rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang
'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / gnag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug
ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di
rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher byas te mchod pa chen po byas la/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/
dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang /

'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ oM

hUM Sh+TA+oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+NA Shi a ba lo ki ti mur+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hUM dz+wA la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/

ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da| b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NA Shi hUM phaT swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai re bai re/ sau me sau me/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te
sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM phaT/ hUM ma ma hUM ni swAhA/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ta thA ga ta uSh+Ni Sha si tA ta pa tre nA ma a
pa ra dzi ta d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs ba'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas na chos bzang lha'i mdun sa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag byung ngo / /sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal
lo| |yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod par 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag
'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan sred
med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed la dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i
tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag
'tshal lo/ /nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal
lo| |bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la'i bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba phyir zlog pa chen
po 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol
ba| sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jigs par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza'
chen po brgyad 'jigs par byed ba/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ dug dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu
las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thus drag shul che/ /gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gos
dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mkhar bsnams 'joms
pa mo| |zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ /gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen po can/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin ma/ /
lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng / /le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje'i gtsug tor grags/ /rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma/ /rdo rje
sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ oM ri Shi ga na pra shAp+ta sa ya/ sarba ta thA ga

toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM drUM/ dzam+b+ha na ka ri hUM drUM/ stam+b+ha na ka ri hUM hUM/ ma hA bid+yA saM b+hak+Sha na ka ri hUM drUM/ pa ra bi d+yA saM b+hak+Sha na ka rA hUM drUM/ sarba duSh+TA nAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hUM drUM/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha

sa gra hA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM drUM/ tsa tu rA shI ta nIn/ gra ha sa ha srA NA bi d+h+wa na sa na ka ra hUM drUM/ aSh+Ta bi sha ti nAn/ nak+Sha ta trA NA mi pra sA da na ka ri hUM drUM/ aSh+Ta nAM gra ha NAM bi d+h+wa na sa na ka rI
hUM drUM| rak+Sha maM/ srung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong
mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen pos sa
gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa chen mo kun nas bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ oM rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i
'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs
pa dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang /
rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs
pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dwags kyi gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon
dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / de dag
las kyang bdag bde legs su gyur cig /gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za
ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyug pa za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung
ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma za ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su rnag za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba
dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba las
bdag bde legs su gyur cig /de dag thams cad dang / gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /kun tu rgyas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur
bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /phyugs bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /
sred med kyis bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /
phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus
gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas ba'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab po/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus
gdab bo/ /b+h+riM gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig
sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab po/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus
gdab bo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug gtor nas byung ba'i gdugs

dkar po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ oM a si tA na lArka pra b+ha s+phu Ta/ bi ka si tA Ta pa tre/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da

ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a ma g+ho phaT/ a pra ti ta drA phaT/ ba ra pra tA phaT/ haM gi ra ti phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba ka phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba a ru re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma rud de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+b+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba

pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+haN De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba un+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha

ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pasmA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba o stA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba du ra laM gi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duSh+p+re k+She te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma kA kho rde b+h+yaHphaT/ ki ra Na bi tA De

tsits+cha pre Sha ka du shats+tshe rdi ta du r+b+hu k+te b+h+yaHphaT/ du ra b+huk+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tI r+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Na b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra ma d+hu ka ra b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha

ka b+h+yo bid+yA tsA re b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tu ra b+ha gi ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kau mA rI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ bid+yA ra dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ mahA pra t+yaM gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra shrI kha la ya pra t+ya gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ mahA kA lA ya mA tr-i

ga Na na ma skri tA ya phaT/ biSh+Nu bI ye phaT/ brah+ma NA ye phaT/ ag+nI ye phaT/ mahA kA lI ye phaT/ kA la daN+DI ye phaT/ in+d+rI ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ kau mA rA ye phaT/ ba rA hI ye phaT/ tsa
muN+Di ye phaT/ ra trI ye phaT/ kA la ra tri ye phaT/ ya ma daN+Di ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ a ti muk+ti sma shA na bA se nI ye phaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la
sdang pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams
dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa
za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su skyug par ba rnams dang zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab
ba 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma
za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas
su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /
drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi
gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dwags
kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul pa'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem
byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang /
nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu phreng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i
gdon rnams dang / rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams
dang / rims mi zad pa rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur
ba rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang / klad ba na ba gsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yig 'chus ba dang /

mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / rtsi ba logs na ba

dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brla na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na bdag bsal
du gsol/ srung du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor nas byung ba phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang /
mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dbal dang / g.yan pa dang / lhog pa dang /
skem pa dang skrag pa dang / dbyig dug deng / dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / me dang / chu dang / ngas dang / dgra dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang du tre ma bu

ka dang / trai la ta dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mong dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / spyang ki dang / chu srin dang / bong bu lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag
thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gdon thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le//

a na le/ bi Sha de/ bi Sha de/ bai ra bai ra/ badzra d+ha ri/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni/ badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ hUM drUM phaT phaT swAhA/ hUM drUM phaT/ ban+d+ha phaT phaT swAhA/ su sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtug tor nas
byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te lus sam mgul du btags na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug
gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs so/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i
dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs byed ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad

cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /nam
du yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu
med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can
gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba
yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur/ smyung ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa yang ma
lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /bud med bu 'dod ba gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar
po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di 'chang na/ bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang / bsod nams dang / stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do/ /'di nas shi 'phos na yang 'jig rten
gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / gnag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha
rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
btags te rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas la/ grong khyer chen po'i sgor zhugs la grong khyer ram/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan
gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / pha rol gyi

dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig swAhA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ oM hUM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra/ bdag la srungs shig /

rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ badzra pA Ni hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga to Sh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te mu r+d+ha te dzo rA shi /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/

oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ khas me khas me/ bai ra bai ra/ sau me sau me/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThA te/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre
hUM phaT swAhA/ hUM ma ma hUM ni swAhA/ sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang /
mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung
ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //gtsug tor lha yul ma chung pa kha che'i paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA na sa rang
'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sa man+ta mu kha pra be sha ra sh+mi bi ma loSh+NI Sha pra b+ha sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki te nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ kun nas
sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / zham ring ba lha'i tshogs chen
po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor mang po tshogs pa la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa
drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi 'bras bu rnam par
smin pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i gter chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan

pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa dang / lhar skye ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar lha'i
gzugs yid du 'ong ba blta bas chog mi shes pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji
ltar brtson 'grus rtsom pa lta ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / rga shi dang / skye ba las grol ba dang / brdzus te skye ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur
ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro bar ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin
par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar shes rab dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang / thos pa rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / mang du thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam
par smin par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi sgo 'di nyid nyin mtshan du rjes su sems shing rjes su spyad
de dka' ba chen po'i phyir sgom par yang byed do/ /de nas lha'i 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba g.yog lha'i bu bya
ba phrag stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo khri brgyad stong gis bskor ba/ lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa brtsigs
pa'i khang bzang skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang / lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma
