'grub cing bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir legs par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /dge slong dang /
dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob yon tan thob par 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i cho ga sngar bstan pa
bzhin du byas te dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te gra bzhir dri'i
chu phor bu bkang ba re re bzhag /bdug spos kyi snod 'thul ba yang bzhag nas snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang / dri'i chu dang / 'bras skam po rnams blugs
te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag pa dang / yang til nag po dang / sran ma ma Sha dang / 'bras rnams bsres te btsos pa'i 'bras thug kri sa ra zhes
bya ba dang / zas dkar gsum dang / 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang / yang shing tog sna tshogs 'bras
bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / kha zas ming gis smros pa 'di rnams dang / spos dang / me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkram la/
gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gi nang du bcug nas mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad mngon du dmigs te phyag byas la sems rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag gden par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ oM bi pu la bi
pu la bi ma le/ pra ba re dzi na ba re/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA tu gar+b+he/ a d+hiSh+Thi ti swAhA/ a ya ta to ba ni swAhA/ sarba
de ba na/ ba ha ya bi shud+d+he a d+hiSh+Tha na sa ma ye swAhA/ bdug spos 'thul ba rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing / gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad
bton na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang /
rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed srog
shing brtan par byed do/ /de bas gong du yang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te
mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do/ /de ltar sems thag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na/
yon tan de dag dang / gzhan yang mchod rten de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / bgegs
thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gang gzhan la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di mthong ngam/ mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra de thos na yang las kyi sgrib
pa dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig
rten du skye'o/ /gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par
'gyur| tha na bya dang / ri dwags la sogs pa sems can gang gis mthong ba de yang tshe 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus
thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyod par 'dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te sa dang
lci bas byugs la de'i steng du spos kyi skyang nul gyis byugs te dkyil 'khor gyi gra bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod re re bzhag la/ sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags
bzhi po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/ rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams gcig kyang re
re'i nang du gzhug go /de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug ste mchod rten rnams dkyil
'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste me tog dang / byugs pas mchod la/ lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di yang gdon par bya'o/ /namaHna pa nA TI nAM/ ta thA
ga ta gaM ga NA nAM Di bA lu kAM /ko Ti ni yuk+ta sha ta sa ha sa NAM/ oM po bo ri/ tsa ri Ni tsa ri/ mo ri go ri tsa la ba ri swAhA/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad de/ des ni/ rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byas par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i gong du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sbrin sna tshogs
bsdus te mchod rten de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang dang / yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas de dag snyed kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa brgya chen po'i bsod nams dang / yon
tan thams cad thob par mdzad do/ /yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di ma nor bar yi ger bris la rtag tu bten te mchod pa'i las byas la
lus la thogs na/ rig pa de nyid kyis srung ba dang / skyob pa mdzad de/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang / shar gnyer ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
yi dwags la sogs pa thams cad kyang gnod par byed par mi 'gyur te/ 'jigs shing skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la
zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa yang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra
thos sam/ grib mas phog gam/ lus la reg kyang rung ste/ de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /
gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus khyer bar mi 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed/ thog 'bab par mi
'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyis srung ba dang / skyob pa mdzad cing spyan ras kyis 'tsho bar mdzad do/ /lha thams cad dang / dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de la stong
grogs byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi rig sngags dang / byad dang / sbyor ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na
'dug kyang gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/ gsang sngags yi ger bris la lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ sum mdo skye bo mang po phan tshun 'gro ba'i
gnas su mchod rten byas la de'i nang du bcug na/ 'gro ba thams cad dang / bya dang / sbrang ma dang / tha na grog sbur yan chad kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang
de la phog pa'i sa dang / rdul dang / rlung dang / grib mas phog na yang byol song dang / yi dwags dang / ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i
sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bas tshe rabs
rjes su dran pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / dbang
phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag /ngas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di dag khyed rnams la yongs su gtad kyi/
rtag tu rim gror bya zhing yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du chug la gnas thams cad du bsgrags te/ nam du yang rgyun ma chad par sems
can la ston cing / mthong zhing thos par byas na mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po
dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshig mthun par smras te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags
'di'i cho ga dang / mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsungs pa rnams sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag kun gyis bsrung zhing rim gror bgyi/
rtag par gzungs su bzung zhing mi bskyud par bgyi/ yi ger bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang la
las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing khong du chud nas ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa dang / sdig pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur bar bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/ bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' drin spyi bos blang ba'i slad du gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag rim gror bgyi/ btsun
par bgyi/ gus par bgyi/ rin po che'i 'du shes gzhag par bgyi/ rgya cher 'phel bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi ste/ nam du yang nub
par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam
pa rnams/ dam tshig la gnas pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag bsrung ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yongs su gzung bar khas blangs pa ni/ legs so legs
so| |shin tu yang legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang /
zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ jo bo a ti sha dang / dge bshes 'bre ma ston pas sngags rnams dag bar bcos
so|| //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ma nAn+ta mi ta sid+d+hi tsai t+ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes pa thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten
zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la/ /phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge la/ /mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od dpag med/ /spyan ras gzigs la bdag phyag
'tshal| |rigs gsum la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri rab chen po sna lngas grub pa/
gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa dang / tshad med pa'i mchod rten bzhi dang / rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po
gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse mo'i dbyings kyang mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa la sogs pas
bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor dang / thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa rnams nas 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu snyed cig
bkye ste| stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod kyis mi lang ba thams cad 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi gang
bu bzhin du gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang / 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang / dig pa
rnams smra shes pa dang / 'theng po rnams dang / zha bo rnams 'gro zhing / yan lag rengs pa dang / nad pa rnams nad dang bral ba dang / dmyal ba rnams tshe phri nas rim gyis
sdug bsngal las thar pa dang / gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyi mchod rten gyi skus gang zhing
rgyas par byas te 'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur to/ /de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor
rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab dang / dril bu dang / dar
dbyangs dang / spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / bshos dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma
la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs
'di ni| rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ bris sam/ klog gam/ ming nyan par byed na/ de mtshams med pa lnga dang /
mi dge ba bcu dang / sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga

'di'o| |oM tre d+h+wa sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+ha/ saM ha ra Na a yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma la bi shud+d+he swAhA/ rig pa chen
mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te rgyal
mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam
mgul du thogs na/ de lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du lta bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid ri brag gam/ tshal lam/ dgon pa'am/
sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na/ ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /oM tre d+he sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la

d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ saM ha ra Na A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma la bi shud+d+he/ ma hA bi ra dze ra gaM b+hi ra si/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ bi bi sa ra a a laM swAhA/
zhes brjod na/ sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid chu'am/ mtsho'am/ rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang la rgal ba na yang rig pa chen mo'i

sngags 'dis btab na/ chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /oM s+t+rai ya d+he sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ saM ha ra Na A yu saM sho d+ha
ya| pA paM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta bi ma le uSh+NI Sha bi shud+d+he/ ma hA bi ra dze ra gaM b+hi ra si/ d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sa ra a ma ma ki swAhA/ zhes brjod na/ chu
thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di btab na/ nam

mkha' thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /oM s+t+rai ya d+he sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ saM ha ra Na A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/ bA baM
sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta/ bi ma le uSh+NI Sha bi shud+d+he/ ma hA ma bi ra dze ra gaM b+hI ra si/ d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sa ra a a e khaM ya swAhA/ zhes brjod na/ nam mkha'i khams thams
cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba dang / bskor ba bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /bi ma la uSh+Ni Sha'i gzungs bzlas te 'byung ba
chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod rten btab na/ nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sa dang / shing dang / rdo dang / 'jim pa dang /
'bi 'bi gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis btab ste mchod rten btab na/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/ oM rat+na tsai t+ye pany+tsa ye bi bi sa
ra swAhA/ zhes brjod nas ba'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs na/ thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na/ gang zhig
gser dang dngul dang bai DUR+ya la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengs su gsol yang rdo dang / shing dang / kham pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de ni| 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags byin gyi rlabs ma bzhugs pa'i phyir rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te btab na/ 'byung ba chen po
gang la mchod rten btab kyang bskal pa dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te rdo dang / shing leb la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen
po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya la
sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i
sngags 'dis btab na/ mchod rten gcig btab na yang bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis ma btab na/ bye ba btab kyang gcig dang
'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gong ma bzhin no/ /rig pa chen mo de'i sngags 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ sUk+Sh+me sUk+Sh+me/ shAn+te shAn+te/ ni rA ku le/ ya sho te dzo/ sarba bud+d+he/ a
d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ a nu mi de swAhA/ 'di 'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ 'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mchod rten gcig btab na/ bye ba btab
par 'gyur ro/ /brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni/ 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /stong btab pa'i grangs dang phan
yon ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus
so| |'bum btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga
man chad gdab pa'i mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni/ thog mar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i
gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas de sa bdag byin gyis brlab cing sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa mchod rten dang / dge ba la bar chad byed pa
rnams mtshams gcad par bya ste/ thig skud la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/ oM badzra sU tra hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas thig skud de nyid rdo rje'i skud par dmigs
nas mchod rten gyi sa khyon ji tsam rnam pa dang / 'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam rnam pa thig gis sa bcad/ de bzhin du sa bcad na/ sa gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che
rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa de nyid la seng ldeng gi phur ba sor brgyad pa la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste/ oM badzra kI li kI li kI la
ya sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba 'di lan bdun bzlas te rdo rje phur bus dmigs te dbus dang gra bzhir gdab bo/ /de bzhin du btab na/ mi dang mi ma yin pa las srung bar
'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /seng ldeng gi phur bu ni/ mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blangs kyi bar du mi dbyung bar
gzhag go/ de nas til dang yungs kar la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a mr-i te ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas te sa'i phyogs su gtor
bas| sa phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par 'gyur/ de ltar sa gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs
gnas su byin gyis brlab ste/ bgegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa las mtshams bcad de spos dang / me tog dang / gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang sa phyogs
de na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsngos te bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklags na/ sa phyogs de yang shin tu bkra
shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa brko ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko bar bya'o/ /oM badzra kha na kha na hUM
phaT/ ces bzlas shing sa gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te brkos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa
gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas gtsang ma zhig tu bzhag nas sa brdung ba'i cho ga ni/ tho ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te rig pa chen
mo'i sngags 'dis btab ste brdung ngo / /badzra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas te rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na/ nyon mongs pa dang bag
chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba ni/ spos chab la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgyas gtugs te sbos chu de'i nang du
yang chos nyid kyi yi ge a zhe bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang chas par dmigs te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer chen po des spos chu de khyab par
gyur nas spos chu nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas
te byin gyis brlabs pas/ de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba'i sngags chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra pra marda nA
ya hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun brjod de/ 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par
byin gyis brlab pa ni/ 'jim pa de nyid la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya bcings te rig pa chen mo'i gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sUk+Sh+me sUk+Sh+me/ shan+te

shan+te| dAn+te dAn+te/ ni rA ku le/ ya sho ya sho ba ti te dzo shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+heSh+Thi te/ a na mo te hi ti swAhA/ zhe bdag nyid kyi rig pa chen mo 'di lan
@#/ bdun gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di sbyin gyis brlabs na/ 'jim pa nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam lnga
phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcur 'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer de dag slar 'dus
pas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yid kyis
kyang dmigs so/ /de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas te byi gyis brlabs na/ 'bi 'bi
nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas bar 'phros shing khyab ste 'gro ba mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer
gyi sprin phung de dag slar 'bi 'bi'i nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel sgong ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang
dmigs so/ /de nas 'bi bI'i nang bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am/ gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shog bu'am/ shing shun la sngags bris pa dang /
de'i nang du rig sngags so so'i snying po dang / oM hUM trAM hrI AH/ de rnams phrugs su sbyar te mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am/ yi ger bris pa'am/ gang yang rung ste nang du stsal
na| de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra gar+b+he swAhA/ zhes bya ba bzlas na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas tsai t+ya'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram/
til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a ra dze bi ra dze swAhA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na/ de nyid thabs dang shes
rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten 'debs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod
par bya'o/ /oM badzra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces bzlas shing mchod rten btab na/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i
mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po gang nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las mchod kyi
sku'i mchod rten 'byams klas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten phur bu'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la dbyung ngo //
oM d+harma d+hA tu ye swAhA/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swAhA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas te mchod rten byung na/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa 'brel ba las mchod rten chos kyi
sku 'byams klas pa 'byung ste/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor bam stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis
kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten snod nas phyung ba las 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM bra ma Na ye swAhA/ zhes bzlas
nas 'khor lo btsugs na/ rin po che'i gdugs dang / rin po che'i tog dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i shar bu dang / dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs
pa rnams kyis brgyan te mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang
dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten la na bza' gsol ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di bzlas la gsol to/ /oM d+harma d+ha tu swAhA b+ha ba bi shud+d+he d+harma te swAhA/ zhes lan mang du
bzlas te btab na/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten lngar btab na/ dkyil 'khor
yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am/ stong ngam/ gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil
'khor re'u mig rdo'i stegs bu brtsigs pa ni/ sa'am/ rdo leb bam/ shing la sogs pa las dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis te 'og gi khri yang seng+ge'i khri'am/ rin po
che'i khri'am/ pad+ma'i khri stegs su byas la/ de'i steng du go ma yaM dang sbos chus chag chag btab ste dbus dang phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhugs pa'i sa kun tu gur gum dang /
tsan+dan gyi chus zlum por bskus la/ srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bri bar yang mchod rten lngar btab na/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi
dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am/ stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra ba'i
thig gis sa gcad par bya'o/ /mchod rten gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i tshe rig
pa chen po'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha stu be swAhA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzhag na/ bdag dang gzhan
gyi don phun sum tshogs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni/ dang po dbus su dgod/ de nas shar du dgod/ de nas lhor dgod/ de nas
nub tu dgod/ de nas byang gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra pad+ma sa ma ye swAhA/ zhes lan
gsum du bzlas la rdo rje dang / pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas la/ sa gzhi dang nam mkha'i khams dang / rgya mtsho'i mjing thams cad mchod rten gyis
gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /gzhan yang mchod rten re re btab nas thal byung dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la/ spos dang / me tog la sogs pa mchod pa
rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol/ mchod rten gyi kha dog la sogs pa bsku ba ni/ zhi ba'i dkar po/ rgyas pa'i ser po/ /dbang dmar po/ /srung ba ljang
gur dmigs te na bza' yang de bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin du dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/
dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge raM dmar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ hUM raM swAhA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas pas de nyid ye shes
kyi me dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur
ro| |de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor le'u tshe lnga'am/ brgya'am/ stong ngam/ gang bris pa'i dbus rnams su yi ge a dkar po gnas pa
las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal hUM phaT/ ces grangs ji tsam rnam par bzlas na/ mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re rer
'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang bder bltas la bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen
por ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la sku dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad
nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprin phung bzhin du mthar 'byams klas par 'phros shing sems can gyi khams thams
cad du byin gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten
gyi gzhal yas kyang bskyed pa ni/ mchod rten dkyil 'khor du gzhag pa la rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod rten gyi steng du reg par byas la rig pa
chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra d+hA tu a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na rin po che'i sa
gzhi dang / chos kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de ltar
du mchod rten re re btab ste bzhag nas de mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nas seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / 'bras chan dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang 'dra zhing / zhing
dgod pa dang / bla re dang / 'phan dang / gdugs dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams pa rnam par dag par rig pa
chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarba pU dza puSh+pe swAhA/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam
par 'khrigs shing char gyi rgyun bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po che re res mchod cing yon du
dar bu chung dang / 'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang / gdugs dbu chung yang rung ste/ re re dbul lo/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab pa lags na/ dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting nge
'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni/ mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang / rgyan dang / chu lugs dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa tshul
bzhin du dgos te dmigs par bya'o/ /ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten de yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba de dag bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la uSh+Ni
ShI gzungs kyi snying po dang / rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bru re ba kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du gdang zhing 'tsher ba zhig tu dmigs la/ de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer
na tshogs 'byams klas par rigs la phyogs bcu 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i mtha' klas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug par
brgyan cing grub par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab te 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus nas de nyid kyi dbu'i
gtsug dang / thugs kar phog /'phrin las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dag ste sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs
la| dung phor gyi nang du spos chab dang / dri sna tshogs sbyar ba'i argas gsol to/ arga'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i steng du dung por bzhag la spos chu'i nang du a dkar po
las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyi spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te mchod pa dbul pa'i rig pa chen
po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a mr-i te ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du bdugs shing sbrengs te phul bas/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyes
par 'gyur ro/ /tshig tu yang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do/ /de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste ye shes kyi
sku'i nang du 'dus shing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar dmigs so/ /de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklag cing lan ci mang du brjod par
byas nas bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par gdab par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di bzhin du rdzogs par bya ba mi bden rang gi lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skur bsgyur ba las dgongs
pa ma nyams par bya ste/ mchod rten dang / mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par dgongs te mchod rten btab na yang
cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang 'dra ste/ 'gal ba med do/ /de bzhin du ma gyur na/ yang bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'bri zhing
'chang bas mchod rten btab na/ cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa nyid 'di yin te/ mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par
'gyur ro/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ma brjod na/ mchod pa phul zhing mnga' gsol yang mnga' phul bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhung las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo / /rig
sngags gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing / /dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi gsal bas/ /mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams/ /brlabs kyang
rdzogs par yongs mi 'gyur/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /gang zhig gsang sngags dang dgongs par ldan pas mchod rten dang / sku gzugs btab pa'i yon tan ni/ ji skad du/ mchod
rten chog dam pa 'di/ /bsod nams bgyis pa'i khyad par ni/ /gzungs 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis/ /gcig btab bye ba btab dang 'dra/ /yun ring dus nas 'khor ba
yis| |mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams/ /ji snyed yod pa ma lus 'byang / /tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /tshe rabs gzhan du skyes
nas kyang / /rigs mchog dam par skyes nas kyang / /longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing / /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por bskyes/ /tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur/ /
dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du/ /dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing / /bgegs dang gnod pas de mi bskyod/ /bsam pa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/ /
mthar ni mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs rdzogs so// //mchod rten gcig yan chad/ bye ba man chang gdab pa'i sngags dang bsam pa'i
rgyud ni| kun kyang 'dra'o/ /de la mchod rten gcig btab na/ bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang cho ga ni/ 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams cad la sngags 'di

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAn/ dzi nA nAn/ ban+d+he rat+na Ta yan shu b+ha na/ ak+Sho b+h+ya a mi tA ban tsa ban de/ a haM a lo ki taM/ na ma s+t+r+yai d+hA nu ga tA

nAn| sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ suk+Sh+me suk+Sh+me/ nA ga de/ shAn+te/ dAn+ta/ shI ba ni rA ku le/ ye shes ya sho ba ti/ te dze te tso ba ti/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te swAhA/ mu dra 'debs pa'i 'ji
ba'am| sngags bri ba'i che lan bdun gdab pa'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAn/ A pra ti ha ta/ shA sa nA nAn/ oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ 'bi 'bi'i sngags la/ oM badzrod
b+ha bA ya swAhA/ tse ti'i por bu'i nang dang / sa tsha'i nang du phye ma btab pa'am/ snum gyis byug pa'i sngags la/ oM badzra a ra dze bi ra dze swAhA/ phyag rgya'am/ sngags gzhug pa'i
sngags la/ oM d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swAhA/ tse ti'i phor bur 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM badzra d+hA tu gar+b+he swAhA/ tho ba rdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la/ oM badzra mung+ga ra a ko Ta
ya hUM| tse ti'i phor bu nas phyir dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harma te swAhA/ 'khor lo dang dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM b+h+ra ma ta na ye swAhA/ tse ti'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag
pa'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swAhA/ cho ga de ltar byas na/ tse ti gcig btab pas bye ma snyed btab par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor
byas pa'i lag pa 'ji ba can gyis gar na bar bskus na/ nad mdze'i rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro// //rgya gar skad du/
AR+ya bra tI t+ya sa mut+pa da pa ri hr-i da ya d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho gcig gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni/ /rgyu la 'gog pa gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /de skar
gsung ba dge sbyong che/ /tshig 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ /sems can rnams la phan byed pa/ /las kun grub par byed pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu
gsungs/ /rigs kyi bu dag gang gis ni/ /dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan la/ /gus shing dang ba'i sems bskyed nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /
rten 'brel zab mo'i cho ga bshad/ /thams cad las dang mthun par gsungs/ /dang po 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs pa/ /'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod gyur na/ /
sems can rnams ni 'khor bar 'gro 'gyur la/ /las dang nyon mongs med na 'khor ba las kyang ldog /bden pa 'di yis bdag gi bsam pa 'grub gyur cig /
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g+ng+ga'i'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa
byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams kyi sman pa rnams

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+hA bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba d+ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha
e baM bA dI mahA shra ma NaHswAhA/ las rnams kun gyi cho ga la/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod/ /bsam rgyud rang gi lag mthil la/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
kyi sku/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan/ /dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus spras/ /me yi khams la bzhugs pa bsgom/ /de ni lha dag rjes su dran/ /de ni sbyor ba'i las
bshad de/ /rim pa bzhin du so sor bstan/ /rims kyis btab nas na ba dang / /klad pa na dang mig nad dang / /khong nad la sogs nad rnams la/ /tshigs bcad 'di dang
snying po 'di/ /mang por bzlas shing langs nas ni/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi/ /dbyung ba'i thabs su khyab par bya/ /nang rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur/ /nyin
gcig nyin gnyis nyin gsum dang / /nyin bzhi rtag pa'i rim rnams la/ /bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi/ /skud pa dkar po sum sgril la/ /bzlas brjod nyi shu
brgyad bzlas nas/ /mgul du btags na bde bar 'tsho/ /nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/ /gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas shing btang / /snying
nad rtsib logs na ba dang / /khong na nad rnams ci yod la/ /chu la sngags 'di mang bzlas nas/ /blud na phan zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/ /
bzlas shing btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang / /phol mig dang na rma red la/ /grog tshangs la snying po 'di/ /mang du bzlas te btab na 'tsho/ /
gzhang 'brum gzhang nad za gu dang / /pho mtshan skrangs shing na ba la/ /skyer pa'i khaN+Da'i ril bu 'am/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu la/ /nyi shu bzlas shing bskus na phan/ /
nad kyi rnam pa gang na yang / /nad tshabs che chung tshed brtags nas/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la/ /mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas su/ /lus la byab cing bzlas na
phan| |'khru ba ga nad kyis btab ba la/ /sman nam ril bu kha zas la/ /bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang / /khong du btang na phan par 'gyur/ /de yi bzlas brjod snga ma

ste| |'di dag rab tu bzla bar bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI mahA shra ma NaHswAhA/ de dag
bzlas na nad rnams 'tsho/ /de ni nad rnams 'tsho ba'o/ /de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa/ /nas dang gro dang sran ma dang / /'bras dang sran chung mon sran dang / /shing tog rgun
'brum a ru ra/ /de dag kun la zab yi /srin bu spur bu phye ma leb/ /bye'u dang byi ba ne tso dang / /lo tog za ba kha bcing na/ /zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang / /bye ma sa dang
thal ba la/ /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /zhing dang shing tog gtor byas na/ /de dag kun kyang kha bcings 'gyur/ /ha cang char pa ches pa na/ /bcom ldan 'das
la phul ba yi/ /me tog dman ma re re la/ /bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ /gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus dag tu/ /bum pa gang ba'i
steng dag tu/ /kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du yang / /me tog gtsang ma bzlas pa de/ /bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur/ /ser ba drag po 'ongs pa na/ /se ba nya mig lcug
ma la| |bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /ser ba gang nas g.yo ngos su/ /klad la bskor zhing byabs na 'chad/ /yang na thal chen yungs kar la/ /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa
brgyad bya/ /thum po byas te lcug ma la/ /btags te btsugs na ser ba 'chad/ /'byung po sha za yi dwags dang / /brjed byed gdon gyis zin pa la/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom
gang gru bzhi la/ /bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste/ /gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang / /yungs kar ga pur tsan+dan dang / /gla rtsi la sogs sman
sbyar te| |bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug /bum pa chu yis bkru bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sku
bsil byas pa'i chus/ /bkru zhing blud na rab tu phan/ /nad dang gnod pa kun las thar/ /'byung po brjed byed sha za yis/ /glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /byis
pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la/ /gi'u wang la ni sngags bzlas nas/ /snying po stobs chen 'di bris gdags/ /oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya/ dza Ti
laM bo d+ha ra/ u tsush+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT swAhA/ gtsang sbra byas te mgul bar gdags/ /de bzhin yungs kar dag la yang / /bzlas brjod byas te btum la gdags/ /
mkha' 'gro'i gdon gyis zin pa na/ /yungs kar dang ni gu gul la/ /sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdun bzlas/ /dud pas bdugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de la
the tshom mi za 'o/ /byis pa gdon dang nad las thar/ /bud med bu ni thogs gyur na/ /chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas/ /blud na legs par btsas par 'gyur/ /
bud med mo gsham bud med la/ /sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu/ /de la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya/ /khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la/ /chu de blud na bu tsha 'phen/ /rigs
brgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na/ /skud pa dang ni gos kyi grar/ /bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun/ /mdud cing bzlas te song ba na/ /
bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub/ /dgra dang nye zho med par 'gyur/ /yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na/ /shu dag tshon gang tsam pa la/ /mar srang sum brgya drug cu la/ /
bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang / /bum pa gcig tu blugs la dkrug /nyi ma re re lo gcig tu/ /shu dag gi ni dum re dang / /mar srang dag ni re re la/ /bzlas brjod re
re bya zhing bza'/ /de ni yid gzhungs blo ldan 'gyur/ /de bzhin ba ni ser skya ma'i/ /mar dang 'o ma dag la yang / /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/ /bzlas te 'o thug dkrug
cing bza'/ /yid gzhungs pa yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /mi dang 'grogs shing mdza' 'dod na/ /gang dag yid dang 'thad pa la/ /me tog dag ni rtswa shing la/ /'bras bu 'am ni
'ji ba dag /lag pa g.yas pa'i chang par bcug /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa gcig gdab/ /gang gi lag tu byin pa na/ /de dang rtag tu mdza' bar 'gyur/ /rta la sogs pa'i
phyugs rnams kun/ /'chi bar nye bar gnas pa na/ /chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la/ /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/ /de la gtor na sos par
'gyur| |yang na nyungs kar brgya brgyad la/ /bzlas pa'i thum po mgul du gdags/ /de ni nad med bde bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur na/ /yungs
kar la ni bzlas brjod bya/ /thum po byas te mgo la gdags/ /bzlas brjod brgyad stong 'bum yang bzlas/ /mi nad dang ni phyugs nad kun/ /ming yang med cing bde
bar 'gyur/ /de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni/ /'di dag kun tu rgya cher gsungs/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa
yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswAhA/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /gnod pas cis kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/ /dam chos
yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni/ /gang la dad pas yid ches na/ /'grub
par the tshom med par 'gyur/ /bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /ston pa shAkya'i thugs rje 'di/ /dge slong ner ban rak+Shi tas/ /
tho gar yul nas rnyed pa ste/ /'gro ba kun gyi dpal du shar/ /'phags pa rten cing 'brel pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pra tI t+ya sa
mut+pA da nA ma mahA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po la
sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha 'di
dag ni| mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis na/ ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang / lha dang bcas pa/
bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgyu las dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang / de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bla he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ ti ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA
shrA ma NaH/ chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi /rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ /dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/ /spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug /'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/ sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin
gshegs pa mthong ngo / /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten ni/ skyu ru
ra'i 'bru tsam/ srog shing ni/ khab tsam/ gdugs ni/ ba ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bzhugs
na| des tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsal nas nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da hri da ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi /rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ /dge sbyong chen po 'di skad gsungs
ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur
ro| |mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing zlog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'am/ mchod rten du byas par 'gyur/ mchod pa gang la dmigs te
brjod na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam phul bar 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying bo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya uSh+NI Sha dz+wa la nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod
skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nams sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ hUM hUM/

dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ phaT phaT/ sarba du ra ni mi d+hi du swAhA/ shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ sangs rgyas stong gi sngags 'di ni/ /gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes grags te/ /las rnams
gang dag stong phrag dang / /brgyad cu dang ni dgu phrag lnga/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams dang / /bkra shis dpal grags thams cad byed/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan gcig
bzlas pas sel bar byed/ /bgegs rnams ma lus rab tu 'jig /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon

mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ kha Te kha Te/ kha Ta bi kha Te/ tsa le bi tsa le/ bi lam bi ba le ba la pa te/ tsan dre tsa ra Ne/ a mr-i ta ni ra g+ho She/ rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa zhi bar
gyur cig swAhA/ nad pa'i sman la gdab bo/ /stong chen mo nas phyung ba sman la sngags kyi gdab pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sarba an ta rA li bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad
du| 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i grong shing a mra'i gnas zhes bya ba de'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ri la dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/ /

de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'chi 'pho'i chos su gyur te/ de'i tshe 'du byed kyi lhag ma lus pa'i snga ltas khong du chud nas skrag pa skyes te/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das

kyi gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ yang de'i tshe don du gnyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka
de'i phyir khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba bar du gcod pa tham
cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams ngas bshad kyis nyon cig/ tad+yA thA/ a b+ha yi b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya pa ri sho d+ha
ne| a b+ha ya/ a b+ha yaM da de/ ni du ba kI Sh+Te/ a na ku le/ a ku la pa ri sho d+ha ne/ a be ka la pa ne/ a ts+yu ti/ shu b+he shu b+ha/ te dzo te dza ba te/ sha ni u pa sha me/ ma ho pa
sha me/ me dri me t+yud d+hi te she/ to sha ya Na ga te/ sat+yad ra shi/ a bi rud b+hi/ sa ha te/ si hi ta twe/ arbe ar+tha sid+d+hi/ a mr-i te/ a mr-i ta ba he/ a b+hi te/ ba thra sa t+ye ak+Sha

ye| ak+Sha ya pra b+he/ dran hra ba re/ shud+d+he shud+d+he pra b+he/ a ba b+hA se/ a ba b+hA sa ba hi/ u ba yo ge/ A nu ha ha re/ sa ma tsit+te/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne/ shI le bi sho d+ha na/ a sad hA R+ye/ su ni gri hI/

ta ma ma ra bA lA nA ma/ pa ra dza yo driSh+Ti ga hra nAM/ dz+wa la naM d+harmo la kA le/ ud g+ha TanAM/ d+har+m+ma ni d+ha na s+ya saM gra ha nAM/ d+har+m+ma go sha s+ya/ kau shi ka khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi dag ni khyed kyi rig
pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dag go/ 'di bzlas brjod byas
na sngon gyi las kyi rnam bar smin pa ma gtogs par bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ don thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces

bka' stsal ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ de'i tshe 'di skad du/ kho bo lha las ma gyur la/ /'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du/ kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis/ /grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis/ /
zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /'di'i mthu thams cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyur cig /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni grub par gyur

cig /na mo a ke tu le na ge tsaN+Da na ye swAhA/ sarba ya twa sA d+ha ni ye swAhA/ sarba dad ye bi sho d+ha ni ye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin btsun
mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams

cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi ge brgya pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+hI kA nAM ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba trA pra ti ha tA bA p+ta d+harmA tA ba li nI/ a sa ma sa mas man+to nan+ta ba b+hi shA sa ni/ ha ra ha ra sma ra sma ra Na/ bi ga ta rA ga bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa
ra sa ma ba la/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya/ b+ha ga wAn mahA pa ra lak+Sha Ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la nA sA ga re swAhA// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/ te dza bid+yA/ hu ru me/ hu ru hu ru me/
kr-iSh+NA hu ru me swAhA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin pa'i
gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pra dz+nyA pa ra d+hA ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a

ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ e bi ba bi ba/ pra dz+nyA pa ra d+ha ni/ dza ra dza ra/ me d+ha pa ra d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi pa ra d+ha ni
swAhA| rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ nang re zhing rtsab mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thung na/ thos pa 'dzin par
'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki ni/ ba lo ka ni/ pra b+ha lo ki ni/ dzI ba ha pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+hi da ni
ya ga me/ a shA pa ri sho d+ha ni/ sarba satwa ma no ra the/ kA ya sid+d+he shru ti d+hA ra NI smr-i ti d+ha na swAhA/ cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a ba marga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod
byas te nang re zhing zos na/ nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lobs so/ /zla ba drug gi bar du byas na/ thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sh+lau ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so// //
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
lo| |tad+ya thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swAhA/ gdong 'khru ba'i tshe chu khyor gang la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam bdun bzlas te 'thungs na/ nyin gcig kyang yi ga sh+lau ka brgya lobs
par 'gyur te/ sngon lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /sh+lau ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bI re bI re/ ma hA te dze te dza ma ti d+hA ra NI/ shru ta d+hA ra
Ni| dza yan+ti bi dza yan+ti ma ti d+hA ra NI swAhA/ sman bra ma hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du
'thungs na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos pa nyin zhag gcig la
sh+lau ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /sh+lau ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tri shA tri shu la shA khi/ AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ ba re na/ bu ha la/
mr-i da d+hA tu swAhA/ cho ga ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te ci 'byor bas mchod pa byas la/ chu la sngags kyis btab
ste bzhag nas nang bar chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang sbags te zos na/ zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang sh+lau ka stong lobs par 'gyur
ro| |yid ches pa'i rtags yod do/ /sh+lau ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med
ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/
ka ba tsa kat+Na la la ta swAhA/ chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i cho ga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
sbyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la/ dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang sbags te bza' ba lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na/ nyin gcig kyang yi
ge sh+lau ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /sh+lau ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/ te dzA bid+ya/ hu ru me ha ra hu ru kr-iD+Na hu ru me swAhA/ shu dag dkar po
la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /mi brjed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pU dza me g+ha nA ma
d+hA ra Ni| bod skad du/ mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ badzra sA ra pra marda ne/ ta thA ga

tA ya| ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ ma hA te dza badzra/ ma hA bid+ya swAhA/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta badzre/ ma hA bo d+hi maN+Do pa saM kra ma Na badzre/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi
shod+ha na badzre swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i
rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur zhing zhabs la phyag byas bar 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos
gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan thams cad dang / gdan dang / gdang ba dang / na bza' dang / spyan gzigs dang / bshos gtsang la sogs pa dang /
rgyan dang / lhab lhub thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba ba'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams phyi
bzhin yang dag par 'brang zhing srung ba dang / skyob ba dang / sbed par byed do/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi
khyad par 'di dag ni/ ma bsgrubs par lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i sbrin ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya
a pa ri mi ta gu Na a nu shiM sA nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a mi ta b+hAya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM b+hud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i te/ a mr-i tod b+ha be/ a mr-i ta sam+b+ha be/ a mr-i ta bi kran+te/ a mr-i
ta ga mi ni/ ga ga na/ ga ri ti ka re/ sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ lan gcig brjod pas bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa
'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/ sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas stong gis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thob par
'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//
lan gnyis 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phan yon gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yod na yang mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin no/ /'phags pa yon tan bsngags
pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sarba d+harma nA tr-i ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yum
zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas ngang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i
gzungs/ nad thams cad rtu zhi bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs te/ nga yang da ltar 'chad pa zungs shig / tad+ya thA/ a brte/ a brte/ bi
brte| bi brte/ b+ha ga ma shud d+he/ pra b+ha swa re/ ta ra Ne/ ug ka le/ mug kha le/ sarba d+harmAHpA sha pa N+yai swAhA/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang 'di'i snying po brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ats+tsha/ a na le e lu pha a lu phe murta a mug+te/ sarba d+harma a
d+hi ba ti ya prad+ta/ sna ka ra/ a d+hi ga ta dz+nyA ne/ bi shud+d+he pa ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan ba kun dga' po dang / thams cad dang ldan
ba'i 'khor de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon po par bstod do/ /chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar
skad du| AR+ya ba la ba ti nA ma pra d+yaM gi ri/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyir ldog pa stobs can zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po snying chen po dang dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba can/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang yug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung po
thams cad 'gog pa/ rims thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad 'gog pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar gyi gdon dang / 'byung lo'i gdon thams cad rnam
par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad 'joms pa/ mi mdza' ba thams cad so sor rengs par byed pa/ te skyong ba/ srog skyob pa'i phyir zlog pa 'di brjod par bya'o/ /

tad+ya thA| a ba lo ki te/ a ba lo ki te/ saM b+ha be/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ba ra ba ra ba ra ba ra/ kA le kA le kA le/ ma hA kA la a ba lo ki te/ pra sA d+ha ne/ d+ha me d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha ma
ni| sa mA hi te/ bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las srung du gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ yongs
su gzung du gsol/ yongs su bskyang du gsol/ zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ chad pa spang bar mdzad du gsol/ mtshon cha spang bar
mdzad du gsol/ mtshams gcad par mdzad du gsol/ sa bcing bar mdzad du gsol/ ku ru ku ru pa na mak+Shi/ bi d+hi bi d+hi bi d+hi/ marga saM pra swa re/ a mr-i ta te dza ba ti/
gnod pa thams cad las bdag la rtag tu srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ mu lu mu lu mu lu/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri/ ba le ba le/ ta ra ta ra/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa ni/
kha kha re| d+huM d+huM d+huM ni/ bdag 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ dza yaM ku ru ku ru/ phu ru phu ru swAhA/ a ma
le swAhA| a mr-i te swAhA/ 'phags pa phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ma ti ba hu l+ye/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na/

ra sha ne pra dz+nyA pa ta/ gaM b+hI re/ bo d+hi maN+DA nu sa ri Ni/ a bi d+ha/ ta mon d+ha/ ka ri ba d+ha ma ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+nyA dI pe/ me d+ha pa di na sarba a d+hiSh+The te/ su ru su ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/
ma d+hA A na ya swAhA/ cho ga ni nang re zhing bzlas brjod byas na/ slobs skyen par 'gyur ro/ /sman bram hi snyim par bcug ste dud pa phyung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te/ zos na
thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ a gra bid+yA man+t+ra/ bod skad du/
mchog thob pa'i rig sngags/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dung can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsnyen ba rdzogs par byed pa/ gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa/ longs spyod
'phel bar byed pa/ dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa/ 'khor 'phel bar byed pa/ tshe 'phel bar byed pa/ dgra zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs zhi bar byed pa'o/ /dkon
mchog gsum la mchod pa phul pa/ sems byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tad+ya

thA/ oM shang+khi ni de bi ta A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ tiSh+Tha d+ha ne d+ha na dza ye/ brI brI br-I d+d+hi ka ri/ d+h+rI d+h+rI/ d+h+ri ti ka rI nAn/ bi bid+yA be sha bsta/ A yur+d+ha ra Ni yu yu/ A yuSh+bA
la ni ta thA ga tA sma ra bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ma tI laM bo da ra/ de hi me ba ra na shang+khi ni swAhA/ bdag dge ba 'di nyid kyis sbrul pa'i sku 'di nyid du mthong bar gyur cig /stong pa nyid
la bzod pa thob par gyur cig /stong pa nyid kyi don mthong bar gyur cig /stong pa nyid kyis don byed par gyur cig /'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro//
'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //oM na mo b+ha ga ba te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+ne rat+ne ma hA rat+ne rat+na

bi dza ye swAhA/ zhes lan brgyad brjod pas phyag bya'o// //na maHsarba bud+d+hA bo d+hi satwA naM/ sarba tra saM ku su mi dA b+hi dz+nyA rA si ni na mo stu te swAhA/ zhes lan brgyad brjod pas bstod pa'o// //oM sarba ta thA ga tA pU

dza me g+ha pra sa ra sa mU he s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na kaM hUM zhes pas mchod pa byin gyis brlab bo/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sarba thA ung+ga te s+pha ra na i maM ga ga na khaM sa man+ta swAhA/ zhes lan brgyad brjod pas mchod pa'i

sbrin 'byung ngo / /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/ sarba bi ta pU ra pU ra/ a brtA a b+ha ye swAhA/ zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa dang nye gnas dang zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas par
'gyur ro// //rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha bi dza ya kalpa gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo//
de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni/ /khro bo 'di ming gshin rje gshed/ /mtshon cha me lce 'bar bas 'khrugs/ /drag la mthu rtsal drag ldan pa/ /de mthong nas ni khro bo
gzhan| |thams cad kyi ni lag cha shor/ /de bzhin du ni 'jig rten pa'i/ /lha rnams lus kyis 'dud par byed/ /gzhan yang thal mo sbyar byas te/ /skrag nas bstod pa
mang po byed/ /lha rnams mang po ji snyed kun/ /'jam dpal khro bo'i gzi brjid kyis/ /gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa/ /bcom ldan bdag cag sangs rgyas dang / /chos
dang dge 'dun skyabs mchis kyi/ /rab tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gzi brjid 'bar bas phyogs khyab pa/ /khams gsum 'khrug par mdzad pa mthong / /gang tshe
lha dang lha min rnams/ /skrag nas skyabs su dong ba na/ /de tshe 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni/ /khro bo slar yang zhi bar 'gyur/ /gshin rje gshed ces bya ba yi/ /khro bo chen po zhi ba
la| |de nas skyabs su dong ba yi/ /lha rnams kun gyis zhus pa ni/ /khyod kyi brtson 'grus mchog 'tshal bas/ /ji lta bur na mnyes par bgyi/ /ji ltar yang ni dang bar
'gyur| |bdag cag the tshom chen po mchis/ /khro bos lha rnams tshig gsan nas/ /gshin rje'i gshed kyis bka' stsal ba/ /lha rnams thams cad khyod nyon cig /
da ni dus gsum sngon du 'byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi sngon du byung / /nga ni dus gsum phyis kyang 'byung / /nga ni dus gsum da ltar 'byung / /nga ni lnga
brgya tha ma'i tshe/ /nga yi bstan pa 'byung bar byed/ /bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe/ /nga yi bstan pa 'byung bar byed/ /las ngan mtshams med byed pa'i tshe/ /de tshe nga yi
bstan pa 'byung / /zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe/ /de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung / /gos ngan dug hrul gyon pa'i tshe/ /de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung / /nga ni dus gsum 'byung ba'i sku//
bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe/ /de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung / /ji lta bur ni zhir 'gyur yang / /nga ni thams cad zhi ba'i sku/ /ji lta bur ni khros gyur kyang / /thams cad
khros pa nga yi sku/ /gzi brjid chen po khyed rnams kun/ /gang tshe gsum la skyabs song ba/ /de tshe nga yi mi bzad pa/ /khro bo yid la gnas par gyis/ /dkon mchog gsum ni
gnas pa dang / /de yi bka' yang bskyang ba dang / /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /nga yi yid ni zhi 'gyur gyi/ /khyed rnams skyabs su dong ba yi/ /byang chub sems
dang ldan pa yi/ /thams cad don ni sgrub pa'i mchog /yi ge 'bru ni bcu bdun po/ /nga yi snying po yid las byung / /lha rnams kun gyis gzung bar gyis/ /gshin rje'i
gshed po bdag nyid kyi/ /snying po rab tu gsungs pa na/ /de nas sa ni g.yos par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu 'khrugs/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang / /sha za la sogs
phung bar 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /yan lag kun nas sbu langs nas/ /gshin rje'i gshed po khro bo yi/ /khro bo snying po de gzung ngo / /de nas dam chos
bsrung ba'i phyir/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /rtog pa 'di ni de dag la/ /gshin rje'i gshed kyis rgyas par gsungs/ /de nas khro bo rnam rgyal gyis/ /rtog pa khro bo nyid kyis
gsungs/ /snying rje byang chub sems ldan pa'i/ /lha rnams kyis thos dga' gyur nas/ /dkon mchog gsum ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /so so yi ni rtog pa bshad/ /de dag gi ni rtsa
ba'i rgyud/ /khro bo nyid kyis rab gsungs pa/ /khro bo rnam rgyal zhes bya 'di/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pas/ /sngon nas phyag byas khro bo yi/ /zhal nas ji bzhin thos
nas kyang / /khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /rgyud 'di byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /snying rjes de bzhin rgyas pa dang / /rnam pa mang por byin gyis brlabs/ /'jam dpal gyi
rtsa ba'i rtog pa khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i skabs te dang po'o// //de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal/ /'jam dpal khro bos bshad pa yi/ /rtag
pa rmad du byung ba'i mchog /mdor ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /de la 'di yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa'i/ /'jig
rten gsum po 'khrugs par mdzad/ /yi dwags mang po zhes bya'o/ /thams cad du ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gnas ni gang du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags pas thog ma
nyid du ni/ /de yi gnas ni brtag par bya/ /shing gcig pa 'am dur khrod dang / /khyim stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /mchod rten dang ni mu gnyis dang / /thibs po stong pa
lam srang rnying / /skyed mos tshal dang ri yi rtse/ /chu yi 'gram dang nags tshal dang / /yang na mtsho yi 'gram dang ni/ /lha chen gyi ni gnas kyang rung / /ba lang lhas sam
g.yul gyis/ /khyad par du ni yul gtsang bar/ /gang du yid ni dga' bar yang / /der ni dkyil 'khor rab tu bya/ /de nas rig 'dzin nan tan gyis/ /sa ni yang dag
sbyang bya ste/ /ba tshwa med cing ma gas pa/ /mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa la/ /shar dang byang ni mtho ba dang / /kha dog snum ba lhag par bzang / /ba las byung ba rnam lnga dang //
ldan pa yi ni lci bas byug /ci rigs par ni byugs nas kyang / /slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas nas/ /smyung ba byas te mnyam bzhag nas/ /khro bo'i srung bas byin gyis
brlab| |yi dwags phal chen zhes bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gsang mchog nub mo bri/ /zar ma'i ras sam ras bal las/ /thig skud sum sgril mdzes pa yi/ /gru bzhi dang
ni sgo bzhi par/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig btab ste/ /thog mar shar dang byang nas ni/ /lho dang nub kyi bar du'o/ /thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas/ /de nas kyang ni
drang bar bya/ /shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni/ /nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /thig gis rab tu tshad byas te/ /gru bzhi par ni thig gdab bo/ /rim pa gcig pa mdzes
pa la| |sgo bzhi dag gis mdzes par bya/ /lho phyogs kyi ni sgo phye la/ /lhag ma rnams ni gcad par bya/ dkyil 'khor dang ni 'tsham pa yi/ /dbus su pad+mo bri bar bya/ /pad+ma
dang ni phyogs bzhi sgo/ /the tshom med par mnyam par bya/ /mdzes byed sgo yi phyed du bya/ /'gram pa 'dam ma'i tshad dang mnyam/ /nye ba yi ni mdzes byed kyang / /mdzes byed dang ni
'dra bar bya/ /cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor te/ /kun tu thig ni btab nas kyang / /phyi nas tshul bzhin rig 'dzin gyis/ /dur khrod thal bas bri ba ni/ /rtag tu byang shar la sogs
pa'i| |gra yi nang ni de dag tu/ /mkhas pas be con phyag rgya bri/ /phyogs kyi sgor ni yi dwags bzhag /gzhan yang yi dwags lnga pa ni/ /pad+ma'i steng du bsam par bya/ /de bzhin phyi
sgo'i nang dag tu/ /phyogs rnams de dag thams cad du/ /mi ro mgo med yi dwags rnams/ /dur khrod thal bas dngar te bri/ /de phyir yi dwags phal
chen yin/ /khru gang la sogs rim pa nas/ /khru brgyad pa yi bar du ste/ /de las lhag par yong mi bri/ /rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa ni/ /khru gang ba ni bri bar bya/ /zhi ba dang
ni rgyas pa dang / /mi rgyal sgrub pa khru dor bstan/ /sems can kun ni bskrad pa dang / /de bzhin gzhig la khru gsum pa/ /khru bzhi dbang dang dgug pa yi/ /las rnams kyi
ni mchog tu gsungs/ /khru lnga nad dang mi nad dang / /dgra rnams med par brtsal ba'i mchog /khru drug bgegs rnams thams cad dang / /gdon rnams nges par
zlog par byed/ /khru bdun pa ni lha yi rnams/ /dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams byed/ /khru brgyad pa ni dngos grub kun/ /sbyin sreg mchog tu shes par bya/ /de ltar
ci rigs bris nas ni/ /de nas gtsang mas nye reg bya/ /chu yi phyir ni chu yi ni snod/ /chus ni rab tu dgang bar bya/ /de bzhin me tog don du yang / /me tog sdug gu dri
zhim dang / /me tog phreng bas snod mchog gzhan/ /legs par dgang zhing mdzes par bya/ /dri yi don du bya ba ni/ /tsan+dan dkar po dmar po blang / /a ga ru dang sbyar ba yi//
gu gul bdug pa de bzhin no/ /mar me mar gyi mar me dang / /mkhas pas snying po 'jam pa'o/ /drag po yi ni las ngag la/ /mi yi tshil gyis bya bar bshad/ /gtor ma nya
dang sha la sogs/ /sbyar dug la sogs lhag par dbul/ /de ltar der ni tshogs bsags nas/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas te//
byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs nas ni/ /ri mo yi ni las rnams dag /gal te 'bri bar mi nus na/ /yi dwags phal chen dbus dag tu/ /pad+ma sngar bris gang yin pa/ /de yi steng
du yi dwags ni/ /mkhas pas yid kyis bsam par bya/ /yi dwags kyi ni sngags mchog gis/ /bsam pa dag ni byas nas kyang / /gra yi be con bzhi po yang / /sngags nyid kyis/
ni bsam par bya/ /gal te 'bri bar nus na ni/ /sngags nyid steng du gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi yi dwags bzhi po yang / /gal te bri bar ma nus na/ /de bzhin yi dwags 'dzin sngags
kyis| |byin gyis rlob par gsungs pa yin/ /de yi nang du rang sngags kyis/ /byin gyis brlab bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rkang lag mgo bo dpung ba dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang dpung pa
dang / /gzhan yang de bzhin lag pa'i phreng / /thod pa keng rus mi lpags rlon/ /ro yi phreng ba bsam par bya/ /de yi nang du rang sngags kyis/ /byin gyis brlab tu gzhug par bya/
da ltar cho ga bzhin bsam nas/ /mjug tu khro bo gshen rje'i gshed/ /sngags brjod pas ni spyan drangs nas/ /rang gi snying pos bzhugs su
gsol| |khro bo 'khrugs pa 'jigs mdzad pa/ /sku ni me lce 'bar ba 'dra/ /gzi brjid 'phags pa bsam pa ni/ /sku mdog stang zil bcag 'phro 'dra/ /zhal drug skra
yang kham par 'dug /smin ma kham pa mig kyang ser/ /spyan gsum mig ni zlum pa ste/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis pa yi gzugs/ /de bzhin yi dwags steng na bzhugs/ /zhabs
drug gis ni mdzes par byas/ /tri shul ral gri dbyug dgra sta/ /sbyin pa'i phyir ni phyag brkyang ba/ /lcags kyu yi ni mtshon cha dag /g.yas pa'i phyag na de bzhin bsnams//
de bzhin g.yon pa'i drug po yang / /thod pa mdung thung mda' po che/ /mdzub mos bsdigs dang zhags pa rnams/ /phyag na dbyug tho bsam par bya/ /mi mgo rlon dang skam
po dang / /yi dwags phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol/ /sku yang che la gsus khyim che/ /zhal gyi dbyibs ni du ma ste/ /skra ni rgya mtsho 'khrugs
pa 'dra| |zhal gcig bzhad cing zhal gcig zhi/ /zhal gcig 'jigs par bgrang pa'i zhal/ /zhal gcig zhal ni gdangs pa ste/ /ljags kyang bskyod par mdzad pa
dang / /zhal gcig kyang ni mche ba gtsigs/ /de ltar snying pos legs par na/ /spyan drangs mchod yon dbul bar bya/ /de nas dri dang sbyar ba'i chus/ /mchod yon cho ga bzhin
phul nas/ /yi dwags kyi ni spyi bor yang / /me tog dmar po gzhag par bya/ /blo chen gyis ni khro bo la/ /de nas tsan+dan dmar po dbul/ /dri yi 'og tu me tog rnams/ /tsan+dan gyi
ni gtor ma dbul/ /me tog me tog phreng ba rnams/ /me tog sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /me tog sngags kyis rim bzhin du/ /me tog cho ga bzhin phul nas/ /rang gi snying po
sngags kyis kyang / /khro bo yi ni spyi bo dang / /khro ba gtso bo'i snying gar ni/ /snying po rnam par dgod par bya/ /mtshog mar de yi mtshog ma dang / /de yi gtsug tu spyi gtsug gzhag/
de yi lus la go cha dang / /mtshon cha'i tshogs la mtshon bzhag ste/ /'di skad bstan pa 'di dag ni/ /me tog dag gis dgod par bya/ /de ltar ci rigs mchod nas kyang / /
bdug pa rang gi sngags kyis dbul/ /de nas mar me 'ba' bar ba/ /phyogs brgyad du yang dgod par bya/ /'byung po'i gtor ma khro bo la/ /phul nas yi dwags phal chen gyi//
phyi rol tu ni mkhas pa yis/ /smre gtor rnams ni sbyin par bya/ /khro bo gtso la da phyogs te/ /de nas yang ni bdug pa dbul/ /de yi phyi rol chu bcas snod/ /me tog gis ni
bkang ste gzhag /cho gas khrus kyi smyung ba yi/ /slob ma dag ni bos nas kyang / /sngags kun gyis ni gzi bskyed la/ /khro bo yi ni snying po yis/ /lag gnyis
me tog bin nas ni/ /gos kyis gdod ni g.yogs par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni dran byas la/ /slob dpon gyis ni gzhug par bya/ /rang gi snying pos me tog nyid/ /dkyil
'khor la ni gtor du gzhug /de nas be con zhes pa yi/ /phyag rgya sngags pas de la bstan/ /dkon mchog gsum ni gsang ba yi/ /dam tshig de la sbyin par bya/ /de nas grub
par bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags pas chu dang me tog gis/ /khro bo'i gtso bo'i gsang sngags dag/ /dbang bskur nas ni de la sbyin/ /de nas khro bo snying po yi/ /cho ga bzhin du dbang
bskur nas/ /me tog bdug pa'i phreng ba yis/ /snying po de la sbyin par bya/ /khro bo yi ni snying po mchog /des kyang de ltar mnos nas ni/ /de nas bla mas phyag byas nas/ /ci nus
sbyin pas mchod par bya/ /sngags pas bla ma mchod byas nas/ /dngos grub thob 'gyur gzhan du min/ /slob ma snying po byin nas kyang / /phreng ba tsan+dan la sogs pas/ /mchod
nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /phyi rol du ni sngar bzhag pa'i/ /dri chu la sogs bkang ba'i snod/ /de blangs mchod yon phul nas ni/ /'jam dbyangs khro bo mi bzad pa'i/ /mthu rtsal drag
po gshegs su gsol/ /bzhud nas kyang ni yon chu de/ /dkyil 'khor la yang dbul bar bya/ /rgya chen sa yi dkyil 'khor na/ /dngos grub mtshungs med 'dod pa yi/ /rig sngags
'chang gis de ltar ni/ /mchod pa rtag tu legs par bya/ /de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las/
yi dwags phal po che'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ pre ta mu kha kha da

kla swAhA| dbus kyi yi dwags kyi'o/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ a kro d+ha bi dzA ya/ ag+ni ra dz+wA li ti dzi he pre he shwa ri hUM phaT/ 'di ni/ grwa'i be con bzhi'i sngags so/ /oM na maHsarba

ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ oM pre ta thod lak+pa ya hUM phaT/ shar gyi sgo'i yi dwags kyi'o/ /oM pre ta big+h+nan+ta ka hUM phaT/ lho sgo'i yi dwags kyi'o/ /oM pre ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ nub kyi sgo'i yi dwags

kyi'o| |oM k+Shi pra pre to ta ki Ta hUM phaT/ byang sgo'i yi dwags kyi'o/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ pre ta mA le bi kr-i te/ pre ta mA le bi kr-i te/ pre ta mA le bi kr-i te/ gu h+ye pe tsi ka mu khaM sarba
rak+Sho pa dz+wUSh+To hUM phaT/ yi dwags phreng ba'i 'o/ /'di ni/ yi dwags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi tshogs so/ /da ni/ khro bo gshin rje'i gshed sbyan dngas pa la sogs pa'i sngags
la sogs pa 'byung ngo / /oM na ma bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+he b+h+yaH/ kro d+ha ba ra bi ra sarba ma ye na/ A gats+tsha a gats+tsha/ oM AHhUM/ i daM pre ta/ A sa na Na/ pre ta ta
ga ta na rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed spyan drangs pa'i sngags so/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la te bi gra ha hUM phaT/ go cha'i 'o/ /oM a kro d+he kA ya man+ta ka ha na ma
thA b+ha ny+tsa hUM phaT/ 'di ni/ khro bo'i rgyal po gang gi rtog pa 'di yin pa de'i sngags yi ge 'bru bcu bdun pa'o/ /oM AHhUM/ de nyid kyi snying po'o/ /oM kA la hUM phaT/ mtshog
ma'i'o| |oM ya man+ta ka e ka bI ra hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug gi'o/ /oM bai bas swa tAn+ta ka hUM/ mtshon cha'i'o/ /'di ni/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi yan lag lnga pa'o//
oM e ka bI ra ya man+ta ka bi sa ra swAhA/ mchod yon 'bul ba'i sngags so/ /oM b+hi mAn+ta ka te dzo ba lin ni swAhA/ lha bshos kyi sngags so/ /oM wA ka tsi ta sho ni tra ra tra/ saM
gan+d+ha bi gra ha swAhA/ dri'i sngags so/ /oM dI bya sre ka ma l+ya d+ha ri Ne swAhA/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM tsi ti d+hu pa bri yA ya swAhA/ bdug pa'i sngags so/ /oM dI bya dz+yo ti Sh+Tha te
