par gnas su/ /khro bo sgom dang rab ldan pas/ /khro bo'i gzugs su gnas nas ni/ /rtse gcig tu yang tshig gi mchog /grub pa mchog ni
sbyin par byed/ /thogs pa med par 'jam dpal mthong / /ji ltar rig pa'i don bzhin du'o/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs
pa ste bzhi pa'o// //khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /skul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis gzhag /skul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis mthar/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil
pa'o| |khro bo chen po phreng ba dang / /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'di yi mthar/ /kun tu dang po g.yo ba dang / /sngags shes tsham ngam mdzes pa yi/ /he la'i 'khor lo la
gnas te/ /dang po gnas su 'dug nas su/ /be con phyag rgya lan gcig bcing / /de nas khro bo'i sngags bzlas pa/ /sngags pa 'greng ste 'dug pa ni/ /rkang pa gnyis
ni bsgyur ba dang / /khro bo sgom pa 'di la ni/ /sems ni rab tu zhen byas nas/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yos pa 'am/ /ri dwags g.yo ba'i bar du 'o/ /de nas 'khor lo
sgrub pa yis/ /gnyis pa'i gnas la song nas su/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig mthar gnas/ /skoms shig ces par dbang bskur ro/ /de tshig thog mar bkod nas ni/ /
de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar/ /rdo rje me yi rgyal po'i sngags/ /rab tu g.yo ba mdzes pa dang / /tsham ngam gsal ba dag la gnas/ /
be con phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /khro bo bsgoms pas sngags bzlas so/ /rab tu sbyor ba'i thabs 'di ni/ /mtsho dang rdzing chen klung chen rnams/ /khros pas myur du skem par
byed| |'bab chu dag kyang gyen du 'bebs/ /khro bo mthu chen gnon ldan pa/ /sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya/ /rtsibs rnams rim pas kun mnan pa/ /gnyis po de las
'phos nas su/ /de nas gsum pa'i gnas la 'dug /mthu rtsal ldan pas rim par mnan/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /bskrad par byos zhes tshig gnyis bskul/ /
de ni snga ma bzhin bkod nas/ /de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar/ /rab tu drag pa'i shugs gzhag go /rnam par skrag byed gsal ba yis/ /
khro bo tsham ngam bsnyen par gnas/ /glang po myos pa'i shugs can dag /mngon du 'ong bar gyur na yang / /de ma thag tu skrag par byed/ /myos pa'i shugs kyang rab tu 'dor/ /
slad du log par phan tshun du/ /bskor zhing mi dga' bzhin du 'gro/ /glang po'i rgyal po de myos shing / /bde ba ma thob babs par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa khro bo sgom pa yi/ /cho
ga'i tshul ni de bzhin no/ /he la'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i/ /bzhi pa'i gnas la 'dug nas kyang / /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /non cig ces pa'i
tshig gnyis bskul/ /de nas cho ga sngar bshad pas/ /bdud rtsi'i 'khyil pa gzhag par bya/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba de yi mthar/ /khro bo chen po stobs chen gzhag /
kun tu sdom pa mdzes pa yi/ /tsham ngam gyis ni mi g.yor mnan/ /dpung ngam yang na glang po 'am/ /gru 'am yang na shing rta 'am/ /rta dang rnga mo lug la sogs/ /
khro bo bsgoms pa'i tshul bzhin byas/ /sbyor ba de la gnas nas ni/ /rab tu mnan pa byas par 'gyur/ /de nas he la zhes bya ba'i/ /'khor lo lnga pa la gnas nas/ /
khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /dkrugs shig dkrugs shig tshig gnyis gzhag /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang / /mtha' yi tshig gi gnas su gzhag /khro bo rgya
chen zhes bya ba/ /rab tu 'bar bar gyur par bya/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang / /rab tu 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i/ /tsham ngam mchog gis myur du ni/ /dgra
yi dpung rnams phan tshun du/ /rab tu rnam par dkrug par bya/ /de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/ /rim pa drug la gnas nas ni/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /
rmongs par gyur ces tshig gnyis bskul/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang / /tshig gi tha mar kun tu gzhag /khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin du bskul/
rmongs par byed pa'i tsham ngam gyis/ /cho ga bzhin du rab bskul nas/ /ri mo dag la gnas pa bzhin/ /'gro ba myur du rmongs par 'gyur/ /de nas he la'i 'khor lo 'di/ /
rim bdun pa la gnas nas su/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /sgrogs shig sgrogs shig tshig gnyis gzhag /khro bo 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa
skul bar byed/ /'jigs par gyur pa'i sgra sgrog pa/ /khro bo'i tsham ngam myur bar ni/ /dus min par yang sprin gyis khebs/ /de nas 'dod bzhin char pa 'bebs/ /
de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/ /rtsi bas kyi rim pa brgyad pa la/ /gnas nas 'dir ni snga ma bzhin/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /he he sa bon gnyis bzhag nas/ /de
yi 'og tu bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /khro bo zur du de bzhin du/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i tha mar gzhag /khro bo tsham ngam kha gdangs pa/ /mchog ces bya ba myur bar ni/ /rkang pa
ya gcig gdangs pa'i stabs/ /sad dang ser ba rlung la sogs/ /dus sam yang na dus min par/ /sgrub pa khro bo bsgoms pa yis/ /khro bo'i sngags kyi tshul bzhin
du| |sa yi steng du 'bebs par byed/ /he la'i 'khor lo gnas brgyad po/ /sgrub pa yi ni sar bo nas/ /khro bo'i sa bon tshig gsal ba/ /dgu ba bzang
po la gnas te/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /slong zhig pa yi tshig gnyis bskul/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi/ /tha mar phongs pa sgrol ba gzhag /khro bo bsgoms
pas mdzes pa yi/ /tsham ngam gsal ba byas nas ni/ /khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po bzlas/ /khro bo nyid kyi tshig gis gsal/ /hUM zhes bya ba bzang po yis/ /khro bo dngos
por bsgoms nas ni/ /shing gi rtse dang yal ga dgug/ /yang na shing chen rtsa nas 'byin/ /me tog 'bras bu glog pa 'am/ /yang na 'dod bzhin g.yo bar byed/ /ljon
shing chen po rnams kyang ni/ /ji ltar 'dod par mi g.yor 'gyur/ /he la zhes bya'i 'khor lo yi/ /rtsibs ni bcu pa la gnas nas/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /
choms shig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bskul/ /khro bo chen po rab 'joms pa/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i mthar/ /snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /'jigs par byed
pa'i tsham ngam byed/ /ri chen dag gi rtse mo dang / /sgo dang lugs sgrog rnams kyi ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal por sngon bzhin du/ /bsgoms na rab mchog grub byed pa/ /he
la yi ni 'khor lo yi/ /rtsibs ni bcu gcig la gnas te/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /snyil cig ces pa'i tshig gis bskul/ /khro bo kI li kI la yis/ /bdud
rtsi 'khyil pa bskul bya ba/ /tshig gi tha mar gnas pa ste/ /cho ga bzhin du bshad pa bzhin/ /kI li kI la zhes bya ba/ /tsham ngam mchog la de bzhin gnas/ /be con
gyi ni phyag rgya bcings/ /gshin rje'i gshed po bsgoms pa ni/ /ri chen rtsa ba brtan pa yang / /rtse mo nas kyang snyel bar byed/ /yang na ri khar skye ba yi/ /brtan pa'i shing
rnams 'gyel bar byed/ /de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/ /bcu gnyis pa yi rtsibs la gnas/ /khro bo chan po'i tshig gi mthar/ /zhugs shig ces pa'i tshig gis bskul/ /
bskul nas de yi tha mar ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba gzhag par bya/ /khro chen kI li kI la ya/ /de yi tha mar gzhag par bya/ /kA li kI la chen po zhes/ /bya ba'i tsham ngam de
bzhin bya/ /be con phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed/ /yid la rab tu goms byas na/ /rtsig pa shing skam rdo la sogs/ /babs na phyung ste
nam mkhar gnas/ /nam mkha' la ni byung nas kyang / /'dod pa bzhin du ltung bar byed/ /'di ni rang byung ngo mtshar la/ /dI ni dus gsum sngon du byung / /spyod pa
gzhan yang snga ma bzhin/ /khro bo bsgoms pas byed par gsungs/ /he la'i 'khor lo dgod pa ni/ /rab tu gsang ba yin par bshad/ /gsang dang
bcas shing sbyor bcas pa/ /shes na dngos grub theb par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang ci rigs par/ /cham ngam bcu gnyis sbyor ba dag /mdo dang rgyas pa'i tshul
dag gis /da ni rab tu bshad pa bya/ /kun tu g.yo ba dang po yin/ /de bzhin rab tu g.yo bar bshad/ /skrag par byed pa gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa kun tu sdom par
byed| |rab tu 'khrug ces bya ba lnga/ /rmongs par byed pa de bzhin drug /myur ba tsham ngam de la gnas/ /kha gdangs pa ni brgyad par bshad/ /mdzes zhes bya ba dgu
pa ste| |'jigs par byed pa bcu pa yin/ /kI li kI la zhes bya dang / /kI li kI la chen po yi/ /khro bo tsham ngam bcu gnyis so/ /'di dag rim bzhin bshad pa yin/ /
thog mar bsdigs pa'i rim pa yis/ /pe con phyag rgya ldan par bya/ /phyi nas rang gzugs ji bzhin du/ /sngags pa ngag gis shes par bya/ /rang gi gzugs kyang
rab gnas pa/ /bsdigs shing tsham ngam byed la sogs/ /skrag par byed pa'i kha ni zab/ /khro bo'i lta ba gdon 'gyur ba/ /rkang pa 'gyed par bzhag pa dag /
tsham ngam mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/ /rkang pa ya gcig myur du bzhag /gdong dang nu 'jing yon po byas/ /khro gnyer 'jigs par byed par bsnyer/ /g.yon pa mdzub mo gcig
gis bsdigs/ /tsham ngam byed cing be con gdengs/ /gdong dang brla dang rkang pa g.yon/ /kun tu g.yo zhes bya ba ste/ /khro bo tsham ngam snyems dang bcas/ /kun tu g.yo
ba'i rim gsungs la/ /rab tu g.yo zhes bya ba ni/ /cung zad du ni dbus dman pa'o/ /rab tu g.yo ba brtag par bya/ /de bzhin dpung brkyang pa dang / /rkang pa g.yon
pa gdangs pa dang / /lag gnyis drag tu rdob pa ni/ /de bzhin skrag par byed par bshad/ /be con la ni lta bar gtad/ /rkang pa g.yas pa gsal bar 'phyar/ /de ni
kun tu sdom par bshad/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs par byed/ /dpung pa gdengs pa g.yon bzhin du/ /mig ni mdzub mo gcig la gtad/ /rkang pa g.yas pa
'phyar ba ni/ /kun tu 'khrug pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang pa g.yon pa gdangs byas te/ /g.yon phyogs su ni 'phyar zhing bskor/ /dpung pa brkyang pa'i be con gdengs/ /bsdigs
pa gcig tu rmongs par byed/ /myur du tsham ngam zhes bya ba/ /de nyid dpung brdabs bsdigs pa'o/ /de nyid las ni kha gdangs pa/ /kha gdangs pa zhes bsgrags pa yin/ /
sran dang bcas la bzhi ni bskor/ /mthu rtsal che ba'i stabs su stsol/ /mchu yi mtha' ma so yis mnan/ /lag pa phyar te bsdigs par byed/ /
snyems dang bcas shing sgra yang 'byin/ /'jigs par byed pa'i hUM bsgrags pa'i/ /tsham ngam legs par bshad pa ni/ /mdzes pa'i khro bos gnon pa 'o/ /btsan
thabs su na bskor bar bya/ /rkang pa g.yas pa btsugs te mnan/ /lag pa gnyis ka drag rdob pa/ /byas nas 'jigs par bya ba ni/ /de bzhin snyems dang bcas
bshad pa/ /tsham ngam bdag nyid chen po 'di/ /'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ste/ /rtag tu khro bo sgom pa'o/ /rkang pa mnyam par bzhag ste 'dug/ g.yas pa cung
zad mtho bar bya/ /dpal dang ldan pas g.yon pa smad/ /g.yon pa sor mo gcig ni bsdigs/ /dpung pa bteg ste be con 'phyar/ /rkang pa dang ni gdong bsgyur
ba| |rtag tu khro bo sgom pa ni/ /kI li kI la zhes bya'o/ /kI li kI la chen po ni/ /de nyid las ni rgyab tu blta/ /khro bo mig ni ya gcig btsums/ /myur du mchong
stabs byed pa'o/ /'di ni tsham ngam sbyor ba ste/ /he la'i 'khor lo rtsibs rim las/ /mdor na ji ltar dgod pa dag /legs par bshad pa 'di yin no/ /he
la'i 'khor lo'i mthu sngags dang / /tsham ngam g.yas kyi mthu dga' yis/ /las rnams rab tu ngo mtshar ba/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /sgrub pa de dag
gsang rgyud dang / /he la'i 'khor lo 'di shes na/ /khro bo dngos dang gcig 'gyur bas/ /khro bo'i skad du spyod par 'gyur/ /rtog pa 'di ni gsang bar bcas/ /gsang ba'i
snying pe'i mchog tu bshad/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog 'di las/ /mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ /rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di/ /rab tu
gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /thos nas gsang ba'i don bsgoms pas/ /lha de thams cad yi rang nas/ /khro bo mchog la phyag 'tshal te/ /rab tu dga' ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /
gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa lnga pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshen rje'i gshed po la rjes su yi rang ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //
khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tsu DA ma Ni nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
lo| |dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes
bya mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab pa mchog tu rmad du byung zhing rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ phongs pa thams cad las yongs su skyob par mdzad
pa| 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par mdzad pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa/ mi mthun pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa
dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / gshis ngan du 'chi ba dang / rmi
lam ngan pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mu ge dang / mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa thams
cad zlog par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
thams cad 'dun par mdzad pa/ dug dang / 'brum phran dang / thor bu dang / gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshed byed thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel mdzad pa/ /bdag gi bu dang tsha po dang / /g.yog
'khor rtag tu mang gyur pa/ /phyir zlog pa ni brjod par bya/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /brgya byin lha min rnams las pham/ /de nas rings pa kho nar ni/ /'jig
rten dbang gi drung song ste/ /de nas snying ni rab skrag pas/ /'di skad kyis ni tshig gsol to/ /lha min bdag pham 'jig rten dbang / /ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi/ /
'jig rten dbang po bdag la ni/ /lha yi gzigs pas rtag tu gzigs/ /brgya byin gyi ni tshig gsan nas/ /dbang phyug gis ni 'di skad gsungs/ /lha yi dbang po nga
la nyon| |khyod la ngas ni srung ba sbyin/ /lha'i dbang po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa de bzhin gshegs
pa bye bas gsungs pa bzung po/ /mkhas pa gang gis rig sngags 'di/ /bris nas spyi bor 'dogs pa 'am/ /'don tam 'on te klog na yang / /
de yi 'jigs pa kun mad de/ /rtag tu bsrung zhing sba pa dang / /g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed/ /sdig dang rmi lam zhi ba dang / /bsod nams bkra shis rab
tu 'phel/ /lha yi dbang po de bas na/ /gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur 'dod pas/ /bris te spyi bor gdags par bya/ /yid la rtag tu dran par gyis/ /g.yul 'gyed
'ba' zhig ma yin te/ /'di ni rtag tu sdig pa 'phrog /bud med rnams la bu pho skyed/ /mngal na gnas pa yongs su skyong / /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
byed| |sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig /'di ming phyir zlog byed ces bya/ /yan lag rnams la phyir 'bab byed/ /lha'i dbang po/ /phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba rig
sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ lha ma yin thams cad pham par byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi
bar byed pa zungs shig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun
nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya ka ri/ yud+d+ho t+tA ra Ni bi tsa tra mu khi/ sarba mang+ga

la d+hA ra Ni/ dzi mu te sa ha sra b+hu dze/ sa ha sra ne tre/ sa ha sra shi re/ nra nA laM ka ra b+hi b+hu Shi te/ ma Ni kuN+Da la saM nA ha san nA d+he/ bi tsi tra mau bi d+ha re/ tsan+d+ra sUR+ya/ a ti ri ke /A
kA shu ga ga na tsA ri Ni/ maM ga la shi re dzI mau de/ ba ba tra tri ta maM ga la/ b+hu ri mi d+h+ra ki ra Ne/ tsu ru tsu ru/ shwe te pa ste/ mu ru mu ru/ shwe te/ a ba na te/ hu ru hu ru/ pa bid

tra mu khi| ku ru ku ru/ tsan+d+ra mu khi/ a di t+ya ba sha brti ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ maM ga la d+hA ra Ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ sarba bid+ya d+ha ra mA te/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo tsa ni/

rA dza tso ra ag+ni bi Sha u da ka b+ha ya pra sha ma ni/ ka khorda ni pA ra Ni/ oM hi ri hi ri/ dza ya ka ri/ pa la ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri/ te dza ska ri/ bi bA da pra sha ma ni/ yud+d+ha ni bA ra ni/ pa

ba tsakra pra sha ma ni/ pa ra sai n+ya bi nA sha ni/ yud+d+ho t+tA ra Ni/ pra b+ha da be la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma Ni na d+ha ri/ tri lo ka A lo ka ka ri/ tri pu ra nA ga ra bid+h+wan
sa ni par sai n+ya bi dra ba ni/ sarba krat+ya karma ni sU da ni/ sarba byA d+hi naM pra sha ma ni/ oM tsi le mi le swAhA/ tsi le mi le swAhA/ mi li mi li swAhA/ tsi li tsi li swAhA/ tsi khi li/ tsi
khi li swAhA/ tsaN+Da laM mi Ti ni swAhA/ ur+d+ha ke shi paM gi la/ piM ga la k+She dan+te mu khi swAhA/ oM ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/

muny+tsa muny+tsa/ muny+tsa pa ya/ muny+tsa pa ya/ pra sha ma ya/ pra sha ma ya/ yud+d+hot+tA tA ra Ni phaT/ tsit+ta ni re ma la ka ri phaT/ a su ra ni ra g+ha ta ni phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/ pri ti ka ri phaT/ sa ha

sra shi ri phaT/ sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/ sa ha sra ne tre phaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra d+ha ra na ma skri te phaT/ sarba sha truM na sha ni phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi mok+Sha ni phaT/ pa ra tsa kra ni ba ra ni

phaT| pa ra sai n+ya bi dra ba ni phaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma sU da ni phaT/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/ sarba gra hod sA da ni phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa man+ta bi tra

nAM| so ba sta ya ka nAM/ sa pa ri wA ra nAM/ te dza sa ma ma sha ri raM/ sarba b+ha yo pa dra be b+h+yaH/ sarba yu d+he b+h+yaH/ sarba gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/ sarba tuskri te b+h+yaH/ sarba kr-i t+ya

ka kho rde b+h+yaH/ sarba ba She b+h+yaH/ sarba kA ya wAk+tsit+ta bi ra d+he b+h+yash+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swAhA/ gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang
bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ thams cad du zhi bar byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad gsog par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal du byed pa ste/ yi gar bris pa dang / ston pa dang / bklag pa dang / bzung bas bdag dang / gzhan
bsrung ba'o/ /de bzhin du khrus byas pa dang / sbyin sreg gis yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i
gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/
AR+ya tsan+dan ang+ga nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / gzhan yang lha khyad par can mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan
'das gdan bshams pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na tsan+dan gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i
'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs
te 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston to/ /gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad ni/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi yan lag des sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir tsan+dan gyi yan lag
ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gsungs pa 'di thos nas phyir mi ldog ste sdig pa dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad dang / gzhan yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
kyang sngon chad gsungs te/ ngas kyang da khyed rnams la bshad kyi/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / phyi ma'i
tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe thams cad chos dang mi ldan pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mchod rten
'dral ba/ dge 'dun gyi rdzas la rku 'phrog byed pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'chi ba/ slob dpon dang mkhan po spong ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag rjes su gzung
ba'i phyir tsan+dan gyi yan lag gi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'di bshad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nga la
nyon cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
nas bskul ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gzhan yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams la thugs brtse ba dang / sdig pa
byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bshad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis
kyang gzugs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gzung bar bgyi ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o/ /sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsi rA te/ mA ri tsi ke/ du rda me/ du du rdan+te du R+RA nu/ pra biSh+Te/ tsan+dan nA d+ga dze/ sa man+ta ba ri/
sho d+ha ni| bi shu d+d+ha shI le/ tsa ri t+ta ba ti/ a na tsa d+ya pra ti b+hA ne/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ b+ha ga ba ti/ pA pak+Sha yaM/ A shA pa ri pu ra ya swAhA/ rigs kyi bu pho'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs chen po'i gsangs sngags 'di dag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston tam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i tshe 'di nyid la mig rnam par
dag par 'gyur ro/ /thos ma thag tu sdig pa'i las rab tu grol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gzugs kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa mthong
bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa byas pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur/ skye ba dran par 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/
khyim bdag chen po skyid pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ /skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar sa chen por lus ba 'di ni/ grum par 'gyur yang srin/ /rgya
mtsho ni/ bskams kyang srid/ de bzhin du ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni/ 'jig par 'gyur yang srid/ rlung ni/ zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni/ sa'i ste du
lhung yang srid/ nam mkha' ni/ lag pa gnyis kyis mnan du rung yang srid/ me ni/ chur 'gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni/ gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/ sems
can thams cad kyi sems ni/ gcig tu 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs shings byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ gzhan du 'gyur mi srid de/ sus kyang
bskyod pa'am/ bsgul bar mi nus so/ /'di ni/ bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'ad/sa bdag gis kyang gzungs 'di'i cho ga bshad par/
bgyi'o/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+d+na dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te me tog sil
ma gtor la/ tsan+dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te zla ba tshes pa nas brtsams nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing gos kyang
lan gsum du brjes te kha zas bsreg bya 'tshal zhing / gso sbyong dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang // zla ba nya'i bar gzhag gcig smyung
bar bgyis te/ rma bam gyi steng du mchis shing / rtswa bam bting ba'i steng du nyal la sems rtse gcig tu bzlas pa bgyi zhing / me tog dri zhim po lan brgya stong du
gtor nas g.yo bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/
gzungs chen po thos ma thag tu ci 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur/ thos pa 'dzin par yang 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /
lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya
ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ A ya bi dza ya pa ti nA ma pra t+yaM gi rA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyar zlog pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhas bya ba/ sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad srung ba la mngon par brtson pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags
'chang thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang
hen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas phyir zlog pa rnam par gyal ba can zhes
bya ba bshed byed dang byad sems ba/ ro langs dang bkra mi shis pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs
pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang / brjod byed
kyi 'jigs pa dang / srul po'i 'jigs pa dang / lus srul po'i 'jigs pa dang / lam log pa dang / lam du zhugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo'i
'gro ba so so'i 'jigs pa rmugs par byed pa/ rengs par byed pa/ rmongs par byed pa/ bdog bzang por byed pa/ spro ba yang dag par 'phel bar/
byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad yang dag par byang bar byed pa/ kha rmugs par
byed pa/ kha rengs par byed pa/ bzhin mdzes par byed pa brjod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa/ spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag grub par gyur cig /tad+ya thA oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri/
d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / gshed byed dang / byad stems thams cad las
srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri si ri si ri si ri si ri si ri si ri/ su ru su ru su ru su ru su ru su ru su ru su ru/

ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ma ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru mu ru mu ru mu ru mu ru mu ru mu ru/ bdag nad thams cad las srung du gsol/
srung du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu/ ki li ki li ki li ki li ki li ki li ki li ki li ki li
ki li/ mi li mi li mi li mi li mi li mi li mi li mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li tsi li tsi li tsi li tsi li tsi li tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu/
'byung po thams cad zlog par mdzad du gsol/ oM baM sa ra bi sa ra/ kaM pa kaM pa/ na sha na sha/ na sha pa na sha ya/ dgra gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa dang / rnam
par sdang ba dang / gnod par sems pa dang / sngags byed pa dang / spyin sreg byed pa dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / byas pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad nyid la slar
song zhig swAhA/ mi mdza' pa thams cad kyi mig bcing ngo / /rna ba bcing ngo / /sna bcing po/ lce bcing ngo / /lus bcing ngo / /yid bcing ngo / /yan lag dang nyid lag thams
cad bcing ngo / /s+phuT s+phuT s+phuT/ s+phoT ya s+phoT ya s+phoT ya/ gshed byed dang byang thams cad rnam par bsal du gsol/ rnam par gzhom du gsol/ rnam par gzhig
tu gsol/ sarba sha hrI tu ru tu ru tu ru tu ru tu ru swAhA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad dang / gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / rjed byed thams cad
las srung du gsol/ srung du gsol swAhA/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad pas la du gsol/ bsal du gsol/ tsa ra tsa pa swAhA/ ma ra ma ra swAhA/
si ri si ri swAhA/ ku ru ku ru swAhA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru swAhA/ mi gang dag gnod par 'dod pa phan par mi 'dod cing bdag la lta ba thams cad rmugs par bgyi'o/ /rings par
bgyi'o| |'khrugs par bgyi'o/ /rmongs par bgyi'o/ /'byung po thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad 'khrul par mdzad ma/ rmongs par mdzad ma
rmugs par mdzad ma/ rengs par mdzad ma/ 'jigs par mdzad ma/ rnam par 'jigs par mdzad ma/ rnam par 'thor bar mdzad ma/ rnam par 'joms par mdzad
ma swAhA/ nI le nI le nI le ke she swAhA/ pI ti pI ti pI ti ki she swAhA/ lo hi te lo hi te ke she swAhA a ba dA te a ba dA te a ba d+ha te ke she swAhA/ shwe te shwe te bsta d+hA ra Ni
ye swAhA| 'byung po thams cad la dbang bsgyur ma/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad bsal du gsol swAhA/ 'phel bar mdzad ma/ bdag gi dpal skal pa bzang po
thams cad spal du gsol/ 'phel bar mdzad du gsol swAhA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gshed byed dang /
byad thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / bza' nyes pa dang / sgom nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod ltas thams cad
srung du gsol/ srung du gsol swAhA/ phyir zlog rnam par rgyal ba can/ /rgyal ba 'byung ba gsungs pa 'di/ /gang gis ma gul du 'di btags pa/ /de ni rgyal 'gyur the/
tshom med/ /sdig pa rmi lam bkra mi shis/ /rgyal po me dang chom rkun dgra/ de dag rnams kyis de mi tshugs/ /gang gis mgul du 'di btags pa/ /de ni chu yis khyer
mi 'gyur/ /sdig pa yang dag byang bar 'gyur/ /dge ba rnams chi rtag tu 'phel/ /nad med pa yang thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa phyir zlog pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya
ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ A ya o dza pra t+yaM ha ra Ni swAhA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags gzungs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun
chub par gyis shig /kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rigs sngags 'chang dam/ ston tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par
byed na/ de'i mdangs phyir mi 'phrog cing / 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phrog na yang phyir yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
tshogs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ phi li phi li me/ phi lu meM ge/ phi lu ma ti/ bu lu gu mA ti/ sA ra ba ti/ k+Shi ra ba ti/ ku ru mA ti/ u ta ba la ni/
gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsau ri/ tsaN+Da li/ stu re/ stu ba re/ in+d+ra mA li nI/ dzA li ni/ so bka ke k+Sho Sha De/ sA ga re/ ma hA sA ga re/ pu ru tse/ pa ru tsu re/ sa ma ne/ de ba be/ da daM ba phe/
hu lu hu lu swAhA/ rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/
'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs pa'i bar du gyur to/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyang kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/ /kye ma'o nyam thag go/ zhes du zhing
skad chen pos sgra chen po 'byin cing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
ngas bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rigs sngags 'di gsungs pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ngas bsrung bar bya'o/ /bde legs
su 'gyur ba'i bar du bya'o/ /de'i mdangs dbrog par bya'o/ /phyir dbrog par bya'o/ /nye bar bsgrub par ba ya'o/ /gnod sbyin gyis zin tam/ mi dang mi ma yin pas zin
na ni| dus de dang / tshod de dang / yud tsam de la mdangs 'phrog go/ phyir 'phrog go/ rnam par 'jug go/ gal te 'phrog cing phyir 'phrog par mi byed de/ gnas na
'dug bzhin du rnam par mi 'jig cing / yang 'joms par 'dod dam 'phrog par 'dod par gyur na/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas te mi mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rang ste/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya
ra ta na mA la nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/ bos skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phag
bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par
song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag
'tshal lo/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtul
zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri za rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /lto 'phye chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'am ci rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srin po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sha za skra gyen du brdzes pa
rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig pa'i bdag po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba dang nyi ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo//
de nas gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin po che'i phreng pa'i snying po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ lha dang klu rnams kyis rjes su yi rang pa/ las thams
cad byed pa gtsang ma brjod par bya ste/ dag cing de ni bkra shis pa/ /bsod nams byed gtsang dpal yon can/ /srin po 'joms pa'i lha rnams dang / /sems can kun
gyis mi thub pa'o/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'jigs pa/ /don kun grub pa dpal yon can/ /gdon kun rnam par 'jig byed pa/ /rig sngags 'di ni brjod par bya//
'di ni rtag tu rgyal byed pa/ /brgya byin gyis kyang mi thub 'di/ /dug dang gshed byed 'jig byed pa/ /me dgra rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / /gshed byed gdon dang ro
langs dang / /rmi lam ngan dang lus srul dang / /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams las/ /kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad/ /rtag tu bdag
la srung bar mdzod/ /nyin gcig pa yi rims nad dang / /nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum dang / /nyin bzhi pa yi rims nad dang / /ldang dub rims las 'di srung mdzod/ /
dug dang dbyig dug zos pa yang / /kha zas bzhin du zhu bar 'gyur/ /gang gi mngal na mi chags dang / /gang gi bu po 'chi ba yang / /rin po che yi phreng ba yis/ /de
dag myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /nor 'dod pa ni nor rnams thob/ /dpal 'dod pa yang dpal thob 'gyur/ /'thab cing 'gyed dang g.yul dor
yang / /myur du rgyal bar byed pa yin/ /sems can rnams la gnod gzigs nas/ /'jig rten mgon gyis rab gsungs pa/ /rin chen phreng zhes bya ba yi/ /rig
sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /tad+ya thA/ oM da na ka ri/ pi pu la ka ri/ dza ya ka ri/ yaSh+Ta ka ri/ pr-i d+hi ka ri/ A yurdA de/ puN+ya da ri/ Ak+Sha pra sha ma ni/ d+ha na d+ha na/ bi brta

ni| shrI ka ri/ sarba gra ha nak+Sha tra pA sha brti ni/ me dA dza na ni/ pu tra dza na ni/ pa ri ba rA ba brta ni/ A yurdA ni/ pra ti ki ra/ dzaM g+ha ni/ staM b+haM ni/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha sha ka ri/

kats+tsha na mA le/ gra ha sau ma ka ra Ni/ sarba kA li kA la ha/ bi gra ha bi byA d+ha/ pra sha ma ni/ pa ra tsakra ni ba ra Ni/ pa ra sai n+ya/ staM b+ha ni/ ts+tshin+da nir mA li ka ra NI/ sarba pA paM pra
sha ma ni| sarba kA la biSh+Ta nA sha ni swAhA/ tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/ tu ru tu ru swAhA/ mu ru mu ru swAhA/ sarba de ba a nu dz+nyi te swAhA/ sarba nA ga saM rak+Shi te swAhA/ oM ni ri ni ri phaT/
ha na ha na phaT/ da ha da ha phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa phaT/ gang dag bdag la sdang par sems pa dang / gnod par sems pa dang / sbyin sreg byed pa dang / byad byed pa dang / byed

du 'jug pa dang / byed pa la rdzes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad phaT phaT swAhA/ ag+ni staM b+ha ya mi bI ShaM sha trUM u da kaM tsau ra na/ sarba duSh+Ta na sarba pra t+yar+thi ka/ pra t+ya ma tran/
staM b+ha yA mi/ dzaM b+ha ya mi/ mo ha ya mi/ phaT phaT swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ba/ /rin chen phreng gis rab brgyan pa/ /las kun byed dang de bzhin du/ /rtag tu
srung bar byed pa 'di/ /'gro'am yang na ci yang rung / /de dag 'ga' la bris te 'chang / /srin po 'joms pa bsod nams mchog /sdig pa'i rnyog pa 'jig par byed/ /
g.yul 'gyed pa dang 'thab pa dang / /kun tu rgyal bar byed pa dge/ mi gang gtsang sbra byas nas su/ /rig sngags 'di bris bcang pa dang / /bklags dran shes rab can
de la| |'jigs pa kun tu mi 'byung ngo / /cho ga bzhin du klog 'chang na/ /gsang ba po kun rtag tu srung / /yongs su skyong bar byed par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rgyal bar byed pa
ste| |dper na rin chen phreng ba yis/ /mgo bo brgyan na mdzes pa ltar/ /de bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mdzes/ /gang dag rig sngags 'di 'chang na/ /de yi gdon
rnams rnam par 'jig /nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel/ /de yi 'khor ni bzang por 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
bye brag tu ni byas pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rig sngags 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /lha mi rgyal po rnams dang ni//
de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' srung / /de la phyogs bcu rnams kyi ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs par mdzad/ /dge ba dang ni nor rnams 'phel/ /sdig pa rnams
kyang byang bar 'gyur/ /rmi lam ngan dang nyis byas las/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni mu ni mu ni mu ni ri/ ma ti ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ bdag
'jigs pa thams cad las bsrungs shig bsrungs shig /sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs
su gyur cig swAhA/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha
ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sarba a b+ha ya pra dA na nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa thams
cad la mi 'jigs pa spyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha nas yul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas a mra'i tshal lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na
bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha ma yin rnams ni/
rab tu gnod par bgyid pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ lha ma yin rnams ni/ bdag la yun ring por phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/ de las bcom ldan 'das kyis
bdag la chos bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i dbang po/ khyod
kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags don thams cad byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
pa| dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang med dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa thams cad rengs par byed pa/ dgra thams cad
phung par byed pa/ lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung po
dang / ro langs dang / bya'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdan dang / gnon po dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon
dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / log 'dren gyi gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang /
zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su spos za ba dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba dang / zas
su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rab tu phung bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul spyod pa rab tu 'jigs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang
'dru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di zungs shig dang / thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a De ma De pra ma
De| pra me di ri/ go la me/ po le po le/ moT+Te mo ta/ baT+Te/ ba raT+Te/ kha ra Ne/ ga Na ga Ne/ ga Na pra ga Ne/ mo Ne/ pra ti mo Ne/ kA li pra kA li tsaN+Da/ ma hA tsaN+De/ pra ti tsaN+De/ be ge

a ti be ge /so na/ go na/ mo hA/ pra mo hA/ bra ma Ta/ nA sha ni/ pra nA da sha ni/ d+ha ba ni/ pra d+ha ba ni/ ba la ga ni/ pra ba la ga ni/ nr-i t+ye ni/ pra ni t+ya ni/ kro d+ha ni/ pra ti kro d+ha ni/ ha
na ha na/ bi ha na bi ha na/ sarba du Sh+Ta pra duSh+TaM nA sha ya/ sarba a b+ha ya pra de/ bdag 'khro dang bcas pa 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba
thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig /gnas 'dir bdag gi don thams cad 'grub par gyur cig/ de lta bas na/ khi di khi di/ tsum b+he/ sarba sid+d+hi hi de ra te/ na maH
sarba bud+d+ha nAn swAhA/ lha'i dbang po/ thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags tshig bzhi bcu rtsa gcig po 'di skud pa la mdud de bcings sam/ skra la mdud pa por
ra ma| bzlas brjod byas sam/ yungs kar ram/ gi wang la lan gcig bsngags te bskus sam/ go cha la bsngags na/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ rims
nad kyis ma yin/ nyin gcig pas ma yin/ nyin gnyis pas ma yin/ nyin gsum pas ma yin/ nyin bzhi pas ma yin/ mes ma yin/ gsang sngags kyis ma yin/
ro langs kyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ nad kyis ma yin te/ chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang / gsang sngags sbyor ba
sgrub pa thams cad sbyor ba rnams kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par byed do/ /sbyar te grub pa rnams gzhan gyis mi tshugs par byed do/ /pha rol gyis bcings pa las
grol bar byed do/ /gzhan gyis rig sngags gcod par byed do/ /bdag gi rig sngags 'phel bar byed do/ /gdon thams cad phung bar byed do/ /gdon gang gis
mi gtong na yang / de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa thams cad la mi
'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur
cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya ni sh+tsa ya nA d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gdon mi za
ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bsha
la'i spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
lha ma yin rnams kyis rgol zhing gtses te/ bdag dang lha ma yin dus yun ring por mi mdza' zhing dgrar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ci nas kyang yun
ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bu'i chos bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i phyir ko'u shi ka khyod kyis da'i snying po gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di longs shig/ tad+ya thA/ urba pa/ nirbi sirbi/
urbu rbu re/ hU le hUM me/ di khu me/ pra t+yaM ga ma a gats+tsha ma hA ma yu ri nA ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / 'khor thams cad dang
bcas pa las srungs shig/ srungs shig/ sarba kA ya ma no sh+tsa ri te swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang
po yid dga' ste bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de
nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /'phags pa gdon mi za ba zhes bya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge
'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las brgal/ /rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjid che/ /rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor ro/ /
thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang / /log dad sel ba'i stobs nyid dang / gser thub kyi ni rlabs pa dang / /'od srung gi ni yon tan dang / /shAkya thub pa'i brtson
'grus kyis/ /bdag ni rtag tu bde bar shog/ tad+ya thA/ dza yan+ti/ bi dza yan+ti/ dza ye/ bi dza ye/ dzi ti dzi ti/ a pa ra dzi te/ pa ra se n+ya pra marda nI ye swAhA/ gzhan gyis
mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa
mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las grol bar
mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o/ /las kun byed pa dge ba ste/ /'byung po kun gyis 'jigs
pa med| |bdud rtsi las ni bdud rtsi 'byung / 'di ni las kun byed pa yin/ /dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste/ /rtsod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang / /gzhan yang dgras ni 'khor ba
dang / /rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang / /rtag tu dgra dang 'phrad pa dang / /rmugs par byed cing rengs par byed/ /rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel/ /dug dang me ni dengs par
byed| |rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel/ /chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul/ /rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel/ /'byung po thams cad zlog pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang
chub 'dren pa dang / /chos kun rab tu ston pa ste/ /'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can/ /gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms/ /gang tshe rig sngags
'di 'chang ba/ /des na sa 'di g.yo bar 'gyur/ /'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i/ /rig sngags rgyal ba bla na med/ /'jigs rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste/ /'jig
rten gsum po kun gyis mchod/ /de nas 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas rang gi snying po gzhan
gyis mi thub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di smras so/ /a tA ra tA ra/ tA re tA re/ mo ri ke/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ tsi ti tsi ri/ sUR+ya kan+te/

he ma pra b+he/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi Sha pra sha ma n-i/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sarba bid+ya d+ha ra nA ma kri te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/
sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha Sha ti/ pa ra pa ra/ pi ri pi ri/ pu ru pu ru/ pra dz+nyA pa ra mi ta/ a nu dz+nyA te/ Sha Ta pA ra mi ta/ pa ri pu re/ gaM gA na d+hi ba lo ko pa ma/ ta thA ga ta/ ba shi ta/

pri yaM ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri/ pri ti ka ri/ shu b+ha ka ri/ pa bi tra/ mang+ga la d+hA ra Ni/ sarba de ba ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba ma ho rA ga a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba kiM na ra a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba yak+Sha

rak+Sha sa ad+hi Sh+Thi te/ pra h+ma b+hA Shi te/ tsa tur ma hA rA dza b+hA Shi te/ tsan+d+ra suR+ya b+hA Shi te/ oM ti ri ti ri/ tsan+d+ra kA ri Ni/ ki li ki li/ sarba sha trUM bi nA sha ni hUM phaT swAhA/ de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jigs rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig
rten du byung ste/ de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so/ /de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can thams cad la yang bsnyad do/ /mi 'jigs
pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnams par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob
dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni/ bdag srung ba dang /gzhan
srung ba dang / gnyi ga srung ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang / srog skyong
ba dang / tshe sbyin pa dang / lag ba rengs par byed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/
'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa/ thams cad du gzhan gyi mi thub pa'o/ /shud+d+he muk+te/ pra b+ha swa re/ shwA te/ pan+Da ra hA si ni/ sarba duSh+Ta na dza b+ha ya mi/ staM b+ha ya mi/

mo ha ya mi/ oM swAhA/ pa bi tre swAhA/ shwe ti swAhA/ shwe te pa ta pri te swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ ta re ta re/ ta ri Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sarba ka li/ ka la ha/ bi gra ha/ bi b+ha d+hi/ duHswa ba na b+ha ye
b+h+yaHswAhA/ rtag tu le lo med par ni/ /gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa/ /de la lha tshogs thams cad kyang / /dus kun tu ni srung bar byed/ /de ni 'jigs par 'gyur
ba med| |de ni rtag srung lhan ner 'dug /ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na/ /gzi brjid grags 'chang lhan ne bzhin/ /de la gshed byed byad stems dang / /srul po dag gis
mi tshugs te/ /de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur/ /kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel/ /'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni
nA ma d+ha NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis 'de lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / bden pa'i smon lam dang /
byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag sgoms shig/ ston cig/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so/ /de
nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs ni/ yul la mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas na/ bcom
ldan 'das/ gzungs zhes bgyi ba la/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs zhes bgyi ba 'di'i tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ shA ri'i bu/ legs so legs so/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag
par zhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang / theg pa chen po lhag par byed pa dang / khyod gzugs yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas par
ston pa yang legs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ gzungs ni/ chos nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ gzungs ni/
'das pa zhes mi 'chad/ ma 'ongs pa zhes mi 'chad/ da ltar byung ba zhes mi 'chad/ dngos por mi 'chad/ dngos po med par mi 'chad/ mtshan ma dang / mtshan
ma med par mi 'chad/ chos gang skye ba'i phyir ram/ 'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir
chos ston te/ gang 'di chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs ni/ gzungs med par bya ba'i lam du gyur pa/ rigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
tan| sangs rgyas kyi lhag par bya ba sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims/ sangs rgyas kyi bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la gnas shing gzungs de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dam bca' ba bzang ba dang / chos la mi gnas pa dang / bdag the tshom ma mchis pa dang / slob
dpon ma mchis pa dang / rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| shA ri'i bu/ legs so legs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang la la zhig byang
chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa la bsti stang byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod na/ des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro//
gang dag gis gzungs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral
bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzungs ni/ 'di lta ste/ san+d+ha ra NI/ ut+ta ra Ni/ san pra tiSh+Thi te/ ut+ta ma su pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya ba la/ sarba pra ti dz+nyA/ a ha
ra dz+nyA na pa ti/ ut+pa da ni/ bi ni mA nI a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi b+ha ha ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a ni shri ta/ ba hu ku b+ha/ a b+hi pa tsa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di dag ni/ dbang bskur pa zhes bya
ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnams te/ 'das pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa'
gang gis legs par bzung ste 'chad pa de/ myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal ba brgya dang / bskal pa stong dag tu smon lam gyis zad
par byed par mi 'gyur/ de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA
ri'i bu| gzungs 'di ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo/ /shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i grangs/
med pa bcu mthar chags su gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams lan bza' dang / zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par dbul ba byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu /dbang bskur
ba'i gzungs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag
dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dbang bskur
ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / dA nA shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar
bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni nA ma bid+yA man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i
rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal
bzang po zhig na shAkya rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe sta du sa zhes bya ba na shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngon
par dad pa/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos la skyabs su song / dge 'dun la skyabs su song / sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs/ chos la
gcig tu phyogs/ dge 'dun la gcig tu phyogs/ sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing the tshom med/ chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba
dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la nem nur med cing the tshom med la/ bden pa mthong ba/ 'bras bu thob pa/ mngon par rtogs par gyur pa/ mtshon dang dbyig pa bor ba
zhig gnas pa de'i mig la snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams snang bar ma gyur nas de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te yid la byed cing / sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdzad pa/ sgron ma 'jin pa/ gsal ba 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde bar
gshegs pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa gsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi mig rnam par sbyang du gsol/ zhes byas pa dang / bcom ldan
'das lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ shAkya bde bas tshig de skad ces brjod pa gsan to/ /gsan nas kyang ting nge
'dzin de las bzhengs te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis shAkya bde ba la srung
par gyis shig /yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba
dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar gyis shig dang / de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen
rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig /mig sbubs rnam par sbyongs shig /mig gi skyon med par gyis shig/
tad+ya thA| hi li mi li/ ki li mi li/ hi li te mi li/ hu yA hu yA hu yA ma ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ hu du hu du hu du/ tsak+Shu ra me bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ kun dga' po/ rig sngags
kyi rgyal po mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni/ mig gi skyon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / mkhris pa'i skyon dang / bad kan gyi skyon dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyon sel te/
tshul khrims kyi bden pa dang / brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden
pa dang / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
kyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pas/ shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur cig /mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig /kun du mchi ma 'dzag
par ma gyur cig /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur cig swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs pa'o/ /nga yang da ltar 'chad de/ rgyal po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag
po tshangs pa yang rjes su yi rang ngo / /kun dga' bo/ gang gis rig sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na/ de la thibs por 'gyur ba dang / rab rib bam/ ling tog gam/ mig
nad sngon por mthong ba'am/ mig gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur pa rnams sam/ klu las gyur pa rnams sam/ dri za las gyur pa rnams sam/ gnod sbyin las gyur
pa rnams sam/ sha za las gyur pa rnams sam/ byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun
tu rgyu las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun du rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas
pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye rgu'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams bzung ste kun chub par byas nas shAkya
bde ba ga la ba der song ste/ bde ba/ mig rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyi/ nyin re bzhin dus gsum du dran par
gyis shig /ces de la rgyas par smras so/ /shAkya bde bas thos ma thag tu de kho nar mig rnam par dag ste/ mig rnam par dag pas dri ma med pa'i mig gis thams cad
mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / shAkya bde ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sarba
an+ta ra saM gra sa d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje/ gzungs sngags
'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni/ dug dang / mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan gzan ma rungs
pas za ba dang / mes tshig pa dang / chur 'chi ba dang / 'go ba'i rims gzhan yang ba dang / mdze'i nad dang / gsor mi rung ba'i nad yang ba dang / g.yang la lhung ba dang
gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis brnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyag na
rdo rje/ gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni/ sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa
rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje/ gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang /
nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang shing dag ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ a pra ti
ha ta ba la hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+naM an+ta ra ya bi nA sha ka ra mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brjod na 'grub bo/ /nges par 'grub bo/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa bar du gcod pa
thams cad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya drA bi Da bid+ya rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na smyig ma'i myu gu'i 'khor
gyi khyams na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/ so sor
'brang ba/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa nga yang da ltar 'chad kyi/ zungs shig /kun dga' bo/ shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i
glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ lho phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ byang
phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod de/ kun dga' bo/ gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes
pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad du mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams
cad mi 'bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni ni mi ni ni mi ni ni min d+ha re/
'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig swAhA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod

par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha te bi ha te/ ni ha te/ pra t+ye r+thi ke/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha swa re/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra bA si ni/ ha ri ka ra di/ piM ga
lAk+Shi da d+hi mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag
dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swAhA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya
thA| mu ni mu ni/ mu ni mu ni/ re ri/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyi/ ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyi/ drI D+ha swAhA/
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi srung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris na/ de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams
cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar par bgyi'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs
kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swAhA/ brah+ma swa re swa re swAhA/ brah+ma gar+b+ha puSh+pa saM sta re swAhA/ bcom
ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ bdag gi srung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab
tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ni

wA ra Ni/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mA dan+d+he/ ma ti ma ti/ ti Ti/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma taM gi/ ba ra la ni/ hi na ma d+h+ya ma d+hA ra NI ma la ni/ da la mat+te/ tsakra ba kri/ sha ba ri sha ba
ri swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa/
dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang
dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| bdag gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang
sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe puSh+pe/ d+harma ba ri ha ri/ AR+ya pra sha ste/ ni ra muk+te/ mang+ga le/ stu te/ s+t+ya baM te swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
'di ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad la mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba/ dus ma lags
par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po
glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug
rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa 'jigs par bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/
bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
'das| bdag cag klu rnams ni/ sems ser sna can te/ sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ra dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ ak+Sha
ye| pu N+ya paR+ya ba te/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma nA ya swAhA/ aR+ya pu N+ya so pa kI ye swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag skyes pa'am/
bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug
gam| dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag 'jigs pa thams
cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i
rgyal po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag /skye bo mang po la dad pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
rjes su gzung ba'i phyir 'gro lding pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so legs so/ /phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos
pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag
dang / klu'i dbang po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
do| |'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he
ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcom nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad
du| 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lwa ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i
dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin las pham/ rab tu pham nas de rtab cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'di ltar lha ma yin dang g.yul bkye ba
las| lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris las pham/ rab tu pham ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham rab tu pham na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
cag gis de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po/ khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba
gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zungs shig/ ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan las
'di mnos so/ /mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/ /mngon par dran te/ de tshun chad 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'am/ spu zing zhes
byed pa'am/ tha na skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa byung ma myong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bgyi ba gzhan gyis mi thub
pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ dza ya ba hi Ni/ shang+ka ri shang+ka ri/ pra b+hang+ka re/ bdag dang

sems can thams cad kyi sarba sha trUM/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ya bA hi ni/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ gra sa gra sa/ ha sa

ha sa| hUM hUM/ la hUM la hUM/ lam+bo d+ha ri/ tre ne tre/ tsa tu ra b+ha ga tre/ tsa tur daMSh+Te/ tsa tur b+hu dze/ a si mu sa la/ tsakra tri shu la/ badzra ka pa tsa d+ha Ni/ bdag gnod pa thams cad

las srungs shig /srungs shig /oM b+ha ga wa ti/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza

pa ra se n+yaM/ bi d+h+waM sa ya/ sarba sha trUM nA sha ya/ d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU re/ tri Ta tri Ta tri Ta/ b+h+ri Ta b+h+ri Ta/ u la kA mu khi/ u la kA d+hA ra Ni/ trai lokya ma thA nI/ bi d+h+waM sa ya pa ra se n+yaM/
bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ kaM pa kaM pa/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ muny+dza muny+dza/ aT+Ta
hA saM| bi d+h+waM sa ya pa ra sen+yaM/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig /srungs shig /trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma

sa t+ye na| saM g+ha sa t+ye na/ sa t+ya ba ti nAM/ sa t+ye na bud+d+ha sa t+ye ma ti kra ma/ d+harma sa t+ye ma ti kra ma/ saM g+ha sa t+ye ma ti kra ma/ sa t+ya ba ti nAM/ sa t+ye ma ti kra ma/ lam+bo d+ha ri/ lam+bo

d+ha ri| ku Ta ku Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ kuT+Ta pa ya kuT+Ta pa ya/ ru dra ma nA ya/ biSh+Ni ma nA ya/ tsan+d+ra sUR+ya brah+ma na ya/ trai lokya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba de ba a d+hi pa ma nA ya/

sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gan+d+ha rba/ kum+b+ha n+De/ ma ho ra gA d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ bi d+h+waM sa ya pa ra se n+yaM/ rang+ga rang+ga/ rang+ga pa ya rang+ga pa ya/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ puSh+pa mA li ni/ run+d+ha run+d+ha/ ri ti ri

ti| tsi ti tsi ti/ b+h+ri ti b+h+ri ti/ b+h+r-i ku Ti mu kha pa ra se na ku lod sA d+ha ni ka ri/ ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ he he/ ri Ni ri Ni/ ri ni ma ti/ dzam+b+ha d+h+wa dze/ sarba bud+d+ha A
bA lo ki te/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig /sarba ta thA ga ta A ba lo ki te swAhA/ gu Na rA dza pra b+hA sod ta me swAhA/ sUR+ya arka ba mi
le swAhA| tsan+d+ra arka bi ma le swAhA/ sarba gra ha nak+Sha tra d+he mI ka ra Ne swAhA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las
srungs shig /srungs shig swAhA/ lha'i rgyal po/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul sprod pa'am/ 'thab
pa'am| rtsod pa'am/ 'gyed pa'am/ gang du 'gro yang rung ste/ mi 'jigs shing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'am mgul du btags na/ mi'i
rgyal po dang / skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la srung bar byed do/ /bud med kyi gzugs lta bur bsgyur nas mdun du 'dug ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung bar byed do/ /dpal
skyed par byed/ pha rol gyi sde spa kong bar byed do/ /bkra shis pa dang / gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa kun tu gnas par byed do/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza na mi
tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la bab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya
ma hA ma hIn+d+ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od bram ze sa'i dbang po chen
po shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gnas lha dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/ de nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab lags
na| gang gis bdag skye ba dran par 'gyur/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdag la legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyis bram ze sa'i dbang
po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i phyir bu khyod gal te de ltar smon na/ de'i phyir kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di zungs
shig/ chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ a mo da ni/ pra mo da ni/ bi mo da ni/ saM mo da ni/

pri yaM ka ra Ni/ shrA ka ra Ni/ shrA ka ra Ni/ bo d+hi ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra s+yaM samyak+saM bud+d+ha ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra AR+ya ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra pra dz+nyA ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra ba shI ka ra Ni/ a

nut+ta ra sar+b+ba kle sho pa kle sha bi d+ha ra Ni/ a ba d+yA na d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma Ni/ a nut+ta ra bid+yI a lo kod pA da ni/ a nut+ta ra shai k+Sha shI la bid+yA tsa ra Na/ bi muk+ta gu Na ga Na/ saM b+ha d+ha

NI| a nut+tA ra sar+b+ba ku sha la mu lod d+ha ni/ a nut+ta ra b+ho na mU la ni/ a nut+ta ra rA ga do Sha mo ha na mU la ni/ a nut+ta ra shai k+Sha ma Na a bid+yA an+ta ka rA bi d+ha ma ni/ a nut+ta rA

sI a pra ta ha ta ba la tsakra/ a nut+ta rA sar+b+ba la ra bi drA ma Ni/ twaM hi b+ha dre/ a nut+ta rA ba la b+ha dra/ su b+ha dra/ shrI b+hA dra/ a nut+ta ra b+ha dra/ sa man+ta b+ha dra/ a sa ma saM b+ha dra/
a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha b+ha dra/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha se bi tA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha a nu brta nI/ a nut+ta rA ma hA pu ru Sha d+harma de shi kA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu

ru Sha d+harma ko Sha saM bA d+hi kA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha nirbA NA/ a nut+p+ra taR+Sha kA/ twa hi b+ha dre/ gaM gA si ta pak+Shu/ samyak+saM bud+d+he/ a se bi tA/ b+hA bi tA/ b+hA tA ba hu l+li kro d+ha/ stu ta stau bi ta
bar+Ni tA/ pra shasta/ bu/ 'di ni/ kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po yin te/ de bas na/ bu khyod kyis kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang /
'dug pa dang / nyal ba na yang yid la gyis shig /bu/ gang la la zhig kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di'i ming dang / rigs dang / rigs kyi bye brag yid la byed
dam| skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'am/ lha'am/ lha mo'am/ klu'am/ klu mo'am/ dri za'am/ dri za mo'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo'am/ mi'am ci'am
mi 'am ci mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ lto 'phye chen mo'am/ yi dwags sam/ yi dwags mo'am/ sha za'am/ sha za mo'am/ grul bum ma'am/ grul bum mo'am/ lus
srul po'am/ lus srul mos kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ lung 'bog gam/ ston tam/ 'chang na/ de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du
tshe rabs dran bar 'gyur ro/ /de ji srid 'khor gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro/ /lhar gyur kyang rung / mir gyur kyang
rung ste| de mtshon cha'am/ dug gam/ chu'am/ mes par ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu rgyal ba
'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chi med 'od rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal
ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mnyam pa med ba rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang
bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drang srong chen po 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba'i dbyings su
zhugs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu
yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya
ma hA da N+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di
skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong steng nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na
'dug go /der 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang /
mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dwags kyi gdon
rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ug pa rnams dang /grog sbur
rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la shin tu gtses so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra
