gcan zin bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das
la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan sngar dus te mchi ma blags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal
pa| sgra gcan zin/ khyod ci'i phyir nga'i mdun na 'dug nas mchi ma blag /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis na/
der lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i
gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dwags kyi gdon rnams dang /
'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams
dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis bdag la shin tu gtses lags mod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zin/ khyod kyis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang /
dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba 'di zungs shig/

tad+ya thA| ang+gA/ bang+gA/ tang+gA/ ta rang+gA/ sa rA sa rA/ ta rang+gA swa/ sa da da sa/ dza d+ha rA/ ak+ka re/ a ra bI rA/ ta ra bI rA/ ka ra bI rA/ karka ra bI rA/ tsu ru bI rA/ tsu ru tsu ru bI rA/ in+d+ra/ in+d+ra

ki/ sa ra ha na sa/ ha na sa ki sa ra/ mi tsi re lA/ ma hA mits+tsha/ ba hA mits+tsha/ ba hi Shi kA ka /ka lits+tsha kA aM ge dza yi/ dza ye li kA/ e lA/ tsin+ta/ li le/ ti le ti le/ su ma ti/ bu su ma

ti| tsu lu nan+Te/ tsu lu tsu lu nan+Te/ tsu la na Te/ ku na te/ ha rA Ta ki/ na rI Ta ki ta/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ d+hA ra Ne/ d+hA ra Ne/ uSh+Ta/ pi pI li ka /uSh+Ta/ pa pi la ke /ka rA kar+Thi ke/ ka ke le/

tsa la nan+Ti/ ka gi ma le la ma ti/ rak+Sha ma ti/ bA la ku le/ ba ta sa le/ u na mi le/ ta ra bI re/ ta ra ta ra bI re/ ku ru bI re/ ku ru ku ru bI re/ tsu ru bI re/ tsu ru bI re/ tsu ru tsu ru bI re/

ma hA bI re/ i ra ma ti/ ba ra ma ti/ rak+Sha ma ti/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra ma su ra sA d+ha ni/ a pra ti ha te/ rgyal po dbang po dang / rgyal po zla ba dang / rgyal po gshin rje dang / rgyal
po rlung lha dang / rgyal po gzi can dang / rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / rgyal po be con dang / rgyal po be con mo dang / rgyal po tshangs pa stong ldan dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das chos kyi rje dang / chos kyi rgyal po 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba bla na med pas bdag la srung du gsol/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs
su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang pa dang / dug gsad pa dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mtshams
gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba mdzad du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ i la me le ta sa lA/ i ra ma ti/ bi ra ma ti/ tsa la ma ti/ phu ru ma ti/ phu ru phu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ pa ra khu ru ru/ khu ru
ma ti| b+hu mi maN+De/ ka li ke/ tsaN+DA li/ a ki sa rA le/ i yA sA/ sa la ma to hu le/ s+thU le/ sha le dza ya/ s+thU le/ tsa la nA Ti/ tsa la nA Ti/ nA gA nAM d+ha ra Ni/ go ra hi Ni/ go le

hi he| aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ ke yu re/ ke tu ma ti/ b+hu taM ga me/ d+hu ta pa ti/ d+he R+ya ma hA ba le /a tsuN+De/ a tsu run+d+he/ d+ha ran+d+ha ra/ dza ya li kA/ dza le go ro ha ni tsa ra/ hu ru hu ru/

run+d+hu run+d+hu/ hu ru/ d+hu ma ti/ d+ha ran+d+ha d+ha re/ bi shwa ma ti/ nA sha ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ mo tsa ni/ bi mo tsa ni/ sA d+ha ni/ shod+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni/ saM gi ra Ni/ man thI ra Ni/ a ts+tshat+ta ni/ sa d+hu ta
ra ma Ne| ta ra ta ra ma Ne/ ha ra ha ra/ ban+d+hu ma ti /hi ri hi ri/ ge li re le/ hu ru hu ru/ bang+ga le swAhA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgra
gcan zin/ be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa bcu pa 'di skud pa la mdud de lag pa la btags sam/ mgul du btags na/ kun nas dpag
tshad bcu khor yug tu be con rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis de srung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//
mtshon dang / dug dang / nad dang / rims nad dang / rims drag po dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / ro langs dang / khro gtum dang / me dang / chus 'chi ba'i dus byed
par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sbyor ba rnams legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyi ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o/ /grub pa rnams kyang chud
mi za bar byed pa'o/ /pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o/ /pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o/ /nad dang / mya ngan dang / bgegs rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o/ /
'thab pa'i rnyog pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/ /gdon gang gis gtong ba de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas
so| |gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar pa/ kun tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pas/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin
du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcags kyi 'khor lo sbu gri'i so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi
'phos nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi 'thob bo/ /sgra gcan zin/ rgyal po dang / mi rgod dang / me dang / chu dang / mtshon cha dang / 'brog
dang / dgon pa dang / ri dang / mya ngam du song ba gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di lan gcig brjod na/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar
'gyur ro/ /sgra gcan zin/ be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs
pa| gsung ba/ gsung bar 'gyur ba/ grub pa mchog tu gyur pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za la sogs pas bstod pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis
yongs su bzung ba ste/ bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig /nad med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par gyur cig /bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa be con chen
po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te
skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya su mu khaM nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing drung na byang chub snying po'i
mchod rten chen po na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge slong chen po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen
po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la snang
ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad kyis gnod par bgyi ba srung ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ lha'i dbang po rnams
dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang / srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
sdig pa dang / mtshon dang / dug dang / byad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / phar mchi'am/ slar mchi'am/ nyal lam/ gnyid kyis log gam/ smyos sam/ rab tu
smyos kyang rung / thams cad du yang skyob par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi don du de lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ ji ltar bdag rtag tu de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rim gro 'tshal ba dang / rtag tu srung ba dang / yongs su skyob par 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / nad dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'gum pa las bsrung ba dang /
yongs su bskyang ba bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
na rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la
gsol ba 'dabs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje/ khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
bshad par bya'o/ /u gu mu gu ba li ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ ba la tsa ma na/ ba hu ba hu ba hu li brta ya swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pas sbyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi
gzhi rnams bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gsungs par 'gyur ro/ /byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzri badzri badzrA badzri d+ha ri/ badzra pa' Ni/ badzrI

d+ha ri| tsakra badzrI/ tsakra d+ha ri/ ba Tu d+hi d+hi ri/ b+hi ri/ mu ri/ tsi ri/ a hu ri/ b+ha ga/ b+hi b+hi ri/ shi ri tra/ shi ri/ ru ru tse/ ru ru tse/ tsa ri tsa ri/ da ri tsa le/ tsu ru mu ru paN+Da re/
sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'gog pa nas rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/ tad+ya
thA| ban+d+hi da/ ga ga ri ni/ mUrta ni/ pra mUrta ni/ nA sha ni/ pra nA sha ni/ nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa nas rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/ 'di lta

ste| nA sha ni/ nA sha ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ ts+tshin+da ni/ ts+tshin+da ni/ tsi re mi re/ ma he ha da ni/ ba ni ba re/ kha re be re/ bi ri bi ri/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ su Sha Ni/ sha ra ni/ ba ru ba ri ni/ ba ra

hUM ye/ brah+ma tsa ri Ni/ in+d+ra pa ti/ d+hi d+hi rI ya Ni/ na mo ma he shwa ra ya ni/ ri shi/ b+hany+dza ni pA pa dza ha ni kA la pa ti ni/ b+hu ta ba da ni/ sat+ya ga the/ so ma bA di/ so ma pra d+he swAhA/
tshe ring bar 'gyur/ tad+ya thA/ ha ra ha ra ha ra hA ni swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ i Di ta ga Di ta/ pa di da/ a ye na/ a ri/ b+haM dza ni/ ka kI rti ni/ pu tra da da ha ni/ marga a b+hi ro ha ni/ hu

sa ba ti/ mu pa bi ta/ hi li hi li/ ya thA ba dzu ya/ ya thA ag+ni/ ya thA pa raM tsa ya thA na la ya/ ya thA badzra Na/ ya thA hr-i da ya swAhA/ lag na rdo rje/ 'di ni/ sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
te| de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs rjes sems can rnams kyi don du bshad do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bden pa'i thugs dam gyis rnam par bzhag bzhin du nga yang 'chad do/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod sbu nas 'od zer phyung ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi snang ba byung ngo / /'od zer gyi snang ba
des bskul bas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas chas te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byon nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin
te| shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams snang bar byed pa/ mchog tu dga' bar
byed pa/ dran par byed pa/ bshad par byed pa legs so legs so/ /bdag cag gis kyang byin gyis brlab bo/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang la la gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i yon tan gyi phan yon nyi shur shes par bya ste/
nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang / ngan song du 'gyur ba'i
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad med par 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / ring du 'tsho zhing grags pa dang ldan pa dang / longs spyod dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan
pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
dgyes shing thugs su byon par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad kyis bsam par 'gyur ba dang / dge bar spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson pa dang /
snang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba
dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyis gsang ba'i gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams gsungs shing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo da la bsrung
ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o/ /su zhig sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig
sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de/ rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ shi khi shi khi shi khi shi ka/ tsi tsi tsi tsi/b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/ ru ru

ru ru| dzi dzi dzi dzi/ gra gra gra gra/ hri hri hri hri/ ha ha ha ha/ ma ma ma ma/ ha na ha na me/ sarba pra t+yir+tha kA/ da ha da ha me/ sarba sha tra ba/ pa tsa pa tsa me/ sarba a hi te Shi na swAhA/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dngos
grub dam pa'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams smras pa legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang sgo bzang po zhes
bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de'i sbu'i khung bu rnams su mdangs thams cad stsal bar bgyi ba bshad
par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li tsa li swAhA/ brah+ma swA re swAhA/ brah+ma a ba su gar+b+he/ a kalpe/ pu Sha saM sta re swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ gang nang par langs
nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de srung ba dang / yongs su skyong ba'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po
brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par
langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams

bshad par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi tsit+te/ ba ra Ni/ bA ma raN+De/ dit+ti dit+ti/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ sa ra ma tan+ta/ badzra tu la ni/ dz+wA la mA li ni/ tsakra ba ka/ sha ba re sha ba re/ sha ma re sha
ma ra swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang
gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal
po chen po bzhis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha
ni| d+hu ma pa yi ta re/ AR+ya pra sha ste/ shan+te/ ni ra muk+te/ maM ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/ sta re sta pa ta swAhA/ de nas 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / /nang par langs nas klog pa dang /
yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/
pi li si ba pi li/ si li/ ma hA pi pi li/ si mi li se/ gu ru Ne/ gu ru gu ru Ne/ ma hA gu ru Ne phu swAhA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyis bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi
ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ aT+Ta phu/ baT+Ta phu/ naT+Te pu/ ku
naT+Te phu| ma naT+Te phu/ maN+Da ta ha ke phu/ shri phu/ b+haM ge phu/ maM ge phu swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas
klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ he badzre/ he badzre/ hI hA/ bi si bi si/ ma hA bi si phu swAhA/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das la lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod
par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu lu/ sarba b+hu ta pra ti She d+ha naM ka ro mi swAhA/ de nas sde dpon gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams
brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sarba b+hu ta pra ti She d+ha nAM ka ro mi swAhA/ de nas lha'i bu zla 'od kyis bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po
zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar
bgyi'o| |tad+ya thA/ aM ge/ baM ge/ tsaM ge/ hi ni/ Di Di/ di di/ tsi tsi phu swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sbyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig
sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha te/ bi ha te/ ni
ha te| sarba pra t+ya rI kA /pra t+yA/ mi tra shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi muk+te/ bi ma le/ ni rma le/ pra b+ha swa re/ pra b+ha ka re phu swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam
grangs| tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le

dz+wa la| dz+wa le ni uk+ke muk+ke/ sha me pra sha me/ ma hA pra sha me/ sha me sa mA d+he/ ma hA sa mA d+he/ sa mA ba d+he/ dz+wa le ma hA dz+wa la/ dz+wa la ba me phu swAhA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
kha ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la
bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ u duM ba re/ u duM ba re/ du ma be/ pra du mi be/ bya ba d+he/ A na g+he/ sa mA d+he/ ma hA sA mA d+he/ nI le nI le/ nI le ke

she ke shi ni/ ku le ku le/ ma hA ku le/ nI la ku le/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ na mo hA re/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ naT+Te/ ku naT+Te/ sa ma the/ ba ba la/ ku tse/ dAn+te/ nI la ka she/ ku le/ nI la dAn+ta/ dzAM gu le
hu she| mU she/ ba laM ku she/ ha la ku she /pha la mu tse swAhA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bde ba'i ri gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong
ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ma le/ bi ma

le| nirma le/ maM ga ye/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ ka ma sh+tsi ni/ yu bi ra dze/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kaM ba le/ brah+ma swa re/ brah+ma sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi ma no ra the phu swAhA/ de nas lha mo chen mo
rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rigs sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la
bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bya'o//

tad+ya thA| badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ badzre Ni/ bud+d+ha badzre/ bud+d+ha a d+d+hiSh+Thi te badzre/ su bud+d+he/ ni bu d+d+he/ ba hu bu d+d+he/ bi shi Sh+Ta bu d+d+he/ shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ ni shaM gra ma ni/ dza ge le/ a le se/
ti li me| ti le/ ti li le/ marge/ shAn+ta shAn+ta gA mI ni phu swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sdes 'di skad ces gsol
to| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rigs sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog
pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li badzre/ he hi badzre/ he he badzra/ ya ba ki ri ki ri badzra swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe de/

paN+Da ra ba si ni/ kin+na re/ ka rA de/ ke yu re/ i hA bud+d+he/ ta twa bud+d+he/ b+hu dze b+hu dze/ b+hu dze ga me/ b+hu dza pA pa te/ b+ha ye b+ha ye/ b+ha ya a gra ba te/ bi ni bi ni/ shi ra pa the/ shi pa pa the/
a dI d+ya pa the/ te dze te dze ba to/ /A kA sha pa the phu swAhA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par
langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ku Te ku Te/ ku Ti ni/ ku Ta ku Ta re swA hA/ nI le nI le/ nI la

ke she swAhA/ pI te bI te/ bI ta ke she swA hA/ lo hi te lo hi te/ lo hi ta ke she swAhA/ a ba dA de a pa dA de/ a pa dA da ke ni swA hA/ many+dzi Sh+The many+dzi Sh+The/ many+dzi Sh+Tha ke shes swA hA/ tsa kre
tsakre/ badzra tsa kre swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyangs nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad la legs
so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis lha dang / 'jig rten skyong ba khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /
bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag legs par brjod pa legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gang sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing
nang par langs nas klog pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur/ lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang
po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsam par 'gyur ro/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
bstod do/ /'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye
shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya d+ha rmA sA ga ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge
slong dag/ ngas ni/ chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ cha phra ba/ brtag pa mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba rtogs so/ /ngas ni/ skye bo mang po la phan
pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
to| |ngas thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o/ /dge slong dag /chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ brtan pa'i blo dang
ldan pa| shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/ gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/
gang dag de shes pa dang / gang dag de 'dzin pa de dag gis ni/ myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i
dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brjed nges pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing chos bzung ba rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rnon
po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams
kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos lnga po 'di dag ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhag go /da ltar nga yang 'jog go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
kun dga' bo/ chos thams cad kyi sdom gyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/ des na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa'i chos
rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /bzung ba'i chos rnams ni/ nyams su len par 'gyur ro/ /nyams su blangs pa'i chos ni/ gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed do//
tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / bla na med pa'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba
dang / sa nas sa brtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o/ /de la 'di dag ni/ gzi byin brtan par byed
pa'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags
pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la zas kyi rnam grangs rnams dang / sman rnams sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba/ gzhan dag la mi gnod
pa| de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis mnos pa/ bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo/
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig/ khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/ s+yAd ya the dan/ karma ke ta ma nud tse/ ra ti ru ta gran+d+ra ma/ thu ma na/ nai la ta/ a saM ku la s+thA/ bu mi a nu sma
ri| i shaM ga ma i shas+thA/ kle na a nu ga te/ yA mu la guM b+he/ pa b+he ma gu ra ba ya ba/ a s+ya bAkya s+ya bi laM ga be la ma thA shrI ba ba rI pany+tsa ka /pra sa te/ a ba be la/ a gra be
la| ni shi khu u tse dzu me/ u dze dzu me/ kun dga' bo/ 'di dag ni/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pa grub pa dang / gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/ rim gro yang byed byed pa rnams 'ching ba ste/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis
gnod sbyin dbab pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zungs shig/ kun dga' bo/ gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag
'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa de la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag
bzung bas ni/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa'i gling na ni/ gnod sbyin
srid pa snang byed ces bya ba gnas so/ /kun dga' bo/ nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni/ gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnas so/ /kun dga' bo/ byang gi sgra mi
snyan gyi gling na ni/ gnod sbyin rnam grags zhes bya ba gnas so/ /kun dga' bo/ 'dzam bu gling na ni/ gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas te/ kun dga' bo/
gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gnod sbyin gzhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /dad pa thob par
gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo/ de la 'di dag ni/ shes bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun
dga' po/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig gi mchog srog chags 'byung po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zungs shig dang
pas bshad do/ /kun dga' bo/ de la nga'i phyi na 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nus so/ /s+yad ya the dan/ dan+d+ha ra ma hA ha ra/ ha ra ma
ba ra na/ rud dra tra/ ku ma ti dri tra/ in+d+ra man+tu ke/ a ba te/ sa hA rA/ sa d+hu ma ti/ i la la ba ma ti/ a ba ti/ ta ra da ra/ yi biSh+Ta sa da biSh+Ta/ a ba tiSh+Tha/ pa ri brta/ i sha brta
sa da brta/ kra ma kra ma ti ra na/ a si ba tsa ma la bi na he thi/ tha sha su re/ d+hu ra d+hu ra/ ug+g+ra mug+g+ra/ ug+g+ra ba ti/ pi sa ra gra ma ti/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / srul po dang / klu dang / dri za dang / sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de
dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang / lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar
'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zungs shig /phyis 'gyod ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni/ /gling bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya/ /gsang sngags 'di dag su 'chang pa/ /de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sangs
rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi/ /gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni/ /chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag /nyams par gyur pa de la ston/ /dpag tshad brgya phrag
mang po yang / /mthar gyis su ni song nas kyang / /zab cing don dang ldan pa yi/ /tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par d+ya/ /'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste/ /de dag mkhas rnams
nyan par gyis/ /drag po dag gis thos na yang / /phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste/ /gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med/ /de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /sa 'di
chags pa med pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sa ni bsam mi khyab/ /chags pa med par bstan pa yi/ /bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas/ /nyi ma sprin las byung ba ltar/ /de
ni sa steng de bzhin snang / /'di la skye mched phung po rnams/ /bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang / /dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod/ /
de yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang / /nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /ma thos chos rnams de dag thos/ /nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas/ /rtogs par khong du chud pa'i
mchog/ mig bzang rnams kyang dag par 'gyur/ /'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa/ /de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/ /the tshom mi mnga' bden
pa gang / /bden des bdag la lung mnos pa/ /ci yod thams cad gnas gyur cig /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la/ /byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des/ /rang gi
sems dang gzhan sems la/ /ston par rab tu gnas gyur cig /gling bzhi'i gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag /ma dad pa dang dad par bstan/ /gang la rtogs pa mi snang ba/ /
de la don kun don ston 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang / /glang chen snang dang khyad par stobs/ /drag po dga' byed gsod byed dang / /zla ba mgo med lus
gsod pa/ /dpa' sde dang ni lag dpa' dang / /srin po dang ni sa 'dzin pa/ /ljang gu kha dang sna bzang dang / /ral gri'i sbu can bong bu rnams/ /thams cad grub par byed par
shog /gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la/ /gnod sbyin srin po de dag ni/ /spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed/ /rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang / /tshig
rnams dang ni lung bstan dang / /nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang / /yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur/ /lung mnos pa yang chud mi za/ /rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel
bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu don dang yi ge la/ /de yi shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang / /mi mdzed bdag po tshangs pa yang / /de yi legs
bshad nyan pa rnams/ /de yi mod la dran par byed/ /s+yad ya the dan/ hu ku na/ mu ku na/ ha ra na/ bi ha ra na/ i sha saM kra ma na/ oM su mu kha/ ta ka Na/ a ga Na/ a pri
ya| u s+tha me/ ko ba ha re/ u ru pa/ pra ba Na ta na/ saM gra me ba ha dza ga re/ pra shi ga re/ gu D+ha pa ne/ ut+ta na/ bi ku Na/ i sha ku ni/ a tu la tu la/ i Ti ba Ti/ ba ri tsa
mo sha |ha ra/ dza ga ta/ e pa saM pra mu khe/ a ga b+ha re/ Tha hu sa hu/ i ti ya/ thA hu/ tsa tur dwI bi ka ya na/ Tha hu ma hu/ ug+g+ra hu/ d+ha ra sa hu/ saM gra ha/ a bi na gra
ha| a bi na gra ha/ pra dz+nyA bri d+d+ha ye/ Tha hu sa hu/ ka ra ku ru/ d+hu sa hu/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod/ /
de ni thos la rmongs pa med/ /de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur/ /skar mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin/ /zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin/ /de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang / /mya ngan 'das
pa'i bar la reg /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ tsa ra d+he/ bi tsa ra d+he/ a maM ku te/ a ti mi ti/ pa ra ha re/ g+ha Na

b+he| hi pa ra me/ mA hA pra ti ba hA ne/ dza ya dza ya/ a nu ke /pa la pa le/ ug+g+ra ba ti/ swa ra swa ra/ a bi sa re/ gu gun+te/ pra bi ba d+he/ sa me/ a dza ta dza ye/ nu pa la su kho ma su sid+d+ha ni ku

ma no| |sak+She/ tsA pe tsA pe/ tsu pe tsu pe/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pu lu pu lu/ bya ba pra sa ra/ ka ra ka b+hi n+d+he/ bi dz+wa bi dze/ a pra ti san+d+hi/ nA nA nu ma ti/ pra nA nu ma ti/ /a ri de si/ dze Sh+Tha nu pa ni de/ a
saM gra a pa ti/ rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thogs te 'chang na/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin dang / srin po
dang | grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad kyang
de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba bzhin du 'cho ba'i mthar thug gi bar du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ de la cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ dgon par 'dug la gzungs lags 'di
dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod de/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dran par bya'o/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha
dang | mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes
bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pra dz+nyA wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus
te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ gA thA dwi ya d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang / /le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin/ /'dod chags dang ni nga rgyal spyod pa dang / /'gyod pa dang ni ma nges spyod pa rnams/ /
sems can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste/ /de yi gnyen por theg pa mchog bstan pa/ /de yis bar du gcod pa de dag gi/ nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /

tad+ya tha/ oM badzra pra kA ra/ badzra tsa kra/ daM Sh+TA b+ha yA na ke/ a ma le/ bi ma lo/ ni rma le/ tsu lu ke/ tsu lu tsu lu sarba bud+d+he swAhA/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs la ni/ chag gam
don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba/ /sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des/ /phan yon rnam pa bcu dag thob par 'gyur/ /khams rnams mtha' dag rtas par 'gyur ba dang / /'chi
ba'i tshe na mchog dga' dam pa 'thob/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang / /thams cad du ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba dang / /
de bzhin de dag las ni theg mchog thos/ /mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang / /sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du thob/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzogs
so|| ||rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya Sha Ta mu khi nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa/ rin po
che sna bdun gyis rab tu phye bas rnam par spras pa na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
'di zungs shig/ de 'di lta ste/ bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sdug bsngal gang ci yang myong ba de sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pa'i mtshan
nyid du ma gyur cig/ bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci yang myong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyod par gyur
cig/ bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang ci byas pa de/ so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig/ bdag la bdud kyi las gang
dag yod pa de dag yongs su shes pa bla na med pas dngos su mi shes par ma gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig
rten las 'das pa gang yang rung gang ci yod pa de thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig/ bdag gi rnam par grol ba gang yin pa des sems can
thams cad rnam par thar par gyur cig/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gnas par ma gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM k+Sha me k+Sha me k+Sha me/ k+ShAn+te k+ShAn+te/ da me da me/ da n+te

dan+te| b+ha dre b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre su b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre su b+ha dre/ tsan+d+re tsan+d+re/ su tsan+d+re su tsen+d+re/ tsan+d+ra ki ra Ne/ tsan+d+ra ba te/ te dzo ba ti/ d+ha m+mA ba te/ ya sho ba ti/ bra h+ma ba ti/ sar+b+ba kle sha bi shod+ha

ni| sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha pra sha ma ni/ pa ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ kA ya bi sho d+ha ni/ wA ka bi sho d+ha ni/ na maHsaM sho d+ha ni swA hA/ rigs kyi bu dag /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi pu
mo gang la las sgo drug pa'i gzungs 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/ de las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya Sha TA k+Sha ra bid+yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
lo| |'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
pa| kun dga' bo/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zungs shig /chongs shig /kun chub par gyis shig/

tad+ya thA| dan+ti le/ kun+ti le/ dan+da mi ti/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma raN+De/ ka rIn+te/ ko raN+De/ drA bi ti/ ko shA ri/ tsha Ta dza/ du du ma te/ ke tu ma ti/ tsu du n+d+he/ ko Ta dan+te/ tu ru hu re/ e na ni ge/
hu ta ba hu ni/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags so/ /klad pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / sna na ba dang / lce na ba dang /
snying na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / rgya ba na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba dang /
zas ma zhu ba dang / sbos pa dang / mngal du thogs pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa
dang | rims drag po dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims yud tsam pa dang / nyin mo'i rims dang / mtshan mo'i
rims kyis btab pa la yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chus gtor ba dang / srad bus bcings pa byas pa las gang zhig 'gal dar byed na/ de'i
mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du mi 'gas pa ni/ kun dga' bo/ ngas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer

bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /tad+ya thA/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ ka ra te/ ke yu re/ b+hu taM ga me/ b+hu ta gra he/ b+hu ta pra k+Shi
te| b+hu ta ya smra ra ya ni/ pra ya ba ti/ te dza ba ti/ ya sho da ti/ gi ri NaM ni/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya ka na ka ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod
skad du/ 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang
po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag g.yul ngor ma chis te g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / rig sngags
rnams dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse
ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rab tu gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i
gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ko'u shi ka /de de
bzhin no/ /lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa na rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags rnams dang / sman rnams kyis pham pa de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka/ snying brtse ba'i phyir
'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ sgyu thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad zlog par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa
dang | rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad
par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/ gang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du gzhan mu stegs can spyod
pa ba dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar 'chad du byas pa las/ ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan pa rnams kyi rig sngags thams cad
bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa ba dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshe ba rnams kyi sgyu dang / rig
sngags dang / sman dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen po de ngas bshad par bya'i/ ko'u shi ka /khyod kyi sems can thams cad rjes su gzung
pa'i phyir gsang sngags chen po rnam par rgyal ba chen po zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol te lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom
ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ oM hi ni hi ni/ hi li hi li/ mi

li mi li/ hi li mi li/ ni hi ni hi/ ni hi ra pi ni/ kAny+tsa nA pa ti/ lo kA mA te/ b+hu te/ b+hu ku ta man+t+ra/ a d+hi kr-i te/ be de be de be ta man+t+ra/ a d+hi kr-i te /ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ tsin+d+ha tsin+d+ha/

b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+ba ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha shak+t+ri d+ha ra Ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kA DA ma mA na si/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ stam+b+ha ya
stam+b+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ lha'i sgyu dang / klu'i sgyu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang / srin po'i sgyu dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgyu dang / dri za'i sgyu dang / lha
ma yin gyi sgyu dang / mi'am ci'i sgyu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgyu dang / rig sngags 'chang gi sgyu dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu dang / drang srong gi sgyu dang /
sems can dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi sgyu dang / 'byung po'i sgyu dang / sgyu thams cad ra la ra la/ radz+dza radz+dza/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu d+hu ma/ rA ba rA ba rA ba na/ tsa krA

nan+ta| grAn+tha ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba bid+yA/ sha trUM NAM/ stam+b+ha ya/ ba yuM stam+b+ha ya/ sUR+yaM stam+b+ha ya/ so naM stam+b+ha ya/ ba ru NaM stam+b+ha ya/ ag+niM stam+b+ha ya/ u da kaM d+hi ti d+hi ti/ d+hA ra Ni pA sha ha te/
baSh+Ta ya pA she na/ gang dag bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa

dang | mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ma hA mo ha
ni| b+ha ga ba ti swAhA/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig phaT swAhA/ ko'u shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo'am/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes su dran par byed na/ de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de'i
sde la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs so/ /lhas ma yin/ klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis ma yin/
nam mkha' lding gis ma yin/ mi'am cis ma yin/ rig sngags 'chang gis ma yin/ mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/
rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i
dus byed par mi 'gyur/ lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang / chu dang / dug dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so//
gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba de nyid la slar 'bab par 'gyur/ de nyid du slar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ko'u shi ka/ de lta bas na/
dad pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la lan bdun bzlas te bdag
gi lus la blugs na/ bdag gi lus srung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang /
rig sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad dang / byad thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par
bya'o| |rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'dul bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di
dran par bya'o/ /lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun por ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba'am/ chu la lan bdun bzlas pas bdag bsrung bar bya'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad la thogs
pa med pa'i gzungs yi ger bris te 'chang bar bya/ /mgul du gdags par bya'o/ /yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul du zhugs na/ dge ba dang / bde
bar thar par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis nang mi dang / g.yog 'khor dang / sde dang bcas te dge ba dang / bde bar rgal bar 'gyur ro/ /ma grub pa rnams kyang grub
par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor na/ bcings pa dang / rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /
sgyu rengs par byed par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sa la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na/ sgyu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed par 'dod pas zin
thig la la na bdun bzlas te 'chos na/ smra ba thams cad kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa
thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis byas par gyur pa dang / gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'gro'o/ /srad bu btags sam/ chus bdag bsrungs
par byas na/ de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i don
thams cad kyang mthun par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba
ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ ka ru Na a gra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ snying
rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ sems can sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshang tshing du
nub pa rnams yang dag par sgral ba'i phyir blo gros shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi mchog /snying rje chen po'i rtse mo 'char
ba| thogs pa med pa'i don yod pa'i las kyi dngos grub/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba/ sems can gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /
ngan song gi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar byed pa/ phan pa ma yin pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad dang / nad rnam pa du ma
dang | dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ thog mar bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
kyi tshogs du ma bye ba phrag 'bum gyis brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal nas brtsam par bya'o/ /na mo b+ha ga wa te/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/

sarba a dz+nyA na d+ha ka ra sha ma yi tre/ tad+ya thA/ sA d+ha ni sA d+ha ni/ sid+d+hi bid+d+ha ri/ b+ha ga ba ti pa raM pA ra/ kle sha d+ha ba ti/ a dz+nyA na sha ma ni sha mA ya/ sarba pA paM bi shud+d+ha d+harme ni rma la dz+nyA

na go tsa ra/ a saM ga tsa ri ni pra shi ma murti su kha pra te sarba kle sha d+ha ba ti/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ bi d+ha ma ni/ bi na shA ni bi na shA ni/ bi na shA ya bi na shA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti su

ra sa bi ma la bud+d+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ su ru su ru/ sU ra sU ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ a dz+wa la na ma ko Ti sa ha sra saM tsi taM karma a pa ra Ni k+Sha pa ya/ k+She

ma ba ti bud+d+ha bi ShA ya/ ba sha brti ni pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa re/ bi she Sha ba ti/ a she Sha ma li Ni/ ka ru Ni go tsa re/ mahA dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka pa ti/ su bi ni sh+tsi ta d+harme/ he he b+ha
ga ba ti| ma hA ka ru Ni/ ku ru ku ru/ bi sho d+ha ya/ maM sarba satwash+tsa/ ma hA ka ru Nod se ke na sa na si tsI ya/ sa ma ba d+hA ya/ sa ma d+ha lA ya/ pra ro hA ya me/

ma hA ka ru Na bi dza na pa ri shud+d+hA ya/ a mo g+ha me ku ru dzi bi ta na rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ b+ha ga ba ti ma ma hA bo d+hi tsi taM saM mU h+yed ma san+tu shud pi ti ma ka ru Ni/ bud+d+ha bo d+hi pra te/ na
ra ka pre ti taR+ya ga ti duHkhe na mU la ni/ d+he ba ma nu Sh+ya ga ti saM ba ha na bi ga to ba kle she/ sarba bud+d+ha d+harma pa ri pU ra Ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje chen po'i mchog
ces bya ba'i gzungs bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba 'di ni/ gzungs grangs med pa phrog stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa'o/ /sdig pa dang / las dang / nyon
mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'o/ /bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o/ /tshe dang /
bsod nams dang / gzugs dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa dang / nad med par byed pa'o/ /'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
nam mkha' lding dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci'i gdon thams cad nges par 'joms pa'o/ /gzungs 'di'i ming bzung ba dang / thos pa dang / brjod pa tsam
gyis kyang tshe rabs bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad bsra bas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i ngan song gi
'gro ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
dge ba dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ /snying rje las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyis kyang
mngon par dga' bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du lan bdun bdun brjod na/ sdig pa thams cad las rnam par thar par 'gyur la/ byang
chub sems dpa'i yon tan stong phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /nam langs pa'i dus su skyil mo krung bcas te bde bar 'dug la lag pa
gru gsum gyi phyag rgya byas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdag nyid chen po mngon du bsams
nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras te yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ de la yid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i bsam pa
thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ don ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga la bcom ldan
'das la mchod pa byas la bsnyen gnas blangs te gos dkar po bgos te sbyin pa byas la byang chub kyi sems chen po blangs nas mi sdug pa med par lag pa brkyang ba
des rang gi lag gis dkyil 'khor byugs la me tog kha dog sna gsum gyis mchod nas tsan+dan dkar pos bdugs la/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag mtha' yas pa
dag na mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'os pa rnams yid la bsams te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong chen po 'bar ba 'di nam dga' ba chen po skyes pa'i bar du brjod na/ bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams kyi drung du 'dug par shes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zang zing med pa'i chos kyi longs spyod chen po'i dga' ba thob par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su phyir mi ldog par skyes pa yin no/ /tshe rabs gzhan du song na yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags
'chang chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa mi
nyams pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la yang sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur ro/ /klu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur te/ gang la smras pa de'i bya ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /des ci bsam pa dang / byed
du bcug pa rnams kyang lha la sogs pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'dod pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sus kyang ngag mi gcog par yang 'gyur
ro| |lha rnams kyis kyang de'i stobs dang / gzugs dang / bsod nams dang / lang tsho dang / nad med pa dang / rgyas pa 'phel bar byed do/ /bgegs thams cad kyis kyang mi
tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po mthong bar 'dod
pa rnams dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob bar 'dod pa rnams dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa'i gar thabs byed pa la
'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig thob par 'dod pa rnams dang / rtag par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
bar chad med par rgyud chen po'i de kho na rtogs par 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par 'dod pa rnams kyis yon
tan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yang dag par bstan
pa 'di thog mar sgrim pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa'i cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du blang bar bya'o/ /snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs
rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya puSh+pa kU Ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa na klu'i rgyal po ma dros
pa'i khang pa na dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa byang chub sems dpa' stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ skye ba cig gis thogs pa/ sa bcu la gnas pa/
de ma thag tu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la the tshom med pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go /de'i tshe
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
seng+ge rnam par rtse ba stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/
de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge rnam par rtse ba la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams ji snyed
cig bskyed par 'gyur zhes seng+ge rnam par rtse ba khyod de skad ma zer cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/ ting
nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa/ shes rab dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa ste/ seng+ge rnam par rtse ba/
gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir de la mchod pa'i rnam
par smin pa de yang dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/ /seng+ge rnam par rtse ba/ gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / /yongs su mya ngan las 'das
kyang rung ste mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen po'am/ theg pa gsum las theg
pa gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /seng+ge rnam par rtse ba/ yang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas mthong nas sems dang bar gyur la/ dad pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad dang /
bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas shing ri mor byas te mchod cing rjed la rim gror byas pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gyi mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ mnyam par shes par bya ste/ bye brag gam/ tha dad du bya ba med do/ /seng+ge rnam
par rtse ba/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang zhig gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams la rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam dbul ba phul ba bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rab tu byung nas kaR+Sha pa Na gcig tsam dbul bar phul la/ phul nas kyang bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des dge ba'i rtsa ba phyi ma'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi
cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / sgrun pa dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/ /seng+ge rnam par rtse ba/ gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lo gcig gam/ lo brgya'am/ lo stong yang rung ste bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par zin pas de bzhin gshegs pa
la mchod pa'i phyir me tog 'ga' 'bul lam/ chu snyim pa gang tsam 'thor ram/ byug pa'i thig le 'bri'am/ me tog gi nyal nyil 'phyag gam/ byug pa 'bul lam/ spos
'bul lam/ me tog 'bul lam/ bdug spos 'bul lam/ phreng ba 'bul lam/ rol mo'i sil snyan 'bul lam/ gdugs 'bul lam/ dri 'bul lam/ dpyangs pa
'bul lam/ rgyal mtshan 'bul lam/ ba dan 'bul lam/ dar 'bul lam/ mar me 'bul zhing / phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor
te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes smra ba de dag ni/ seng+ge rnam par rtse ba/ bskal par ram/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong du'am/ bskal
pa 'bum du'ang ngan 'gror log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/ 'di la dogs pa'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar mi bya'o/ /seng+ge rnam par rtse
ba/ me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod kyi/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal
po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bshad par bya'o/ /seng+ge rnam par rtse ba/ gang la la zhig me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/
yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad pa de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /de ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi
'gyur/ dal ba rnyed par 'gyur/ nam du yang dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ /nam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang sangs
rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /
nam du yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam du yang rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur/ spobs pa sna tshogs zab mo phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra Ni/ mu ni pra b+ha swa re/ sid+d+he/ tsaN+De nA maHtsi

ni r+he ri/ a ro ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha ma ti d+he R+ye/ oM ka ra te/ ga ga ra te/ rA dza bi te/ de dzo bi te/ bi bu la bud+d+hi/ d+harma a ba b+ha se/ ak+Sha ya kalpe/ kalpa ba ti/ a mr-i kalpe hUM tA sha ne/
te dzo ba ti/ nai R+ya saM hi te/ te dzo gra ba/ tiSh+ThI na dra ye tiSh+Thi na dra ye bud+d+hi swAhA/ seng+ge rnam par rtse ba/ gang la la zhig gis me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di'i
ming dang / yi ge dang / tshig mtha' dag shes te kun tshub par byed pa des dpyid zla tha chung dang / dbyar zla ra ba dang / ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung la
bco lnga'i bar du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bsam zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rtse gcig tu yid la byas la
bcom ldan 'das la spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / bdug spos kyis mchod na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs shing /
chos kyang ston pa bco lnga mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs rab tu thob par 'gyur/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtogs pa dang ldan par
'gyur| blo dang ldan par 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa thams cad dang / bstan bcos thams cad dang / bzo
thams cad dang / las thams cad rab tu shes par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de'i sems la gnas par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni/ ma gtogs
so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni/ zag pa med par gtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po seng+ge rnam par rtse dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ma hA d+hA ra NI/ bod
skad du/ 'phags pa gzungs chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu
bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer gnas bcas su dbyar gnas nas zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas lhung bzed
dang / chos gos thogs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis sems can thams cad
kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid kyi phyir gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /chos shig /longs shig /lhogs
shig /kun chub par gyis shig /yid la zungs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni/ rnyed par dka' zhing / de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yang rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir te/ dper na/ u dum wa ra'i me tog lta
bu yin gyi/ zungs shig /chongs shig /longs shig /lhogs shig /yid la zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /kun dga' bo/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la 'dzin tam/ kun chub par byed na/ de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus
byed par mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mes ma yin/ chus ma yin/ rgyal po'i chad pas ma yin te/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de lha dang /
lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grul
bum dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / 'byung po dang / rjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / gnon po dang / grib gnon dang / gshed byed dang / gnod byed dang / byad kyis mi tshugs/
de la mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs/ de la rig pa'i las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis mi tshugs/ de la rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa
dang | nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / yud tsam dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las
gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+wa le/ mahA dz+wa le/ dz+wa la ne/ ma hA
dz+wa la ne| tA pa ne/ ma hA tA pa ne/ dz+wa li te/ uk+ke/ puk+ke/ saM b+ha de/ ma hA saM b+ha de/ tsa kre/ ma hA tsa kre/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa
dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ nga yang da ltar 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo / /kun dga' bo/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na/ de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran
par 'gyur ro/ /de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ an+te/ ban+te/ k+Sha me/ k+Sha
ma me| d+hA na se/ ba da ne/ a da ne/ hu le/ ma hA hu le/ ta ka re gaM g+hi re/ duSh+pu sa te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go
ba thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba
phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis gsungs te/ nga yang da lta na 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo / /kun dga' bo/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs
chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na/ de tshe rabs bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par
'gyur ro/ /de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ ag+ge/ pag+ge/ Thag+ge/

Thag+ge/ d+hak+ke/ d+hA ra d+hak+ke/ Ta ke Ta ra ke/ a ka si/ sa ka si/ ma ka si/ i li mi li/ ti li mi li/ rau ra be/ ma hA ro ra be/ b+hU taM ga me b+hU ta pa rA ya Ne/ ti mi gi se/ ma hA ti mi gi se/ saM
b+ha be| ma hA saM b+ha be/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig /srungs shig swAhA/
kun dga' bo/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ nga yang da lta na 'chad
cing rjes su yi rang ngo / /kun dga' bo/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang /
klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /de byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par mi
'gyur ro/ /de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ ru le/ ma hA ru le/ he he ri/ mat+ta ri/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ kun dga' bo/ dad pa'i
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis shing skam po srung ba'am/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs
su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang /
nam mkha' bcing ba dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ de la srad bus bcings na/ de'i rtsa ba yang skye bar 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / lcug ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu
yang skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ kun dga' bo/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /kun
dga' bo/ nyi zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis ni/ sa la ltung yang srid do/ /kun dga' bo/ ri'i rgyal po ri
rab gnas nas g.yo yang srid do/ /kun dga' bo/ rgya mtsho chen po 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar rgya che la/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul cha zhing mthu che ba bzhi po 'di dag ni/
bskams shing yongs su zad de mthar thug par 'gyur yang srid do/ /kun dga' bo/ sa chen po 'di ni/ rnam pa stong du 'gyes kyang srid/ chu ni/ gsher ba nyid 'dor
yang srid/ me ni /tsha ba 'dor yang srid/ rlung ni/ grang ba 'dor yang srid kyi/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ bslu mi srid do/ /kun dga' bo/ lha'am/
klu'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ rlung lha'am/ dri za'am/ mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dwags sam/ sha za'am/ grul
bum mam/ srul po'am/ lus srul po'am/ 'byung po'am/ bram ze'am/ srin po'am/ grib gnon nam/ mi dang mi ma yin pa gang la la zhig gam/ gzhan su yang rung ba
zhig gis gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ tad+ya thA/ ag+gi le/ tsag+gi le/ bal+le/ mal+le/ oM hA ni/ mo hA ni/ dzaM b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni/ bdag dang sems
can thams cad la srungs shig /srungs shig swAhA/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'phar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/
me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/
rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang rdo rje 'phen no/ /gsang
pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/ /
de rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du gnas su mi dbang ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa
gzungs chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos
nas gtan la phab pa// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /he b+ha ga wan/ many+dzu shrI ku mA ra sarba ta thA ga ta ba la/ bI d+hi dz+nyA/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/
nA ge sti tiSh+Tha sarba satwa nAn swAhA/ 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab
bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i blo ldan zhes
bya ba/ ri rab kyi ngos la bzhugs te/ ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis bskor nas/ mdun du byas te chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul ba/ blo dang mi ldan pa/ yid mi

gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab bskyed pa zhas bya ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol bshad pa/ hUM pi tsu pi tsu pra dz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swAhA/ gang zhig

gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / chung ngu yang yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang / tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /gang gis zla ba drug gi bar

du nyin re zhing rtsabs khyor gang la rigs pa 'di lan bdun btab ste/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'thungs na tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig 'thungs na lnga brgya 'dzin te/ nyin gcig bzhin du

shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin re bzhin du brjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang / yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab bskyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tA ra aSh+Ta g+ho re tA sbI

sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi steng lho'i gnas na bzhugs te/ de nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo sgrol mas 'di skad ces smras
so| |mtho ris rin chen lta bu 'di thob nas/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu shes par byos/ /bzang po sten cing ngan pa spang bar gyis/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams spyod byed pa/ /
'jig rten pha rol thur du 'bab 'gyur te/ /dud 'gro glen lkugs gcig la gcig za dang / /gyen thur 'bab 'dzeg g.yang sa ngal ba'i lam/ /'jigs shing dngangs skrag
shin tu skyi g.ya' ba/ /zon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /yi dwags ltogs shing skom dang lus mi 'tsham/ /bza' btung snang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa
dang / /kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur/ /ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni/ /rang dbang med
par gshin rje gdug pas khrid/ /bsregs shing btsos te mtshon gyis rab tu 'thug /bsran glags med pa'i sdug bsngal tsha dang grang / /des na tshe 'dir sdig pa'i las
byed pa/ /rang gis rang la mngan ni cher byas yin/ /bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs/ /thar pa'i dus med bsran pa'i glags kyang med/ /dran pa gsal
bas las kyi 'bras bur shes/ /sdug bsngal ma bzong smre sngags rang la rmo/ /skad ngan drag po'i ku sgras gzhan yang skrag /de la sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag
nyes dmigs rab tu shes gyis la/ /ngan song gsum gyi rgyu rnams rab tu spangs/ /sdig pa'i rnam pa phra rags gang la yang / /lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas spyad ta re/ /rang yang bde la
'gro rnams yongs la phan/ /chags sdang rmongs spangs snying rje'i rtsa ba brtan/ /sgo gsum dang bas 'bad de dge ba spyad/ /shin tu zab pa'i snying po 'di la 'bad/ /me tog sad kyis
khyer ba'i 'bras bu la/ /so nam byas kyang myu gu mi skye ltar/ /sdom nyams the tshom zos pa'i gang zag gis/ /shin tu zab pa'i rig sngags bsgrub gyur kyang / /byin brlabs 'byung ngo
snyam yang 'byung mi srid/ /rtsol ba de dag nga la ba don med 'gyur/ /rig sngags de yang skye bo'i tshig dang mtshungs/ /ting 'dzin rnams kyang byis pa'i bsam pa 'dra/ /skyon med skyes
bus rig sngags de bsgrubs na/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub/ /dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi sa bon ni/ /shin tu phra yang chu lud legs bran na/ /dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam
du skye/ /bems po phyi yi 'gyur yang de 'dra na/ /rig pas rig pa bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ /'od gsal nang gi 'gyur la dpag tu med/ /tshong dpon lam la mkhas pa dag la brten/ /gru
tshags legs pas rgya mtshor zhugs gyur na/ /rin chen 'dod pa bzhin du rnyed gyur nas/ /rang gi gnas su legs par phyin pa yin/ /byams dang
snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms rten/ /byang chub sems ldan dge ba spyad gyur na/ /yang dag rdzogs kyi lam la zhugs 'gyur te/ /nges par mkhyen nyid sa la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mda'
nyid skyes bu'i 'theb nas shor gyur na/ /mi 'phang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur/ /chos nyid don kun chub pa'i gang zag ni/ /mi phyin snyam yang pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /bya
cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par the tshom med/ /chos nyid rnam par dag pa de rtogs na/ /bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med/ /
las med de yi rnam par smin pa med/ /mtha' rnams rab spangs skyes bu rnam par grol/ /de don rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa yi/ /snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na/ /
bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi sdig kyang 'dzad/ /ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun/ /rab tu sbyong zhing sgrib pa rnams kyang 'dag /don dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di
lta ste/ /oM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo/ lha mo khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol/ /oM na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA

ma| tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TAn/ pra duSh+TAn ma ma kr-i te/ dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ ma ma AR+yA ba lo b+ha yA na rA/ bo d+hi satwA/ ma hA satwA ni/

a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te ma ma sarba karma A ba ra Na swa b+hA ba/ shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis su/ /lha mo nyid la rab tu bstod/ /thugs rje
shin tu che bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs shing rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /shin tu mdzes tshul 'dzum zhing bzhad pa'i bzhin/ /spyan gyi skye mched zar ma'i pad+ma
'dra| |snyan gyi skye mched ug cos bye ba 'dra/ /shangs kyi skye mched ut+pal bum bu 'dra/ /zhal gyi skye mched ha lo rgyas pa 'dra/ /sna tshogs sku mnga' na chung mtshan ldan sku/ /chos kyi sgra
sgrogs ka la ping ka'i gsung / /sems can kun la byams mgon thugs rje'i thugs/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma g.yon/ /sems can don rnams mdzad phyir skyabs sbyin g.yas//
thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma la ni skyabs su mchi/ /'khor ba'i g.yang sa che las bdag skyobs shig /'gro drug rang kha'i gnas su 'khor ra re/ /thugs
rje chen mo'i zhags pas bdag zung shig /ngan song gsum gyi gnas su shor ra re/ /'khyams med pa yi lam du bdag chug shig /log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes sa re/ /bla ma byang sems
mnga' dang bdag sprod cig /bshes gnyen ngan pa dag dang phrad ta re'o/ /seng ge glang chen me dang sbrul/ /mi rgod chu dang rims rnams dang / /sha zas 'jigs pa brgyad po las/ /skyob mdzad
khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /'jigs pa brgyad las bskyab tu gsol/ /pha rol 'bras bu ma thob par dag tu/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang / /bsam
gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang / /stobs dang de bzhin ye shes pha rol phyin/ /bcu po de dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos 'di bri ba
dang / bklag pa dang / kha tog dang / kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams
yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //mdangs phyir mi 'phrog pa ces bya ba bai dUR+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/

oM ma ma rak+Sha sA ga re ma hA sA ga re/ pu ru tse bu tsu ru/ sa ma ne me/ de ba be/ hu lu hu lu swAhA/ gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang / b+hi su nag po la 'de gu byas te/ lkog mar thig le byas te sngags
lan bdun bzlas na/ 'byung po rnams kyis de'i mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi/ blta bar yang mi nus so/ /rdzogs so// //
